Sentence: It's so skinny.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: So are you. I had the blacksmith make it for you special. It won't hack a man's head off, but it can poke him full of holes if you're quick enough.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I can be quick.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You'll have to work at it every day. How does it feel? Do you like the balance?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I think so.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: First lesson

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I know which end to use.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I'm going to miss you... Careful... All the best swords have names, you know.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Sansa can keep her sewing needles. I've got a needle of my own.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I came to say goodbye to Bran.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: You've said it.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I wish I could be here when you wake up. I'm going north with Uncle Benjen. I'm taking the black. I know we always talked about seeing the Wall together, but you'll be able to come visit me at Castle Black when you're better. I'll know my way around by then. I'll be a sworn brother of the Night's Watch. We can go out walking beyond the Wall, if you're not afraid.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: I want you to leave.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: 17 years ago you rode off with Robert Baratheon. You came back a year later with another woman's son. And now you're leaving again.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: I have no choice.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: That's what men always say when honor calls. That's what you tell your families, tell yourselves. You do have a choice. And you've made it. I can't do it, Ned. I really can't.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: You can. You must.

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: You've said goodbye to Bran? He's not going to die. I know it.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You Starks are hard to kill.

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: My mother?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: She was very kind.

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: Good. Next time I see you, you'll be all in black.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: It was always my color.

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: Farewell, Snow.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: And you, Stark.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: There's great honor serving in the Night's Watch. The Starks have manned the Wall for thousands of years. And you are a Stark. You might not have my name, but you have my blood.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Is my mother alive? Does she know about me? Where I am, where I'm going? Does she care?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: The next time we see each other, we'll talk about your mother. I promise.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Gods, this is country! I've half a mind to leave them all behind and keep going.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: I've half a mind to go with you.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: What do you say, just you and me on the Kingsroad, swords at our sides, a couple of tavern wenches to warm our beds tonight.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: You should have asked me 20 years ago.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: There were wars to fight, women to marry... We never had the chance to be young.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: I recall a few chances.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: There was that one... Oh, what was her name? That common girl of yours? Becca? With the great big tits you could bury your face in.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Bessie. She was one of yours.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Bessie! Thank the gods for Bessie and her tits. Yours was... Aleena? No. You told me once. Meryl? Your bastardo s mother?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Wylla.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: That's it. She must have been a rare wench to make Lord Eddard Stark forget his honor. You never told me what she looked like.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Nor will I.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: We were at war. None of us knew if we were gonna go back home again. You're too hard on yourself. You always have been. I swear if I weren't your King, you'd have hit me already.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: The worst thing about your coronation... I'll never get to hit you again.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Trust me, that's not the worst thing. There was a rider in the night.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Daenerys Targaryen has wed some Dothraki horselord. What of it? Should we send her a wedding gift?

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: A knife perhaps, a good sharp one, and a bold man to wield it.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: She's little more than a child.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Soon enough that child will spread her legs and start breeding.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Tell me we're not speaking of this.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Oh, it's unspeakable to you? What her father did to your family... That was unspeakable. What Rhaegar Targaryen did to your sister... the woman I loved. I'll kill every Targaryen I get my hands on.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: But you can't get your hands on this one, can you?

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: This Khal Drogo, it's said he has 100,000 men in his horde.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Even a million Dothraki are no threat to the realm, as long as they remain on the other side of the Narrow Sea. They have no ships, Robert.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: There are still those in the Seven Kingdoms who call me Usurper. If the Targaryen boy crosses with a Dothraki horde at his back, the scum will join him.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: He will not cross. And if by chance he does, we'll throw him back into the sea.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: There's a war coming, Ned. I don't know when, I don't know who we'll be fighting, but it's coming.

Name: Benjen Stark
Sentence: Sit. You'll be fed. Untie them.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Rapers. They were given a choice no doubt... Castration or the Wall. Most choose the knife. Not impressed by your new brothers? Lovely thing about the Watch... You discard your old family and get a whole new one.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Why do you read so much?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Look at me and tell me what you see.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Is this a trick?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: What you see is a dwarf. If I'd been born a peasant they might've left me out in the woods to die. Alas, I was born a Lannister of Casterly Rock. Things are expected of me. My father was the Hand of the King for 20 years.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Until your brother killed that King.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Yes, until my brother killed him. Life is full of these little ironies. My sister married the new King and my repulsive nephew will be King after him. I must do my part for the honor of my house, wouldn't you agree? But how? Well, my brother has his sword and I have my mind. And a mind needs books like a sword needs a whetstone. That's why I read so much. And you? What's your story, bastard?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Ask me nicely and maybe I'll tell you, dwarf.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: A bastard boy with nothing to inherit, off to join the ancient order of the Night's Watch, alongside his valiant brothers-in-arms.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: The Night's Watch protects the realm from...

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Yes yes, against grumpkins and snarks and all the other monsters your wet nurse warned you about. You're a smart boy. You don't believe that nonsense... Everything's better with some wine in the belly.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: Talk to Poole about it.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: I don't care about appointments!

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: I'll make the appointments. We'll talk about it first thing in the morning.

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: When was the last time you left this room?

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: I have to take care of him.

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: He's not going to die, mother. Maester Luwin says the most dangerous time has passed.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: What if he's wrong? Bran needs me.

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: Rickon needs you. He's six. He doesn't know what's happening. He follows me around all day, clutching my leg, crying...

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: Close the windows! I can't stand it! Please make them stop!

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: Fire. You stay here. I'll come back.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: No!

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Have you ever seen a dragon?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Everywhere? Even in the east?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: The moon?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Leave me with her. Why did the trader from Garth tell you these stories?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: How old were you?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Nine?!

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Can you teach me how to make the Khal happy?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Will it take three years?

Name: Benjen Stark
Sentence: Welcome.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: What I am about to tell you must remain between us. I don't think Bran fell from that tower. I think he was thrown.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: Someone tried to kill him twice. Why? Why murder an innocent child? Unless he saw something he wasn't meant to see.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: Saw what, my lady?

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: I don't know. But I would stake my life the Lannisters are involved. We already have reason to suspect their loyalty to the crown.

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: They come into our home and try to murder my brother? If it's war they want...

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: If it comes to that, you know I'll stand behind you.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: I don't trust a raven to carry these words.

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: I'll ride to King's Landing.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: No. There must always be a Stark in Winterfell. I will go myself.

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: Mother, you can't.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: I must.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: Too large a party attracts unwanted attention. I don't want the Lannisters to know I'm coming.

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: What about Bran?

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: I have prayed to the Seven for more than a month. Bran's life is in their hands now.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Finish a man?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Well, she sounds like an interesting woman. I don't think that Drogo will like it with me on top.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I don't think that this is the Dothraki way.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: No. No. Tonight I would look upon your face.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Pardon me, Ser.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Do I frighten you so much, girl? Or is it him there making you shake? He frightens me too. Look at that face.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I'm sorry if I offended you, Ser. Why won't he speak to me?

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: He hasn't been very talkative these last 20 years. Since the mad King had his tongue ripped out with hot pincers.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Stay, Lady. I probably shouldn't have any more. Father only lets us have one cup at feasts.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Arya!

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: What are you doing here? Go away.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: He the butcher's boy.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: He's my friend.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Stop it!

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Arya, stay out of this.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: No no, stop it, stop it, both of you. You're spoiling it. You're spoiling everything!

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Nymeria!

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Arya, leave him alone. My prince, my poor prince, look what they did to you. Stay here, I'll go back to the inn and bring help.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: You've got to go. They'll kill you for what you did to Joffrey. Go on... run. Go! Leave now!

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Go!

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Where is she?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Who took her?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Right, get back.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Back! Back to the inn. All back!

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I'm sorry.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Are you hurt?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: No.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: It's all right. What is the meaning of this? Why was my daughter not brought to me at once?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: How dare you speak to your King in that manner?

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Quiet, woman. Sorry, Ned. I never meant to frighten the girl. But we need to get this business done quickly.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Your girl and that butcher's boy attacked my son. That animal of hers nearly tore his arm off.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: That's not true! She just... Bit him a little. He was hurting Mycah.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Joffrey told us what happened. You and that boy beat him with clubs while you set your wolf on him.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: That's not what happened!

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Liar!

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Enough! He tells me one thing, she tells me another. Seven hells! What am I to make of this? Where's your other daughter, Ned?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: In bed asleep.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: She's not. Sansa, come here, darling.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Now, child... Tell me what happened. Tell it all and tell it true. It's a great crime to lie to a King.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I don't know. I don't remember. Everything happened so fast. I didn't see.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Liar! Liar liar liar!

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Stop it! That's enough of that.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Liar liar liar!

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Stop! Arya!

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: She's as wild as that animal of hers. I want her punished.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: What would you have me do, whip her through the streets? Damn it, children fight. It's over.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Joffrey will bear these scars for the rest of his life.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: You let that little girl disarm you? See to it that your daughter is disciplined. I'll do the same with my son.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Gladly, your Grace.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: And what of the direwolf? What of the beast that savaged your son?

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: I'd forgot the damned wolf.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: So be it.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: We have another wolf.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: As you will.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: You can't mean it.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: A direwolf's no pet. Get her a dog. She'll be happier for it.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: He doesn't mean Lady, does he? No no, not Lady! Lady didn't bite anyone! She's good!

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Lady wasn't there! You leave her alone!

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Stop them. Don't let them do it. Please! It wasn't Lady!

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: s this your command... your Grace?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Where is the beast?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Ser Ilyn, do me the honor.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: No. Jory... Take the girls to their rooms. If it must be done, then I'll do it myself.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Is this some trick?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: The wolf is of the north. She deserves better than a butcher.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: The butcher's boy... You rode him down?

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: He ran... Not very fast.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Get the girls settled in. I'll be back in time for supper. And, Jory, you go with them.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Thank the gods you're here, Stark. About time we had some stern northern leadership.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Glad to see you're protecting the throne.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Sturdy old thing. How many kings' asses have polished it, I wonder? What's the line? The King shits and the Hand wipes.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Very handsome armor. Not a scratch on it.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I know. People have been swinging at me for years, but they always seem to miss.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: You've chosen your opponents wisely then.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I have a knack for it. It must be strange for you coming into this room. I was standing right here when it happened. He was very brave, your brother. Your father too. They didn't deserve to die like that. Nobody deserves to die like that.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: But you just stood there and watched.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: 500 men just stood there and watched. All the great knights of the Seven Kingdoms. You think anyone said a word, lifted a finger? No, Lord Stark. 500 men and this room was silent as a crypt. Except for the screams, of course, and the Mad King laughing. And later... When I watched the Mad King die, I remembered him laughing as your father burned... It felt like justice.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Is that what you tell yourself at night? You're a servant of justice? That you were avenging my father when you shoved your sword in Aerys Targaryen's back?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Tell me... If I'd stabbed the Mad King in the belly instead of the back, would you admire me more?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: You served him well, when serving was safe.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Lord Stark.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Lord Varys.

Name: Varys
Sentence: I was grievously sorry to hear of your troubles on the Kingsroad. We are all praying for Prince Joffrey's full recovery.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: A shame you didn't say a prayer for the butcher's son. Renly! You're looking well.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: And you look tired from the road. I told them this meeting could wait another day, but...

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: But we have a Kingdom to look after. I've hoped to meet you for some time, Lord Stark. No doubt Lady Catelyn has mentioned me.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: She has, Lord Baelish. I understand you knew my brother Brandon as well.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: All too well. I still carry a token of his esteem from navel to collarbone.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Perhaps you chose the wrong man to duel with.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: It wasn't the man that I chose, my Lord. It was Catelyn Tully. A woman worth fighting for, I'm sure you'll agree.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Grand Maester.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: And you served another King.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Without the King?

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: Winter may be coming, but I'm afraid the same cannot be said for my brother.

Name: Varys
Sentence: His Grace has many cares. He entrusts some small matters to us that we might lighten the load.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: We are the lords of small matters here.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: My brother instructs us to stage a tournament in honor of Lord Stark's appointment as Hand of the King.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Mmm, how much?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: 40,000 gold dragons to the champion, 20,000 to the runner-up, 20,000 to the winning archer.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I'll have to borrow it. The Lannisters will accommodate, I expect. We already owe Lord Tywin 3 million gold. What's another 80,000?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Are you telling me the Crown is three million in debt?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I'm telling you the Crown is six million in debt.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: How could you let this happen?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: The Master of Coin finds the money. The King and the Hand spend it.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: I will not believe Jon Arryn allowed Robert to bankrupt the realm.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: Counting coppers," he calls it.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: I'll speak to him tomorrow. This tournament is an extravagance we cannot afford.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: As you will. But still, we'd best make our plans.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: There will be no plans until I speak to Robert. Forgive me, my Lords. I had a long ride.

Name: Varys
Sentence: You are the King's Hand, Lord Stark, we serve at your pleasure.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Please, it's nearly healed.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: A King should have scars, you fought off a direwolf. You're a warrior like your father.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: That's not true. You killed the beast. You only spared the girl because of the love your father bears her father. When Aerys Targaryen sat on the Iron Throne, your father was a rebel and a traitor. Someday you'll sit on the throne and the truth will be what you make it.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Yes. She's very beautiful and young. If you don't like her, you only need to see her on formal occasions and when the time comes, to make little princes and princesses. And if you'd rather fuck painted whores, you'll fuck painted whores. And if you'd rather lie with noble virgins, so be it. You are my darling boy and the world will be exactly as you want it to be. Do something nice for the Stark girl.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: No, but you will. The occasional kindness will spare you all sorts of trouble down the road.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: How would you handle them?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: A royal army?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: And if the northerners rebel?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: And these 10,000 northern troops, would they fight for you or their lord?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: But you've just invaded their homeland, asked them to kill their brothers.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: The North cannot be held... not by an outsider. It's too big and too wild. When the winter comes, the Seven gods together couldn't save you and your royal army. A good King knows when to save his strength... And when to destroy his enemies.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Everyone who isn't us is an enemy.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I'm practicing.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Practicing for what?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: The Prince.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: He's a liar and a coward and he killed my friend.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: The Hound killed your friend.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: The Hound does whatever the Prince tells him to do.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You're an idiot.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: You're a liar. And if you told the truth, Mycah would be alive.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: What's happening here?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Go to your room. We'll speak later. That's for you, love…

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: The same dollmaker makes all of Princess Myrcella's toys. Don't you like it?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I haven't played with dolls since I was eight. May I be excused?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: It's all right. Go on.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: War was easier than daughters.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Go away!

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Arya, open the door. May I come in? Whose sword is that?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Mine.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Give it to me. I know this maker's mark. This is Mikken's work. Where did you get this? This is no toy. Little ladies shouldn't play with swords.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I wasn't playing. And I don't want to be a lady.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Come here. Now what do you want with this?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: It's called Needle.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: A blade with a name. And who were you hoping to skewer with Needle? Your sister? Do you know the first thing about sword fighting?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Stick 'em with the pointy end.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: laughs] That's the essence of it.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I was trying to learn. I asked Mycah to practice with me. I asked him. It was my fault.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: No, sweet girl. You didn't kill the butcher's boy.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I hate them! I hate all of them. The Hound, the Queen and the King and Joffrey and Sansa.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Sansa was dragged before the King and Queen... And asked to call the Prince a liar.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: So was I! He is a liar.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Darling, listen to me. Sansa will be married to Joffrey someday. She cannot betray him. She must take his side even when he's wrong.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: But how you can let her marry someone like that?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Well… Look at me. You're a Stark of Winterfell. You know our words.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Winter is coming.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: You were born in the long summer. You've never known anything else. But now winter is truly coming. And in the winter, we must protect ourselves, look after one another. Sansa is your sister.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I don't hate her. Not really.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: I don't want to frighten you, but I won't lie to you either. We've come to a dangerous place. We cannot fight a war amongst ourselves. All right? Go on. It's yours.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I can keep it?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Try not to stab your sister with it. If you're going to own a sword, you'd better know how to use it.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I hate your stories.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Those weren't my favorites. My favorites were the scary ones.

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: What are you telling him now?

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: Get your supper. I want some time with him. One time she told me the sky is blue because we live inside the eye of a blue-eyed giant named Macumber.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Maybe we do.

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: How do you feel? You still don't remember anything? I've seen you climb a thousand times. In the wind, in the rain... A thousand times. You never fall.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I did though. It's true, isn't it... what Maester Luwin says about my legs? I'd rather be dead.

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: Don't ever say that.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I'd rather be dead.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: It's nine years since I've set foot in the capital. And no one knew who I was the last time I came either.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: I would. We've done nothing wrong.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: Instructed? I don't know who's providing your instructions, but...

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Cat! Go on. Go upstairs.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: You little worm! You take me for some back-alley Sally you can drag into a…

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I meant no disrespect to you of all people.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: How dare you bring me here! Have you lost your mind?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: No one will come looking for you here. Isn't that what like you wanted? I'm truly sorry... about the locale.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: How did you know I was coming to King's Landing?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: A dear friend told me.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Lady Stark.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: Lord Varys.

Name: Varys
Sentence: To see you again after so many years is a blessing. Your poor hands.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: How did you know I was coming?

Name: Varys
Sentence: Knowledge is my trade, my Lady. Did you bring the dagger with you, by any chance? My little birds are everywhere. Even in the north. They whisper to me the strangest stories. Valyrian steel.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: Do you know whose dagger this is?

Name: Varys
Sentence: I must admit I do not.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Well well, this is an historic day. Something you don't know that I do. There's only one dagger like this in all of the Seven Kingdoms. It's mine.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: Yours?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: At least it was, until the tournament on Prince Joffrey's last nameday. I bet on Ser Jaime in the jousting, as any sane man would. When the Knight of the Flowers unseated him, I lost this dagger.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: To whom?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Tyrion Lannister. The Imp.

Name: Alliser Thorne
Sentence: If that were a real sword, you'd be dead. Lord Snow here grew up in a castle spitting down on the likes of you. Pyp. Do you think Ned Stark's bastard bleeds like the rest of us?

Name: Alliser Thorne
Sentence: Next!

Name: Alliser Thorne
Sentence: Lord Snow, it appears you're the least useless person here. Go clean yourselves up. There's only so much I can stomach in a day.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: A charming man.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: And how's that going, Commander Mormont?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Good news or bad?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Good news? Perhaps you'd like to share it with your wife?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: My wife is in Winterfell.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Is she?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I thought that she'd be safest in here. One of several such establishments I own.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: You're a funny man. A very funny man.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: Ned! [poking her head out of a window]

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: The Starks... Quick tempers, slow minds.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: It's an improvement.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I'm looking at you. You've got an interesting face. Very distinctive faces. All of you.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: It's just I think they would look marvelous decorating spikes in King's Landing. Perhaps I'll write my sister, the Queen, about it.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Everybody knew what this place was and no one told me. No one but you. My father knew and left me to rot here at the Wall all the same.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Grenn's father left him too... Outside a farmhouse when he was three. Pyp was caught stealing a wheel of cheese. His little sister hadn't eaten in three days. He was given a choice

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: They hate me because I'm better than they are.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: It's a lucky thing none of them were trained by a master-at-arms like your Ser Rodrik. I don't imagine any of them have ever held a real sword before they came here. Your brother Bran. He's woken up.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: The mere suggestion that the Queen's brother tried to kill your boy would be considered treason.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: We have proof. We have the blade.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Which Lord Tyrion will say was stolen from him. The only man who could say otherwise has no throat, thanks to your boy's wolf.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: Petyr has promised to help us find the truth. He's like a little brother to me. He would never betray my trust.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I'll try to keep you alive, for her sake. A fool's task, admittedly, but I've never been able to refuse your wife anything.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: I won't forget this. You're a true friend.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Don't tell anyone. I have a reputation to maintain.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: How could you be so stupid?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Calm down.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: He's a child... 10 years old. What were you thinking?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I was thinking of us. You're a bit late to start complaining about it now. What has the boy told them?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Nothing. He's said nothing. He remembers nothing.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Then what are you raving about?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: What if it comes back to him? If he tells his father what he saw...

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: We'll say he was lying. We'll say he was dreaming. We'll say whatever we like. I think we can outfox a 10-year-old.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: And my husband?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I'll go to war with him if I have to. They can write a ballad about us

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Let me go.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Never.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: The boy won't talk. And if he does, I'll kill him. Him, Ned Stark, the King... the whole bloody lot of them, until you and I are the only people left in this world.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: I wish I could see the girls.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: It's too dangerous.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: Just for a moment.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Until we know who our enemies are...

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: I know they did it, Ned. The Lannisters. In my bones, I know it.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Littlefinger's right. I can't do anything without proof.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: And if you find the proof?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Then I bring it to Robert... And hope he's still the man I once knew. You watch yourself on the road, huh? That temper of yours is a dangerous thing.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: My temper? Gods be good, you nearly killed poor Littlefinger yesterday.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: He still loves you.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: Does he?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Off with you.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: It's been a long time. But I still remember every face. You remember your first?

Name: Barristan Selmy
Sentence: Of course, your Grace.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Who was it?

Name: Barristan Selmy
Sentence: A Tyroshi. Never learned the name.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: How'd you do it?

Name: Barristan Selmy
Sentence: Lance through the heart.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Quick one. Lucky for you. Mine was some Tarly boy at the Battle of Summerhall. My horse took an arrow so I was on foot, slogging through the mud. He came running at me, this dumb high-born lad, thinking he could end the rebellion with the single swing of his sword. I knocked him down with the hammer. Gods, I was strong then. Caved in his breastplate. Probably shattered every rib he had. Stood over him, hammer in the air. Right before I brought it down he shouted, "Wait! Wait!"... They never tell you how they all shit themselves. They don't put that part in the songs. Stupid boy. Now the Tarlys bend the knee like everyone else. He could have lingered on the edge of the battle with the smart boys and today his wife would be making him miserable, his sons would be ingrates, and he'd be waking three times in the night to piss into a bowl. Wine! Lancel. Gods, what a stupid name. Lancel Lannister. Who named you? Some halfwit with a stutter? What are you doing?

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: What do you mean it's empty?

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Is that what empty means?! So get more. Tell your cousin to get in here. Kingslayer! Get in here. Surrounded by Lannisters. Every time I close my eyes I see their blond hair and their smug, satisfied faces. It must wound your pride, huh? Standing out there like a glorified sentry. Jaime Lannister, son of the mighty Tywin... Forced to mind the door while your King eats and drinks and shits and fucks. So come on. We're telling war stories. Who was your first kill, not counting old men?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: One of the outlaws in the Brotherhood.

Name: Barristan Selmy
Sentence: I was there that day. You were only a squire, 16 years old.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You killed Simon Toyne with a counter riposte. Best move I ever saw.

Name: Barristan Selmy
Sentence: A good fighter, Toyne, but he lacked stamina.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Your outlaw... Any last words?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I cut his head off, so no.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: What about Aerys Targaryen? What did the Mad King say when you stabbed him in the back? I never asked. Did he call you a traitor? Did he plead for a reprieve?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: He said the same thing he'd been saying for hours... "Burn them all." If that's all, your Grace...

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: The Dothraki don't believe in money. Most of their slaves were given to them as gifts.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen

Sentence: If you rule a city and you see the horde approaching, you have two choices

Name: Daenerys Targaryen

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Not a Queen. A Khaleesi.

Name: Viserys Targaryen
Sentence: You dare! You give commands to me? To me? You do not command the dragon. I am Lord of the Seven Kingdoms. I don't take orders from savages or their sluts. Do you hear me?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: No!

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Please please, don't hurt him. Tell him I don't want my brother harmed.

Name: Viserys Targaryen
Sentence: Kill these Dothraki dogs! I am your King!

Name: Jorah Mormont

Sentence: I wanted to be here when you saw it for the first time. I'm leaving this morning.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You're leaving?

Sentence: I'm the First Ranger. My job is out there. There have been disturbing reports.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: What kind of reports?

Name: Benjen Stark
Sentence: The kind I don't want to believe.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: m ready. I won't let you down.

Name: Benjen Stark
Sentence: You're not going. You're no ranger, Jon.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: But I'm better than every...

Name: Benjen Stark

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You're joking?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: And how do a bear's balls taste?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Do Dornish girls count? So you roam the Seven Kingdoms, collaring pickpockets and horse thieves and bringing them here as eager recruits?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: They have a better chance finding feed than glory.

Name: Benjen Stark
Sentence: The Night's Watch is a joke to you, is it? Is that what we are, Lannister? An army of jesters in black?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You don't have enough men to be an army and aside from Yoren here, none of you are particularly funny.

Name: Benjen Stark
Sentence: I hope we've provided you with some good stories to tell when you're back in King's Landing. But something to think about while you're drinking your wine down there, enjoying your brothels... Half the boys you've seen training will die north of the Wall. Might be a wilding's axe that gets them, might be sickness, might just be the cold. They die in pain. And they do it so plump little lords like you can enjoy their summer afternoons in peace and comfort.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Do you think I'm plump? Listen, Benjen... May I call you Benjen?

Name: Benjen Stark
Sentence: Call me what you like.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I'm not sure what I've done to offend you. I have great admiration for the Night's Watch. I've great admiration for you as First Ranger.

Name: Benjen Stark
Sentence: You know, my brother once told me that nothing someone says before the word "but" really counts.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: But... I don't believe that giants and ghouls and White Walkers are lurking beyond the Wall. I believe that the only difference between us and the wildlings is that when the Wall went up, our ancestors happened to live on the right side of it.

Name: Benjen Stark
Sentence: You're right. The wildlings are no different from us. A little rougher maybe. But they're made of meat and bone. I know how to track them and I know how to kill them. It's not the wildlings giving me sleepless nights. You've never been north of the Wall, so don't tell me what's out there.

Name: Benjen Stark
Sentence: Enjoy the capital, brother.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I think he's starting to like me. "Going below"?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: So you're heading down to King's Landing too.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Let's share the road. I could use some decent company.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Not this time. We'll be staying at the finest castles and inns. No one turns away a Lannister.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: What are you doing?

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: For a man on horseback, the curved blade is a good thing, easier to handle. It's a good weapon for a Dothrakan. But a man in full plate... the arakh won't get through the steel. That's where the broadsword has the advantage. Designed for piercing plate.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: Armor.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: Slow.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: It's true, but it also keeps a man alive.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: I've heard that your father was a famous warrior.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: He still is. A man of great honor. And I betrayed him.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: I don't think she wants to eat dog.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: I'll have the boys butcher a goat for supper. I need to ride to Qohor.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: Don't worry. I'll catch you. The horde's easy to find.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Don't stand so still. It's harder to hit a moving target. Except for you. You move too much. I could just hold my sword out and let you do the work for me.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Eight... no, nine.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: They say the winter of my birth was three years long, Maester Aemon.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Yes, and the fishermen of Lannisport say they see mermaids.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: It's a boy.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I know.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I'm sorry to see you leave, Lannister.

Sentence: It's either me or this cold. And it doesn't appear to be going anywhere.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Will you stop at Winterfell on your way South?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I expect I will. Gods know there aren't many feather beds between here and King's Landing.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: If you see my brother Bran, tell him I miss him. Tell him I'd visit if I could.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Of course.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: He'll never walk again.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: If you're going to be a cripple, it's better to be a rich cripple. Take care, Snow.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Who are you?

Sentence: It's too heavy.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: What if I drop it?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I'm a girl.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: A needle.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: We have visitors.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I don't want to see anyone.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: Really? If I was cooped up all day with no one but this old bat for company, I'd go mad. Anyway, you don't have a choice. Robb's waiting.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I don't want to go.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: Neither do I. But Robb's Lord of Winterfell, which means I do what he says and you do what I say. Hodor! Help Bran down the hall.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I must say I received a slightly warmer welcome on my last visit.

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: Any man of the Night's Watch is welcome at Winterfell.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Any man of the Night's Watch, but not I, eh, boy?

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: I'm not your boy, Lannister. I'm Lord of Winterfell while my father is away.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Then you might learn a lordo s courtesy.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: So it's true. Hello Bran. Do you remember anything about what happened?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Curious.

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: Why are you here?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Would your charming companion be so kind as to kneel? My neck is beginning to hurt.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Kneel, Hodor.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Do you like to ride, Bran?

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Yes. Well, I mean I did like to.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: What of it? With the right horse and saddle, even a cripple can ride.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I'm not a cripple.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Then I'm not a dwarf. My father will rejoice to hear it. I have a gift for you. Give that to your saddler. He'll provide the rest. You must shape the horse to the rider. Start with a yearling and teach it to respond to the reins and to the boy's voice.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Will I really be able to ride?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You will. On horseback you will be as tall as any of them.

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: Is this some kind of trick? Why do you want to help him?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I have a tender spot in my heart for cripples, bastards and broken things.

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: You've done my brother a kindness. The hospitality of Winterfell is yours.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Spare me your false courtesies, Lord Stark. There's a brothel outside your walls. There I'll find a bed and both of us can sleep easier.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: Couldn't resist some northern ass? If you like redheads, ask for Ros.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Come to see me off, Greyjoy? Kind of you. Your master doesn't seem to like Lannisters.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: He's not my master.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: No, of course not. What happened here? Where is lady Stark? Why didn't she receive me?

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: She wasn't feeling well.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: She's not in Winterfell, is she? Where did she go?

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: My lady's whereabouts...

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: My lady? Your loyalty to your captors is touching. Tell me, how do you think Balon Greyjoy would feel if he could see his only surviving son has turned lackey? I still remember seeing my father's fleet burn in Lannisport. I believe your uncles were responsible?

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: Must have been a pretty sight.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Nothing prettier than watching sailors burn alive. Yes, a great victory for your people. Shame how it all turned out.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: We were outnumbered 10 to one.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: A stupid rebellion then. I suppose your father realized that when your brothers died in battle. Now here you are, your enemy's squire.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: Careful, Imp.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I've offended you. Forgive me, it's been a rough morning. Anyway, don't despair. I'm a constant disappointment to my own father and I've learned to live with it. Your next tumble with Ros is on me. I'll try not to wear her out.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Leg, shoulder, leg. Left foot forward. Good. Now pivot as you deliver the stroke. Put all your weight behind it.

Name: Alliser Thorne
Sentence: Tell them your name.

Name: Alliser Thorne
Sentence: Well, you couldn't be any worse than you look. See what he can do.

Name: Alliser Thorne
Sentence: On your feet. Pick up your sword. Hit him till he finds his feet. It seems they've run short of poachers and thieves down south. Now they send us squealing bloody pigs. Again, harder.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Enough! He yielded.

Name: Alliser Thorne
Sentence: Looks like the bastardo s in love. All right then, lord Snow, you wish to defend your lady love, let's make it an exercise. You two. Three of you ought to be sufficient to make lady piggy squeal. All you've got to do is get past the bastard.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Are you sure you want to do this?

Name: Alliser Thorne
Sentence: We're done for today. Go clean the armory. That's all you're good for.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I've had worse.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: It's not going to get any easier, you know? You'll have to defend yourself.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: The Wall's no place for cowards.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: Vaes Dothrak. The city of the horselords.

Name: Viserys Targaryen
Sentence: A pile of mud. Mud and shit and twigs - best these savages can do.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: These are my people now. You shouldn't call them savages.

Name: Viserys Targaryen
Sentence: I'll call them what I like, because they're my people. This is my army. Khal Drogo is marching the wrong way with my army.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: If my brother was given an army of Dothraki, could you conquer the Seven Kingdoms?

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: The Dothraki have never crossed the Narrow Sea. They fear any water their horses can't drink.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: But if they did?

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: King Robert is fool enough to meet them in open battle, but the men advising him are different.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And you know these men?

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: I fought beside them once, long ago. Now Ned Stark wants my head. He drove me from my land.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You sold slaves.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: Aye.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Why?

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: I had no money and an expensive wife.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And where is she now?

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: In another place, with another man.

Name: Viserys Targaryen
Sentence: Yes, my dear?

Name: Viserys Targaryen
Sentence: They do.

Name: Viserys Targaryen
Sentence: It's entirely possible.

Name: Viserys Targaryen
Sentence: The brave men didn't kill dragons. The brave men rode them. Rode them from Valyria to build the greatest civilization this world has ever seen. The breath of the greatest dragon forged the Iron Throne, which the Usurper is keeping warm for me. The swords of the vanquished, a thousand of them... melted together like so many candles.

Name: Viserys Targaryen
Sentence: Really? Why dragons?

Name: Viserys Targaryen
Sentence: Well, after 15 years in a pleasure house, I imagine just seeing the sky makes you happy.

Name: Viserys Targaryen
Sentence: What have you seen?

Name: Viserys Targaryen
Sentence: A pirate ship?

Name: Viserys Targaryen
Sentence: No, the last one died many years before I was born. I'll tell you what I have seen

Name: Viserys Targaryen
Sentence: I don't know. The Usurper had them smashed to powder, I expect. Scattered to the wind.

Name: Viserys Targaryen
Sentence: Yes, it is. What did I buy you for? To make me sad?

Name: Viserys Targaryen
Sentence: To teach my sister how to be a better lover? You think I bought you to make Khal Drogo happy? You pretty little idiot. Go on then. Get on with it.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: What if I have a girl?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: What if I only have girls?

Sentence: Jeyne Poole's mother had five children, all of them girls.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: But what if?

Sentence: And everyone would hate me.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Joffrey does.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Please shut up about it.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Aegon the Conqueror.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Maegor the Cruel.

Sentence: I don't want to speak to my father, ever.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Dreadful.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: If you can't keep the King's peace, perhaps the City Watch should be commanded by someone who can.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: You'll get 50. Lord Baelish will see it paid for.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I will?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: You found money for a champion's purse, you can find money to keep the peace. I'll also give you 20 of my household guards till the crowds have left.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: The sooner this is over, the better.

Name: Varys
Sentence: The realm prospers from such events, my Lord. They give the great a chance at glory, and the lowly a respite from their woes.

Sentence: And every inn in the city is full and the whores are walking bow-legged.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: I'm sure the tourney puts coins in many a pocket. Now... If there's nothing else, my Lords?

Sentence: I've been hoping to talk to you about Jon Arryn.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Why?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: What did Jon want the night before he died?

The Wildlings who fight for Mance Rayder are hard men. Harder than you'll ever be. They know their country better than we do. They knew there was a storm coming in. So they hid in their caves and waited for it to pass. And we got caught in the open. Wind so strong it yanked 100-foot trees straight from the ground, roots and all. If you took your gloves off to find your cock to have a piss, you lost a finger to the frost. And all in darkness. You don't know cold. Neither of you do. The horses died first. We didn't have enough to feed them, to keep them warm. Eating the horses was easy. But later when we started to fall... That wasn't easy. We should have had a couple of boys like you along, shouldn't we? Soft, fat boys like you. We'd have lasted a fortnight on you and still had bones leftover for soup. Sentence: A blessing then. I suffered an early mutilation myself. Some doors close forever... others open in the most unexpected places. May I?

Name: Varys
Sentence: If the wrong ears heard what I'm about to tell you, off comes my head. And who would mourn poor Varys then? North or South, they sing no songs for spiders. But there are things you must know. You are the King's Hand and the King is a fool... your friend, I know, but a fool... and doomed unless you save him.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: I've been in the capital a month. Why have you waited so long to tell me this?

Name: Varys
Sentence: I didn't trust you.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: So why do you trust me now?

Name: Varys
Sentence: The Queen is not the only one who has been watching you closely. There are few men of honor in the capital. You are one of them. I would like to believe I am another, strange as that may seem.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: What sort of doom does the King face?

Name: Varys
Sentence: The same sort as Jon Arryn. The tears of Lys, they call it. A rare and costly thing, as clear and tasteless as water. It leaves no trace.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Who gave it to him?

Name: Varys
Sentence: Some dear friend, no doubt. But which one? There were many. Lord Arryn was a kind and trusting man. There was one boy... all he was he owed to Jon Arryn.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: The squire, Ser Hugh?

Name: Varys
Sentence: Pity what happened to him, just when his life seemed to be going so nicely.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: If Ser Hugh poisoned him, who paid Ser Hugh?

Name: Varys
Sentence: Someone who could afford it.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Jon was a man of peace. He was Hand for 17 years -- 17 good years. Why kill him?

Name: Varys
Sentence: He started asking questions.

Name: Varys
Sentence: He's found one bastard already. He has the book. The rest will come.

Name: Varys
Sentence: The gods alone know. The fools tried to kill his son. What's worse, they botched it. The wolf and the lion will be at each other's throats. We will be at war soon, my friend.

Name: Varys
Sentence: This Hand is not the other.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Delay," you say. "Move fast, " I reply. This is no longer a game for two players.

Name: Varys
Sentence: The first to arrive and the last to leave. I admire your industry.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: You do move quietly.

Name: Varys
Sentence: We all have our qualities.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: You look a bit lonely today. You should pay a visit to my brothel this evening. First boy is on the house.

Name: Varys
Sentence: I think you're mistaking business with pleasure.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Am I? All those birds that whisper in your ear, such pretty little things. Trust me, we accommodate all inclinations.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Oh, I'm sure. Lord Redwyne likes his boys very young, I hear.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I'm a purveyor of beauty and discretion, both equally important.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Though I suppose beauty is a subjective quality, no? Is it true that Ser Marlon of Tumblestone prefers amputees?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: All desires are valid to a man with a full purse.

Name: Varys
Sentence: And I heard the most awful rumor about a certain lord with a taste for fresh cadavers. Must be enormously difficult to accommodate that inclination. The logistics alone... to find beautiful corpses before they rot.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Strictly speaking, such a thing would not be in accordance with the King's laws.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Strictly speaking.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Tell me. Does someone, somewhere, keep your balls in a little box? I've often wondered.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Do you know, I have no idea where they are? And we had been so close. But enough about me. How have you been since we last saw each other?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Since you last saw me or since I last saw you?

Name: Varys
Sentence: Now the last time I saw you, you were talking to the Hand of the King.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Saw me with your own eyes?

Name: Varys
Sentence: Eyes I own.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Council business. We all have so much to discuss with Ned Stark.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Everyone's well aware of your enduring fondness for Lord Stark's wife. If the Lannisters were behind the attempt on the Stark boy's life and it was discovered that you helped the Starks come to that conclusion... To think... A simple word to the Queen...

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: One shudders at the thought.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Oh.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: But you know something? I do believe that I have seen you even more recently than you have seen me.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Have you?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Yes. Earlier today, I distinctly recall seeing you talking to Lord Stark in his chambers.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Was that you under the bed?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: And not long after that when I saw you escorting a certain foreign dignitary... Council business? Of course you would have friends from across The Narrow Sea. You're from there yourself, after all. We're friends, aren't we, Lord Varys? I'd like to think we are. So you can imagine my burden, wondering if the King might question my friendo s sympathies… To stand at a crossroads where turning left means loyalty to a friend, turning right, loyalty to the realm.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Oh, please.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: To find myself in a position where a simple word to the King --

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: What are you two conspiring about? Well, whatever it is, you'd best hurry up. My brother is coming.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: To a small council meeting?

Name: Varys
Sentence: Disturbing news from far away. Haven't you heard?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I'm not a beggar. I live here.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I want to see my father.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: My father is Hand of the King! I'm not a boy. I'm Arya Stark of Winterfell and if you lay a hand on me, my father will have both your heads on spikes! Now are you going to let me by or do I need to smack you on the ear to help with your hearing?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: You know I had half my guard out searching for you? You promised me this would stop.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: They said they were going to kill you.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Who did?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I didn't see them, but I think one was fat.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Oh, Arya.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I'm not lying! They said you found the bastard and the wolves are fighting the lions and the savage... something about the savage.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Where did you hear this?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: In the dungeons, near the dragon skulls.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: What were you doing in the dungeons?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Chasing a cat.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Your name, friend?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I'm a girl!

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Did Benjen send you?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Ah, we'll find recruits for you.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Know what?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Go on. We'll talk more later.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Jory, take her safely to her room.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: How many guards does my father have?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: You wouldn't let anyone kill him, would you?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Well?

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: To whom do I speak?

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: There was no time to send word.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: That's why there was no time. He is my prisoner.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: My sister will decide what he looks like.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: The Eyrie. They say it's impregnable.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I like you.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: I need to see the King first -- alone.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Is it about my wife?

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: The whore is pregnant.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: You're speaking of murdering a child.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: I warned you this would happen. Back in the North, I warned you, but you didn't care to hear. Well, hear it now. I want 'em dead, mother and child both. And that fool, Viserys as well. Is that plain enough for you? I want them both dead.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: You will dishonor yourself forever if you do this.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Honor?! I've got Seven Kingdoms to rule! One King, Seven Kingdoms. Do you think honor keeps them in line? Do you think it's honor that's keeping the peace? It's fear! Fear and blood!

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Then we're no better than the Mad King.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Careful, Ned. Careful now.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: You want to assassinate a girl... Because the Spider heard a rumor?

Name: Varys
Sentence: No rumor, my Lord. The princess is with child.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Based on whose information?

Name: Varys
Sentence: Ser Jorah Mormont. He is serving as adviser to the Targaryens.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Mormont? You bring us the whispers of a traitor half a world away and call it fact?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Jorah Mormont's a slaver, not a traitor. Small difference, I know, to an honorable man.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: He broke the law, betrayed his family, fled our land. We commit murder on the word of this man?

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: And if he's right? If she has a son? A Targaryen at the head of a Dothraki army… What then?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: The Narrow Sea still lies between us. I'll fear the Dothraki the day they teach their horses to run on water.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Do nothing? That's your wise advice? Do nothing til our enemies are on our shores? You're my council? Counsel! Speak sense to this honorable fool.

Name: Varys
Sentence: I understand your misgivings, my Lord. Truly, I do. It is a terrible thing we must consider, a vile thing. Yet, we who presume to rule must sometimes do vile things for the good of the realm. Should the gods grant Daenerys a son, the realm will bleed.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: We should have had them both killed years ago.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: When you find yourself in bed with an ugly woman, best close your eyes, get it over with. Cut her throat. Be done with it.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: I followed you into war - twice, without doubts, without second thoughts. But I will not follow you now. The Robert I grew up with didn't tremble at the shadow of an unborn child.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: She dies.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: I will have no part in it.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: You're the King's Hand, Lord Stark. You'll do as I command or I'll find me a Hand who will.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: And good luck to him. I thought you were a better man.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Out! Out, damn you! I'm done with you. Go! Run back to Winterfell! I'll have your head on a spike! I'll put it there myself, you fool! You think you're too good for this? Too proud and honorable? This is a war!

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: I'll go ahead with my daughters. Get them ready. Do it yourself. Don't ask anyone for help.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: His Grace went on about you at some length after you took your leave. The word "treason" was mentioned.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: What can I do for you?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: When do you return to Winterfell?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Why? What do you care?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: If you're still here come nightfall, I'll take you to see the last person Jon Arryn spoke with before falling ill. If that sort of thing still interests you.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: I don't have the time.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: It won't take more than an hour. But as you please.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Round up all the men we have and station them outside the girls' chambers. Who are your best two swords?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Find them and meet me at the stables.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: Lysa, you wrote me about the Lannisters, warning me t-

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Oh? Did I kill him too? I've been a very busy man.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: If any harm comes to me, my brother, Jaime, will see that they do.

Name: Catelyn Stark
Sentence: This man is my prisoner. I will not have him harmed.

Name: Loras Tyrell
Sentence: Lord Stark's lucky he still has a head.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: Robert will rant for a few days, but he won't do anything. He adores the man.

Name: Loras Tyrell
Sentence: You're jealous.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: Are you sure this won't hurt?

Name: Loras Tyrell
Sentence: Only if I slip.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: And you prefer me like this?

Name: Loras Tyrell
Sentence: Mhmm.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: If you want hairless, maybe you should find a little boy.

Name: Loras Tyrell
Sentence: I want you.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: My brother thinks that anyone who hasn't been to war isn't a man. He treats me as if I'm a spoiled child. Oh, and you're not? Loras Tyrell, the Knight of the Flowers? How many wars have you fought in? Oh, and how much did your father spend on that armor of yours?

Name: Loras Tyrell
Sentence: Hold still.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: All I ever hear from Robert and Stannis is how I'm not tough enough, how I squirm at the sight of blood.

Name: Loras Tyrell
Sentence: You did vomit when that boy's eye was knocked out in the mêlée.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: His eye was dangling out of the damn socket!

Name: Loras Tyrell
Sentence: He shouldn't have entered the mêlée if he didn't know how to fight.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: Easy for you to say. Not everyone is such a gifted swordsman.

Name: Loras Tyrell
Sentence: It's not a gift. No one gave it to me. I'm good because I work at it -- every day of my life since I could hold a stick.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: I could work at fighting all day, every day, and still never be as good as you.

Name: Loras Tyrell
Sentence: Yes well, I guess we'll never know.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: Everywhere?

Name: Loras Tyrell
Sentence: Everywhere. So how did it end up? The Targaryen girl will die?

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: It needs to be done, unpleasant as it is. Robert's rather tasteless about it. Every time he talks about killing her, I swear the table rises six inches.

Name: Loras Tyrell
Sentence: It's a shame he can't muster the same enthusiasm for his wife.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: He does have a deep, abiding lust for her money. You have to give it to the Lannisters, they may be the most pompous, ponderous cunts the gods ever suffered to walk the world, but they do have outrageous amounts of money.

Name: Loras Tyrell
Sentence: I have an outrageous amount of money.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: Not as much as the Lannisters.

Name: Loras Tyrell
Sentence: But a lot more than you.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: Robert's threatening to take me hunting with him. Last time we were out there for two weeks, tramping through the trees in the rain, day after day. All so he can stick his spear into something's flesh! Oh. but Robert loves his killing. And he's the King.

Name: Loras Tyrell
Sentence: Hmm... How did that ever happen?

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: Because he loves his killing and he used to be good at it.

Name: Loras Tyrell
Sentence: Do you know who should be King?

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: Be serious.

Name: Loras Tyrell
Sentence: I am. My father could be your bank. I've never fought in a war before, but I'd fight for you.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: I'm fourth in line.

Name: Loras Tyrell
Sentence: And where was Robert in the line of royal succession? Joffrey is a monster. Tommen is eight.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: Stannis?

Name: Loras Tyrell
Sentence: Stannis has the personality of a lobster.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: He's still my older brother.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: What are you doing?!

Name: Loras Tyrell
Sentence: Look at it.

Name: Renly Baratheon
Sentence: You cut me!

Name: Loras Tyrell
Sentence: It's just blood. We've all got it in us. Sometimes a little spills. If you become King, you're going to see a lot of this. You need to get used to it. Go on. Look. People love you. They love to serve you because you're kind to them. They want to be near you.

Name: Loras Tyrell
Sentence: You're willing to do what needs to be done, but you don't gloat over it. You don't love killing. Where is it written that power is the sole province of the worst? That thrones are only made for the hated and the feared. You would be a wonderful King.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I'm sorry your marriage to Ned Stark didn't work out. You seemed so good together.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: I'm glad I could do something to make you happy.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Without a Hand, everything will fall to pieces.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: I suppose this is where you tell me to give the job to your brother Jaime.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: No. He's not serious enough. I'll say this for Ned Stark - he's serious enough. Was it really worth it? Losing him this way?

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: I don't know. But I do know this, if the Targaryen girl convinces her horse-lord husband to invade and the Dothraki horde crosses The Narrow Sea... We won't be able to stop them.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: The Dothraki don't sail. Every child knows that. They don't have discipline. They don't have armor. They don't have siege weapons.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: It's a neat little trick you do, you move your lips and your father's voice comes out.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Is my father wrong?

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Let's say Viserys Targaryen lands with forty thousand Dothraki screamers at his back. We hole up in our castles, a wise move. Only a fool would meet the Dothraki in an open field. They leave us in our castles. They go from town to town, looting and burning, killing every man who can't hide behind a stone wall, stealing all our crops and livestock, enslaving all our women and children. How long do the people of the Seven Kingdoms stand behind their absentee King, their cowardly King hiding behind high walls? When do the people decide that Viserys Targaryen is the rightful monarch after all.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: We still outnumber them.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Which is the bigger number -- five or one?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Five.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Five... one. One army, a real army, united behind one leader with one purpose. Our purpose died with the Mad King. Now we've got as many armies as there are men with gold in their purse. And everybody wants something different. Your father wants to own the world. Ned Stark wants to run away and bury his head in the snow.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: What do you want?

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: We haven't had a real fight in nine years. Back-stabbing doesn't prepare you for a fight. And that's all the realm is now, back-stabbing and scheming and arse-licking and money-grubbing. Sometimes I don't know what holds it together.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Our marriage.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Ah, so here we sit, seventeen years later, holding it all together. Don't you get tired?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Every day.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: How long can hate hold a thing together?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Well, seventeen years is quite a long time.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Yes, it is.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Yes, it tis. What was she like?

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: You've never asked about her, not once. Why not?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: At first, just saying her name, even in private felt like I was breathing life back into her. I thought if I didn't talk about her, she'd just fade away for you. When I realized that wasn't going to happen, I refused to ask out of spite. I didn't want to give you the satisfaction of thinking I cared enough to ask. And eventually it became clear that my spite didn't mean anything to you, as far as I could tell, you actually enjoyed it.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: So why now?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: What harm could Lyanna Stark's ghost do to either of us that we haven't done to each other a hundred times over?

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: You want to know the horrible truth? I can't even remember what she looked like. I only know she was the one thing I ever wanted... Someone took her away from me, and Seven Kingdoms couldn't fill the hole she left behind.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I felt something for you once, you know?

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: I know.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Even after we lost our first boy -- for quite a while, actually. Was it ever possible for us? Was there ever a time, ever a... moment?

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: No. Does that make you feel better or worse?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: It doesn't make me feel anything.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: I will.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: When Jon Arryn came to visit you, what did he want?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: She looks healthy enough to me. The girl shall want for nothing.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Brothels make a much better investment than ship, I've found. Whores rarely sink.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: What do you know of King Robert's bastards?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Well, he has more than you, for a start.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: How many?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Does it matter? If you fuck enough women, some of them will give you presents.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: And Jon Arryn tracked them all down. Why?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: He was the King's Hand. Perhaps Robert wanted them looked after. He was overcome with fatherly love.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Come.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Jory!

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Such a small pack of wolves.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Was!... the Hand of the King. Now I'm not sure what he is... Lord of somewhere very far away.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: What's the meaning of this, Lannister?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Get back inside where it's safe. I'm looking for my brother. You remember my brother, don't you, Lord Stark? Blond hair, sharp tongue, short man.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: I remember him well.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: It seems he had some trouble on the road. You wouldn't know what happened to him, would you?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: He was taken at my command to answer for his crimes.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: My Lords! I'll bring the City Watch!

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Come, Stark. I'd rather you die sword in hand.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Threaten? As in, "I'm going to open your Lord from balls to brains and see what Starks are made of”?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: You kill me, your brother's a dead man.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You're right. Take him alive! Kill his men!

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: My brother, Lord Stark... We want him back.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Your pardon, your Grace.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Do you know what your wife has done?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: She did nothing I did not command.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Who'd have thought she had it in her?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: By what right dare you lay hands on my blood?

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: I am the King's Hand -

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You were the King's Hand!

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: trying to keep the peace -

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You shall now be held accountable.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Oh, will both of you shut your mouths? Catelyn will release Tyrion and you'll make your peace with Jaime.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: He butchered my men.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Lord Stark was returning drunk from a brothel when his men attacked Jaime.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Quiet, woman.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Jaime has fled the city. Give me leave to bring him back to justice.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I took you for a king.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Hold your tongue.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: He's attacked my brother and abducted the other. I should wear the armor and you the gown.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I shall wear this like a badge of honor.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Wear it in silence or I'll honor you again.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: See what she does to me? My loving wife. I should not have hit her. That was not… That was not kingly.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: If we don't act… there will be a war.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: So tell your wife to return that little shit of an Imp to King's Landing. She's had her fun, now put an end to it. You hear me? Send a raven and put an end to it.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: And what about Jaime Lannister? What about Jaime?

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: I'm half a kingdom in debt to his bloody father. I don't know what happened between you and those yellow-haired shits. I don't want to know. This is what matters - I can't rule the kingdoms if the Starks and the Lannisters are at each other's throats, so enough!

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: As you command your Grace. With your leave, I will return to Winterfell and set matters straight.

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Piss on that! Send a raven. I want you to stay. I'm the king, I get what I want… I never loved my brothers. A sad thing for a man to admit, but it's true. You were the brother I chose. We'll talk when I return from the hunt.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: The hunt?

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Killing things clears my head. You'll have to sit on the throne while I'm away. You'll hate it more than I do.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: The Targaryen girl -

Name: Robert Baratheon
Sentence: Seven hells! Don't start with her again! The girl will die and I'll hear no more of it. Put on the badge. And if you ever take it off again, I swear to the Mother I'll pin the damn thing on Jaime Lannister.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You're hurt.

Name: Robb Stark
Sentence: Not too fast.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Come on, Dancer.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
