Sentence: Ser Loras, it's quite all right. Your sister looks very beautiful.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: So, looking forward to your wedding?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Our fathers are both rather keen on the prospect.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Perhaps they should get married. If you were to marry Cersei, she'd murder you in your sleep. If you somehow managed to put a child in her first, she'd murder him, too, long before he drew his first breath. Luckily for you, none of this will happen because you'll never marry her.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Lady Brienne. So good of you to come.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Did you just bow?

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: That's not true, my love. Brienne had nothing to do with it.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Thank you. I hope we see more of you.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Lady Brienne. You're Lord Selwyn Tarth's daughter. That makes you a lady whether you want to be or not.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I owe you my gratitude. You returned my brother safely to King's Landing.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Did he? Haven't heard that story before.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I'm sure you have many fascinating stories. Sworn to Renly Baratheon. Sworn to Catelyn Stark. And now my brother. Must be exciting to flit from one camp to the next serving whichever lord or lady you fancy.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: But you love him.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: She'll do no such thing.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You should see Qyburn. He's quite good.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: More repugnant than your gnarled fingers on that girl's thighs?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: My little brother had you sent to the Black Cells when you annoyed him. What do you think I could do to you if you annoyed me?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: But you are. You annoy me right now. Every breath you draw in my presence annoys me. So here's what I want you to do. I want you to leave my presence. Leave this wedding right now. Go to the kitchens and instruct them that all the leftovers from the feast will be brought to the kennels.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: The queen is telling you the leftovers will feed the dogs or you will.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: You're in rather a good mood.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I suppose I am.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: I won't ask why.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Small pleasures.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Your Grace. Lord Tywin.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Prince Oberyn.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: I don't believe you have met Ellaria. This is the Lord Hand Tywin Lannister and Cersei Lannister, the Queen Regent. I suppose it is former Queen Regent now. Lord Hand and Lady Cersei, Ellaria Sand.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Charmed.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Can't say I've ever met a Sand before.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Bastards are born of passion, aren't they? We don't despise them in Dorne.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: No? How tolerant of you.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: I expect it is a relief, Lady Cersei, giving up your regal responsibilities. Wearing the crown for so many years must have left your neck a bit crooked.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I suppose you'll never know, Prince Oberyn. It's a shame your older brother couldn't attend the wedding.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Please give him our regards. With any luck, the gout will abate with time and he will be able to walk again.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: They call it the rich man's disease. A wonder you don't have it.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Noblemen in my part of the country don't enjoy the same lifestyle as our counterparts in Dorne.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: People everywhere have their differences. In some places, the highborn frown upon those of low birth. In other places, the rape and murder of women and children is considered distasteful. What a fortunate thing for you, former Queen Regent, that your daughter Myrcella has been sent to live in the latter sort of place.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Pay each of them 20 gold when this is done.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: We'll have to find another way to thank the king.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: One taste of combat was enough for me, Your Grace. I would like to keep what remains of my face. I think you should fight him. This was but a poor imitation of your own bravery on the field of battle. I speak as a firsthand witness. Climb down from the high table with your new Valyrian sword and show everyone how a true king wins his throne. Be careful, though. This one is clearly mad with lust. It would be a tragedy for the king to lose his virtue hours before his wedding night.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: A fine vintage. Shame that it spilled.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: My love, come back to me. It's time for my father's toast.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Your Grace does me a great honor.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Look, the pie.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Wonderful. Wonderful. My hero.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Can we leave now?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Let's find out.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I thought I might change out of these wet clothes, Your Grace.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: If it please Your Grace, Lady Sansa is very tired.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Your Grace?

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: He's choking!

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: Help the poor boy.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: Idiots, help your king.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Move away!

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Joffrey! Joffrey!

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Help him! Someone help him!

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Joffrey!

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Joffrey! Joffrey!

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Don't touch him!

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Joffrey. Please, Joffrey. Joffrey, what is it? Help him!

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: My son.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: He did this. He poisoned my son, your king. Take him. Take him! Take him! Take him!

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You did this. You did this!

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Take him! Take him!

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Where is his wife? Where's Sansa?

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Find her. Bar the gates of the city. Seize every ship in the harbor.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Where is she?!

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: No one leaves the capital! No one!

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Where are we going?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Lord Baelish?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Petyr... Are you hurt, my lady?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Good. Good. I'm sure you've had quite a fright. Rest easy. The worst is past. Ser Dontos shouts up from his boat.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Softly, my friend... Voices carry over water.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Shh. You don't want the queen to hear, do you? 1,000 gold cloaks are searching for you. And if they found you, how do you think they would punish the girl who murdered the king?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I didn't murder anyone.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I know. I know. But you must admit it looks suspicious. The king who executed your father, who tormented you for years, and you fled the scene of his murder.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Why did you kill him?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Because he was a drunk and a fool and I don't trust drunk fools.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: He saved me.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Saved you? My lady, he followed my orders. Every one of them. And he did it all for gold. Money buys a man's silence for a time. A bolt in the heart buys it forever.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: He was helping me because I saved his life.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Yes, and he gave you a priceless necklace that once belonged to his grandmother. The last legacy of House Hollard.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I had it made a few weeks ago. What did I once tell you about the capital?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: We're all liars here.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Come, my lady. I know you've had a difficult day. But you're safe now. I promise you that. You're safe with me and sailing home.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: So am I the queen?

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: More than you were with Renly. Less than you would have been if Joffrey had done you the courtesy of consummating the marriage before dying. In any case, this would not be an opportune moment to press the issue.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Clawing at his own throat, looking to his mother to make stop... it was horrible.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: The world is overflowing with horrible things. But they're all a tray of cakes next to death. They brought me your grandfather's body when he died, you know? Made me look at it.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: What was it like?

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: They took me to the Great Hall and there he was. The man I'd married and suffered to father my children. A great doughy lump I'd sat next to at endless dinners and tedious gatherings. There he was... lying on a table.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: One of my husbands preferred the company of men and was stabbed through the heart. Another was happiest torturing animals and was poisoned at our wedding feast... I must be cursed.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: Nonsense. Your circumstances have improved markedly. You may not have enjoyed watching him die, but you enjoyed it more than you would have enjoyed being married to him, I can promise you that.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: But I would have been the queen.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: Our alliance with the Lannisters remains every bit as necessary to them as it is unpleasant for us. You did wonderful work on Joffrey. The next one should be easier.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Your brother is dead. Do you know what that means?

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: I'm not trying to trick you.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Yes, you will become king. What kind of king do you think you'll be?

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Mm, I think so as well. You've got the right temperament for it. But what makes a good king? Hmm? What is a good king's single most important quality?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: This is hardly the place or the time.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Hmm. Baelor the Blessed was holy. And pious. He built this sept. He also named a six-year-old boy high septon because he thought the boy could work miracles. He ended up fasting himself into an early grave because food was of this world and this world was sinful.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Yeah. A good king must be just. Orys I was just. Everyone applauded his reforms. Nobles and commoners alike. But he wasn't just for long. He was murdered in his sleep after less than a year by his own brother. Was that truly just of him? To abandon his subjects to an evil that he was too gullible to recognize?

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: No.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Yes. Strength. King Robert was strong. He won the rebellion and crushed the Targaryen dynasty. And he attended three small council meetings in 17 years. He spent his time whoring and hunting and drinking until the last two killed him. So, we have a man who starves himself to death, a man who lets his own brother murder him, and a man who thinks that winning and ruling are the same thing. What do they all lack?

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Yes!

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Yes. But what is wisdom? Hmm? A house with great wealth and fertile lands asks you for your protection against another house with a strong Navy that could one day oppose you. How do you know which choice is wise and which isn't? You've any experience of treasuries and granaries or shipyards and soldiers?

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: No. Of course not. A wise king knows what he knows and what he doesn't. You're young. A wise young king listens to his counselors and heeds their advice until he comes of age. And the wisest kings continue to listen to them long afterwards... Your brother was not a wise king. Your brother was not a good king. If he had been, perhaps he'd still be alive. Now, as the king, you will have to marry. Do you understand why?

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Yes, but why? To further the family line. Do you know how that happens?

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Yes, but has anyone explained the details to you?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: How are you?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You are. You will be. I'll see to that.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Please give the queen a moment alone with her son.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: It was Tyrion. He killed him. He told me he would. "A day will come when you think you are safe and happy and your joy will turn to ashes in your mouth." That's what he said to me. You saw it. You saw Joff point at him just before he...

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I don't know what I saw.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Avenge him. Avenge our son. Kill Tyrion.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Tyrion's my brother. Our brother. There'll be a trial. We'll get to the truth of what happened.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I don't want a trial. He'll squirm his way to freedom given the chance. I want him dead. Please, Jaime. You have to. He was our son. Our baby boy.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You're a hateful woman. Why have the gods made me love a hateful woman?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Jaime, not here, please. Please.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Stop it. Stop it. Stop.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: No.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Stop it. Stop.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Stop. Stop. It's not right.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: It's not right. It's not right.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I don't care.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Don't.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Don't. Jaime, don't.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Gonna rain soon. Where are we?

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Near Fairmarket, I think.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: You think? You don't have a map?

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: No, I don't have a map.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Maybe we should get one.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Just point out the next map shop you see and I'll buy you one.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: How far is it to the Eyrie?

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Far.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: And you're sure we're going the right way?

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Believe me, girl, I want you there as soon as I can. Get my gold, be on my way.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: On your way where?

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Why do you care? Might book passage across the Narrow Sea. Fight as a sellsword. Second Sons, could be. Seems like a good fit for me.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I'd like to see Braavos one day.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Why Braavos?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I have friends there.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: I doubt it.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: What do you want?

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: If I'm standing on it, it's my land.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: We were just watering the horses. We'll be on our way. Forgive my father. He was wounded fighting in the war. Our cottage burned down while he was gone and my mother with it.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: He's never been the same.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: The Tullys of Riverrun.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: You got to do all seven of the fuckers?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Father!

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: And we ask the Stranger not to kill us in our beds tonight for no damn reason at all.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I'm so sorry.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Really good.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Call that a fight? Slaughtering livestock more like.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Guest right don't mean much anymore.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: You got any ale?

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: How can a man not keep ale in his home?

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: What'll you pay? I don't have much. But I have hidden a bit of silver from the bandits. Fair wages for fair work?

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Fair wages for fair work.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: What did you do?!

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Get your horse saddled.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: You told me you weren't a thief.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: I wasn't.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: He took us in. He fed us and you...

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Aye, he took us in. He's a good man and his daughter makes a nice stew. And they'll both be dead come winter.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: You don't know that.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: I do know it. He's weak. He can't protect himself. They'll both be dead come winter. Dead men don't need silver.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: You're the worst shit in the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: There's plenty worse than me. I just understand the way things are. How many Starks they got to behead before you figure it out?

Name: Alliser Thorne
Sentence: There he is, Sam the Slayer.

Name: Gilly
Sentence: About what?

Name: Gilly
Sentence: You're not lying. I'll never forget the way it screamed.

Name: Gilly
Sentence: A what?

Name: Gilly
Sentence: My father hated that word.

Name: Gilly
Sentence: I don't know. It makes me sound a bit dangerous, doesn't it?

Name: Gilly
Sentence: I get a lot of looks. I hear them making their jokes. But no one's touched me if that's what you mean.

Name: Gilly
Sentence: Why do you worry about it?

Name: Gilly
Sentence: They've got other things to think about.

Name: Gilly
Sentence: You're being silly.

Name: Gilly
Sentence: What about you?

Name: Gilly
Sentence: Thank you.

Name: Gilly
Sentence: For worrying about me.

Name: Gilly
Sentence: So what are you saying?

Name: Gilly
Sentence: Are you bored of me?

Name: Gilly
Sentence: I'll get these to Hobb. Keep an eye on little Sam.

Name: Stannis Baratheon
Sentence: You're a literary man now. What do you make of that?

Name: Stannis Baratheon
Sentence: The usurper Joffrey Baratheon. I said those words when I tossed a leech into the fire. A leech filled with bastard blood. A bastard you set free. I am now faced with a great opportunity and I am powerless to take advantage of it.

Name: Stannis Baratheon
Sentence: What progress have you made?

Name: Stannis Baratheon
Sentence: House Peasebury.

Name: Stannis Baratheon
Sentence: House Musgood.

Name: Stannis Baratheon
Sentence: House Haigh. They don't have enough men between them to raid a pantry.

Name: Stannis Baratheon
Sentence: The Golden Company?

Name: Stannis Baratheon
Sentence: They're sellswords.

Name: Stannis Baratheon
Sentence: We don't have any gold.

Name: Stannis Baratheon
Sentence: If I do not press my claim, my claim will be forgotten. I will not become a page in someone else's history book. I'm running out of time, Ser Davos. Which means you're running out of time. -

Name: Gilly
Sentence: Sam.

Name: Gilly
Sentence: No.

Name: Gilly
Sentence: He's dead.

Name: Gilly
Sentence: North of here.

Name: Gilly
Sentence: You protected me north of the Wall.

Name: Gilly
Sentence: Best for you.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Greedy.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: You're calling my beauty an acquired taste?

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Your loss.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Does that surprise you?

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Then everyone is missing half the worldo s pleasure. The gods made that and it delights me. The gods made this and it delights me. When it comes to war, I fight for Dorne. When it comes to love, I don't choose sides.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: What are you, 25?

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Someday, if you're lucky, you will wake up and realize you are old. That pretty ass of yours will sag. Your belly will grow soft and your back will ache in the night and gray hairs will sprout from your ears. No one will want you anymore. Make sure you fucked your fill before that day.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: They will all have to line up behind you.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Prince Oberyn.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Lord Tywin.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: May we have the room?

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Would you like to sit?

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: No, thank you.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Some wine?

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: I'm sorry about your grandson.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Are you?

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: I don't believe that a child is responsible for the sins of his father. Or his grandfather. An awful way to die.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Which way is that?

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Are you interrogating me, Lord Tywin?

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Some believe the king choked.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Some believe the sky is blue because we live inside the eye of a blue-eyed giant. The king was poisoned.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: I hear you studied poisons at the Citadel.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: I did. This is why I know.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Your hatred for my family is rather well known. You arrive at the capital, an expert in poisoning, some days later my grandson dies of poisoning.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Rather suspicious. Why haven't you thrown me in a dungeon?

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: You spoke with Tyrion in this very brothel on the day that you arrived. What did you discuss?

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: You think we conspired together?

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: What did you discuss?

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: The death of my sister.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: For which you blame me.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: She was raped and murdered by the Mountain. The Mountain follows your orders. Of course I blame you.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Here I stand unarmed, unguarded. Should I be concerned?

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: You are unarmed and unguarded because you know me better than that. I am a man of reason. If I cut your throat today, I will be drawn and quartered tomorrow.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Men at war commit all kinds of crimes without their superiors' knowledge.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: So you deny involvement in Elia's murder?

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Categorically.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: I would like to speak with the Mountain.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: I'm sure he would enjoy speaking with you.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: He might not enjoy it as much as he thinks he would.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: I could arrange for this meeting.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: But you want something in return.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: There will be a trial for my son. And as custom dictates, three judges will render a verdict. I will preside. Mace Tyrell will serve as the second judge. I would like you to be the third.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Why?

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Not long ago, the Tyrells sided with Renly Baratheon. Declared themselves enemies of the throne. Now they are our strongest allies.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Well, you made the Tyrell girl a queen. Asking me to judge at your son's trial isn't quite as tempting.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: I will also invite you to sit on the small council to serve as one of the new king's principal advisors.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: I never realized you had such respect for Dorne, Lord Tywin.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: We are not the Seven Kingdoms until Dorne returns to the fold. The king is dead. The Greyjoys are in open rebellion. A wildling army marches on the Wall. And in the East, a Targaryen girl has three dragons. Before long, she will turn her eyes to Westeros. Only the Dornish managed to resist Aegon Targaryen and his dragons.

Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: You're saying you need us? That must be hard for you to admit.

Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: We need each other. You help me serve justice to the king's assassins and I will help you serve justice to Elia's.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Podrick. Apologies for the stench.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: A noble effort.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You're a good lad. Any word of Shae?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I suppose that's a good thing. What are they saying about me out there?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Do you believe I murdered Joffrey?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: No. Gods, no. The world is a better place without him, but I had nothing to do with it. I would like to think if I were arranging a royal assassination, I'd plan it in such a way that I wouldn't be standing there gawking like a fool when the king died. Trial in a fortnight. Have they announced the judges yet?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Of course.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Who will vote exactly as my father tells him to vote.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Oberyn? Give it to my father. He never fails to take advantage of a family tragedy.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Oh, I can call my own witnesses? How generous of them. Very well, my wife. Sansa.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Gone?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: No one had more 'cause to kill Joffrey than Sansa, but the girl is no assassin. Whoever killed the king wanted me to lose my head for it. And with my wife's disappearance, it makes me seem that much more guilty. Podrick.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: They'll be following you now.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I don't know. They. They. The ominous they. The man pulling the strings. Or woman. My father. Maybe Joffrey was too much work for him. Sweet Tommen will be so much easier to handle. Whenever something bad happens to me, I assume it's my sister that had a hand in it. But say what you will of Cersei, she loves her children. She is the only one I'm certain had nothing to do with this murder. Which makes it unique as King's Landing murders go.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Varys could vouch for me if he dared.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Of course. Fetch Bronn. I have a job for him.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Why not?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: And my brother? Will they at least allow me to see Jaime?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Ser Podrick Payne? Has a nice ring to it. What did you tell him?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Are you going to accept their offer?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Testifying against me wasn't a suggestion. If they can't tempt you with honey, they'll choose something less sweet.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Pod, the trial's in a fortnight. They'll want an answer before that.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I will not have you dying on my behalf. Do you hear me? If I have to take that long walk to the executioner's block, I don't want to see your head already mounted.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Pod, I am giving you an order. Go and find my brother. Tell him I need him. And get yourself out of King's Landing before it's too late. Pod! This is farewell.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Pod. There has never lived a more loyal squire.

Name: Alliser Thorne
Sentence: If we go after them, we'll be giving them what they want. They want to draw us out, pick us off a few at a time.

Name: Alliser Thorne
Sentence: You're a champion of the common people, Lord Snow. What do you say to Brother Pyp's proposition?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Mance Rayder is coming. If the wildlings breach the Wall, they'll roll over everything and everyone for 1,000 Miles before they reach an army that can stop them.

Name: Alliser Thorne
Sentence: We need to shore up Castle Black and we need to defend the Wall. That is our job.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Help him.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: And the mutineers stayed?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: We need to ride north and kill them all.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: It's not about justice. I told the wildlings we had over 1,000 men at Castle Black alone. Karl and the others know the truth as well as we do. How long do you think they'll keep that information to themselves when the wildlings are peeling their fingernails off? Mance has all he needs to crush us, he just doesn't know it yet. As soon as he gets his hands on them, he will. Then he'll throw his full strength at us. And even if every one of us kills 100 wildlings, there's still not a thing we can do to stop them.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Are they attacking?

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: A single rider. A champion of Meereen. They want you to send your own champion against him.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: What is he doing?

Name: Barristan Selmy
Sentence: I believe he means to...

Name: Missandei
Sentence: He says that we're an army of men without man parts. He claims you are no woman at all, but a man who... hides his cock in his own asshole.

Name: Barristan Selmy
Sentence: Ignore him, Your Grace. These are meaningless words.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: They're not meaningless if half the city you intend to take is listening to them.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I have something to say to the people of Meereen. First, I will need this one to be quiet. Do I have a champion?

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: Allow me this honor, mother of dragons. I will not disappoint you.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You are the commander of the Unsullied. I cannot risk you.

Name: Barristan Selmy
Sentence: Your Grace, I've won more single combats than any man alive.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Which is why you must remain by my side.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: I've been by your side longer than any of them, Khaleesi. Let me stand for you today as well.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You are my most trusted advisor, my most valued general, and my dearest friend. I will not gamble with your life.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Very well. You have quite an audience. Make it worth their while.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: He is very brave, Your Grace.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Yes, win or lose, as long as the whole city is watching.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You sure you don't want a horse?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Horses are faster than men.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I am Daenerys Stormborn.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Your Masters may have told you lies about me, or they may have told you nothing. It does not matter. I have nothing to say to them. Only to you. First I went to Astapor. Those who were slaves in Astapor now stand behind me, free. Next I went to Yunkai. Those who were slaves in Yunkai now stand behind me, free. Now I have come to Meereen. I am not your enemy. Your enemy is beside you.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Your enemy steals and murders your children. Your enemy has nothing for you but chains and suffering and commands. I do not bring commands. I bring you a choice. And I bring your enemies what they deserve. Forward!

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Fire!

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: My name is Grey Worm. I come from the Summer "Ills."

Name: Missandei
Sentence: Isles. Summer Isles.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: Summer Isles.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: I am from an island called Naath.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: When they took you?

Name: Missandei
Sentence: When did they take me?" I was five years old.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: You remember your home?

Name: Missandei
Sentence: I remember when they rowed us away from shore. How white the beaches were. How tall the trees. And I remember my village burning. Smoke rising into the sky. Do you remember your home?

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: Unsullied. Always Unsullied. Before Unsullied, nothing.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: That's not true. Perhaps one day you will return to the Summer Isles.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: I don't want return.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: Kill the masters.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: Kill the masters.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: How are the lessons coming?

Name: Missandei
Sentence: Very well, Your Grace.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: Missandei is teacher good, my queen.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You'll have to continue later. It's time.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: All men must die.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: But I promise you, a single day of freedom is worth more than a lifetime in chains.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: This one is called Grey Worm. I was taken as a baby by the Masters of Astapor, raised and trained as Unsullied. Now I fight for Daenerys, the Mother of Dragons and Breaker of Chains.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: There are three slaves in this city for every Master. No one can give you your freedom, brothers. If you want it, you must take it.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Remind me, Ser Jorah, how many children did the Great Masters nail to mileposts?

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: 163, Khaleesi.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Yes, that was it.

Name: Barristan Selmy
Sentence: Your Grace, may I have a word? The city is yours. All these people,they're your subjects now. Sometimes it is better to answer injustice with mercy.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I will answer injustice with justice.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: What the hell was that?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You're a rare talent. When you're fighting cripples, anyway.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You talk to my brother this way?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Do you think he did it?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: We're done for today.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You stood for him in his trial by combat at the Eyrie.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: To tell you the truth, this isn't so bad. Four walls. A pot to piss in. I was chained to a wooden post covered in my own shit for months.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Is that supposed to make me feel better?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Maybe a bit. I'm sorry I didn't come sooner.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: It's complicated, yes. So how is our sister?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: How do you think? Her son died in her arms.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Her son?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Don't. You know what's coming?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: My trial for regicide.Yes, I know. I know the whole bloody country thinks I'm guilty. I know that one of my three judges has wished me dead more times than I can count. And that judge is my father. As for Cersei, well, she's probably working on a way to avoid a trial altogether by having me killed.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Now that you mention it, she did ask.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: So, should I turn around and close my eyes?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Depends. Did you do it?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: The Kingslayer brothers. You like it? I like it. You're really asking if I killed your son?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Are you really asking if I'd kill my brother? How can I help you?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Well, you could set me free.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You know I can't.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Then there's really nothing else to say.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: What do you want me to do? Kill the guards? Sneak you out of the city in the back of a cart? I'm the Lord Commander of the Kingsguard.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Sorry, I'd forgotten. I'd hate for you to do something inappropriate.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Inappropriate? You're accused of killing the king.Freeing you is treason.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Except I didn't do it.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Which is why we're having a trial. A trial. If the killer threw himself before the Iron Throne, confessed to his crimes, and gave irrefutable evidence of his guilt, it wouldn't matter to Cersei. She won't rest until my heado s on a spike.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Not just yours. She's offering a knighthood to whomever finds Sansa Stark.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Sansa couldn't have done this. She had more reason than anyone in the Seven Kingdoms. Do you think it's a coincidence she disappeared the same night Joffrey died?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: No, but... Sansa's not a killer. Not yet, anyway.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Where are you taking me?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I'm getting married to your Aunt Lysa. She's waiting for us at the Eyrie. You'll be safe there.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Did you kill Joffrey?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Did I kill Joffrey? I've been in the Vale for weeks.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I know it was you.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: And who helped me with this conspiracy?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Well, there was Ser Dontos. You used him to get me out of King's Landing, but you would never trust him to kill the king.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Why not?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Because you're too smart to trust a drunk.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Then perhaps it was your husband.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: No.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: How do you know?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I just do.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: You're right. He wasn't involvedi n Joffrey's death. But you were. Do you remember that lovely necklace Dontos gave you? I don't suppose you noticed that a stone was missing after the feast.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: The poison. I don't understand. The Lannisters gave you wealth, power. Joffrey made you the Lord of Harrenhal.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: A man with no motive is a man no one suspects. Always keep your foes confused. If they don't know who you are or what you want, they can't know what you plan to do next.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I don't believe you. If they catch you, they'll put your head on a spike just like my father's. You'd risk that just to confuse them?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: So many men they risk so little. They spend their lives avoiding danger. And then they die. I'd risk everything to get what I want.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: And what do you want?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Everything. My friendship with the Lannisters was productive. But Joffrey, a vicious boy with a crown on his head, is not a reliable ally. And who could trust a friend like that?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Who could trust you?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I don't want friends like me. My new friends are predictable. Very reasonable people. As for what happened to Joffrey, well, that was something my new friends wanted very badly. Nothing like a thoughtful gift to make a new friendship grow strong.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: I can't believe you're going. Leaving me alone here with these people.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: The time has come, my dear. There's nothing more tedious than a trial. Except perhaps these gardens. If I have to take one more leisurely stroll through these gardens, I'll fling myself from the cliffs.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: Have you been to see Tommen yet?

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: No. Have they even agreed to the match? No one tells me anything.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: I wasn't originally meant to marry your grandfather Luthor, you know. He was engaged to my sister, your great-aunt Viola. I was to be given to some Targaryen or other. Marrying a Targaryen was all the rage back then. But the momentI saw my intended, with his twitchy little ferret's face and ludicrous silver hair, I knew he wouldn't do. So the evening before Luthor was to propose to my sister, I got lost on my way back from my embroidery lesson and happened upon his chamber.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: How absentminded of me.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Mm-hmm.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: The following morning, Luthor never made it down the stairs to propose to my sister 'cause the boy couldn't bloody walk.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: And once he could, the only thing he wanted was what I'd given him the night before. I was good. I was very, very good. You are even better. But you need to act quickly. Cersei may be vicious, but she's not stupid. She'll turn the boy against you as soon as she can. And by the time you're married, it'll be too late. Luckily for you ,the Queen Regent is rather distracted at the moment, mourning her dear departed boy. Accusing her brother of his murder, which he didn't commit.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Well, he could have done.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: He could have done,but he didn't.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: You don't know, Grandmother.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: But I do know. You don't think I'd let you marry that beast, do you?

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: What? I don't understand.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: Shh. Don't you worry yourself about all that. You just do what needs to be done.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Bring it through! And again.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Very nice. Good.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: A lot of wildlings fight with a weapon in each hand. First thing you want to do is disarm them to try and even the odds.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Let's see what you can do.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Olly, you just watch for now.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Have you ever held a sword before? OLLY I was the best archer in our hamlet.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You two. Take it slow, try and disarm each other.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You know how to fight. You could have gone easier on him.

Name: Alliser Thorne
Sentence: Lord Snow. What do you think you're doing?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Grenn and I were helping them.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Someone has to train them.

Name: Alliser Thorne
Sentence: And that someone isn't you. Go find a chamber pot to empty. Go on. Do it. You traitor's bastard. Give me an excuse. Mormont's not hereto protect you now.

Name: Alliser Thorne
Sentence: Get back to work. Now! I said now!

Name: Alliser Thorne
Sentence: You think I care if they like me? We're at war.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: My father was highborn. My mother wasn't.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Jon Snow.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You fight well.

Name: Alliser Thorne
Sentence: Come on, get on with it. What are you waiting for? Summer?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You sent for me, Your Grace?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Your Grace. How formal of you. How many Kingsguards are posted outside Tommen's door?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Ser Boros is on duty tonight. Tomorrow I believe...

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: So one? You have one man guarding the future king?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I promise you Tommen's safe. We're protecting him.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: The way you protected Joffrey? Why did Catelyn Stark set you free?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: What?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I've been wondering for months. Ever since that great cow brought you back to the capital. Why did she set you free?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You know why. She'd hoped I'd send her daughters back to her.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: She hoped or did you promise?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I swore by all the gods that if her daughters were alive, I'd return them to her.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: So you made a sacred vow to the enemy.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I wanted to get back to you. Should I have told hert o fuck off?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You didn't mean it, then? You have no loyalty to Catelyn Stark?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Catelyn Stark's dead. So if I told you to leave the capital right now and find Sansa, if I told you to find that murderous little bitch and bring me her head, would you do it?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I know you went to see Tyrion. That creature who murdered our son.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I had to see him. I had to know for myself.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: And?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: He didn't do it, Cersei.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You've always pitied him. Our poor little brother. Abused by the world. Despised by his father and sister. He'd kill us all if he could. I want four men at Tommen's door day and night. That will be all, Lord Commander.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Kingsguard.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: I'm not a visitor, Your Grace. Word has itI'm to be your bride.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Did you know that people in arranged marriages often never meet until their wedding day? Before we decide to spend our lives together, we ought to get to know one another. Don't you think?

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: It can be our secret. Hmm? If we're going to be man and wife, we'll have a few secrets from her, I hope. So, Your Grace...

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Hello. Aren't you a proper fellow?

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Very handsome.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: That's very cruel. You don't strike me as cruel.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: That's a relief. Because you know what happens when we marry?

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: When we marry, I become yours. Forever. It's getting late. I should go. May I come and visit you again? All right, then.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Remember, our little secret.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: It's the duty of the Lord Commander to fill those pages. And there's still room left on mine.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Mmm. It's yours.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: It was reforged from Ned Stark's sword. You'll use it to defend Ned Stark's daughter. You swore an oath to return the Stark girls to their mother. Lady Stark's dead. Arya's probably dead, too, but there's still a chance to find Sansa and get her somewhere safe. I've got something else for you.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I hope I got your measurements right.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I almost forgot. I have one more gift.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Of course you do.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: My brother owes him a debt. He's not safe here. You're keeping him from harm. It's chivalry.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: See? He's a good lad.You'll get along.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: They say the best swords have names. Any ideas?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Good-bye, Brienne.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: She wasn't safe here.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Castle Black could be next.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: We have orders. No one's to leave the castle.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: And I remember who came after me and brought me home. I know how hard it is, Sam, believe me. When you told me about Bran going beyond the Wall, all I could think about was getting my strength back so I could go and find him.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: How fast could they travel? A crippled boy being pulled on a sledge by a simpleton?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: The wildlings have joined up with Mance. Every village or sheltered place will be deserted. Except...

Name: Alliser Thorne
Sentence: Your foray to Craster's Keep, I'll sanction it. But I won't order anyone to go with you. Volunteers only.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Thank you, Ser Alliser.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Ahem, brothers.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I'm going beyond the Wallto Craster's Keep. I'm going to capture the mutineers holed up there or kill them. I'm asking for volunteers to come with me. There's 60 miles of wilderness between here and Craster's and Mance Rayder has an army bearing down on us, but we have to do this. Our survival may depend on us getting to these mutineers before Mance does. They know the Wall. They know our defenses. If Mance learns what they know, we're lost. But if that's not enough, then consider this. If the Night's Watch are truly brothers, then Lord Commander Mormont was our father. He lived and died for the Watch and he was betrayed by his own men. Stabbed in the back by cowards. He deserved far better. All we can give him now is justice. Who will join me?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I can't let a recruit come north of the Wall.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Thank you, brothers.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Do you hear that?

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I'm going out there.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I'm going.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Summer, he's hurt. They've caught him in a trap.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I didn't see, but they have my brother's wolf. They have Ghost.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: They're Night's Watch. Look. Jon might be here.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: No.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I'm not leaving without Summer.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: The east side of the keep.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I'm Brandon Stark! I'm Brandon Stark of Winterfell.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Your Grace.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Your Grace.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: There he is.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Long may he reign.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Long may he reign.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: He sits the throne like he was born to it.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Yes. He wasn't, though, was he?

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: No, he wasn't.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You still mourn for Joffrey?

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: He was my husband. My king.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: He would have been your nightmare.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Your Grace, I feel...

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You knew exactly what he was. I did, too. You never love anything in the world the way you love your first child. Doesn't matter what they do. And what he did, it shocked me. Do you think I'm easily shocked?

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: No.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: The things he did shocked me. He's only a boy. A good boy. A decent boy. He always has been. Who was the last decent king, I wonder? He could be the first man who sits on that throne in fifty years to actually deserve it.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: It would be some consolation, wouldn't it? For all the horror that put him there.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: He will need help... if he's going to rule well.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: He has you.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: A mother is not enough. You're still interested in being queen, I take it?

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Oh. After all that's happened... It sounds strange, I know, but I am... I haven't even given any thought to it, what comes next. It would be a great honor, of course. But I will have to speak to my father about it.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Yes, speak to your father. I'll speak to mine.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: We may be faced with an alarming number of weddings soon.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: I won't even know what to call you. Sister? Or Mother? Hmm.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: King Joffrey Baratheon is dead. Murdered at his own wedding.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Who told you to take the Navy?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: So why did you do it?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: How many ships?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: How many men can they carry?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Would that be enough to take King's Landing?

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: The Lannisters have more.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: It's hard to say. It could be enough. But we're not fighting to make you Queen of King's Landing. Ten thousand men can't conquer Westeros.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: The old houses will flock to whichever side they think will win, as they always have.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: There's other news. From Yunkai. Without the Unsullied to enforce your rule, the Wise Masters have retaken control of the city. They've re-enslaved the freedmen who stayed behind and sworn to take revenge against you. And in Astapor, the council you installed to rule over the city has been overthrown by a butcher named Cleon who's declared himself "His Imperial Majesty."

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Please leave me. Not you, Jorah.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: It appears my liberation of Slaver's Bay isn't going quite as planned.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: You could sail for Westeros and leave it all behind. A boy sits on the Iron Throne. A boy many believe to be a bastard with no right to it. They've never been more vulnerable.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You counseled me against rashness once in Qarth. I didn't listen. That all worked out well.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Baby dragons. Larger every year, Your Grace.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Varys
Sentence: No longer. He appears to be fully devoted to her. As for Ser Barristan, it would seem he took his dismissal from the Kingsguard a bit harder than anticipated.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: He's an old man. He wasn't fit to protect my son.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Joffrey didn't die on his watch. Dismissing him was as insulting as it was stupid.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Don't tell me you're worried about a child halfway across the world.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Varys
Sentence: A child with two seasoned warriors counseling her and a powerful army at her back, Your Grace.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Lord Varys is right. I have been to Essos and seen the Unsullied firsthand. They are very impressive on the battlefield. Less so in the bedroom.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Dragons haven't won a war in 300 years. Armies win them all the time. She must be dealt with.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Eventually, if it comes to that. Can your little birds find their way into Meereen?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Varys
Sentence: Most certainly, my Lord Hand.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Mmm. Lord Tyrell, be a good man. Fetch my quill and paper.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Varys
Sentence: Prince Oberyn.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Lord Varys...

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Varys
Sentence: Only Varys. I'm not actually a nobleman. No one is under obligation to call me lord.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: And yet everyone does.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Varys
Sentence: You seem quite knowledgeable about the Unsullied. Did you spend much time in Essos?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Five years.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Varys
Sentence: May I ask why?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Tis a big and beautiful world. Most of us live and die in the same corner where we were born and never get to see any of it. I don't want to be most of us.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Varys
Sentence: Most of us aren't princes.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: You are from Essos. Where? Lys?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Varys
Sentence: I have an ear for accents. I've lost my accent entirely.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: I have an ear for that as well. How did you get here?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Varys
Sentence: It's a long story.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: One you don't like telling people.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Varys
Sentence: People I trust.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: My paramour Ellaria, she would find you very interesting. You should come to the brothel and meet her. We brought our own wine, not the swill they serve here. We have some lovely boys on retainer, but...

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: You did like boys before?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Really? Girls? Hmm. I hope you won't be offended when I say I never would have guessed.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Varys
Sentence: Not at all. But I was never interested in girls, either.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: What then?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Varys
Sentence: Nothing.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Everybody is interested in something.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Varys
Sentence: Not me. When I see what desire does to people, what it's done to this country, I am very glad to have no part in it. Besides, the absence of desire leaves one free to pursue other things.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Such as?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Let me guess, I've been pardoned.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Really?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Father's orders.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Well, we mustn't disappoint Father.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Tyrion of the House Lannister, you stand accused by the Queen Regent of regicide. Did you kill King Joffrey?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: No.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Did your wife, the Lady Sansa?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Not that I know of.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: How would you say he died, then?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Choked on his pigeon pie.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: So you would blame the bakers?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Or the pigeons. Just leave me out of it.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: The crown may call its first witness.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Oh, why don't you tell them what Joffrey was doing?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Silence.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Pointing a loaded crossbow at Sansa Stark while you tore at her clothes and beat her.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Silence! You will not speak unless called upon. You're dismissed, Ser Meryn.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: I think you have made your point, Grand Maester. You have a lot of poison in your store.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: By whom?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Grand Maester, you examined King Joffrey's corpse. Was it without question poison that killed him?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Was this one of the poisons stolen from your store?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I will hurt you for this. A day will come when you think you are safe and happy and your joy will turn to ashes in your mouth and you will know the debt is paid.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Shortly before the Battle of Blackwater Bay. I confronted him about his plans to put Joffrey on the front lines. As it turned out, when the attack came, Joff insisted on remaining at the battlements. He believed his presence would inspire the troops.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Tyrion said, "And you will know the debt is paid." What debt?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I discovered he'd been keeping whores in the Tower of the Hand. I asked him to confine his salacious acts to the brothel where such behavior belongs. He wasn't pleased.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Thank you, Your Grace, for the courage of your testimony.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Varys
Sentence: I'm afraid I do, my lord. He said, "Perhaps you should speak more softly to me, then. Monsters are dangerous and just now kings are dying like flies."

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Varys
Sentence: Yes. After we received word of Robb Stark's death. He didn't seem gladdened by the news. Perhaps his marriage to Sansa Stark had made him more sympathetic to the northern cause.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: You're excused, Lord Varys.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Father, may I ask the witness one question?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: One.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You once said that without me, this city would have faced certain defeat. You said the histories would never mention me, but you would not forget. Have you forgotten, Lord Varys?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Varys
Sentence: Sadly, my lord, I never forget a thing.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: We will adjourn for now.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Toll the bells in an hour's time.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You'd condemn your own son to death?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: I've condemned no one. The trial is not over.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: This isn't a trial. It's a farce. Cersei has manipulated everything and you know it.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: I know nothing of the sort.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You've always hated Tyrion.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: He killed his king.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: As did I. Do you know the last order the Mad King gave me? To bring him your head. I saved your life so you could murder my brother?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: It won't be murder. It'll be justice.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Justice?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: I'm performing my sworn duty as Hand of the King. If Tyrion is found guilty, he will be punished accordingly.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: He'll be executed.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: No, he'll be punished accordingly.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Once you said family is what lives on. All that lives on. You told me about a dynasty that would last 1,000 years. What happens to your dynasty when Tyrion dies? I'm a Kingsguard, forbidden by oath to carry on the family line.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: I'm well aware of your oath.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: What happens to your name? Who carries the lion banner into future battles? Your nephews? Lancel Lannister? Others whose names I don't even remember?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: What happens to my dynasty if I spare the life of my grandson's killer?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: It survives through me. I'll leave the Kingsguard. I'll take my place as your son and heir if you let Tyrion live.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Done.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: When the testimony's concluded and a guilty verdict rendered, Tyrion will be given the chance to speak. He'll plead for mercy. I'll allow him to join the Night's Watch. In three days' time, he'll depart for Castle Black and live out his days at the Wall. You'll remove your white cloak immediately. You will leave King's Landing to assume your rightful place at Casterly Rock. You will marry a suitable woman and father children named Lannister. And you'll never turn your back on your family again.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You have my word.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: And you have mine.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Not going well, is it?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You're going to be found guilty.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Oh, you think so?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: When you are, you need to enter a formal plea for mercy and ask to be sent to the Wall. Father's agreed to it. He'll spare your life and allow you to join the Night's Watch.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Ned Stark was promised the same thing and we both know how that turned out.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Father is not Joffrey. He'll keep his word.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: How do you know?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Do you trust me?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Keep your mouth shut. No more outbursts. This will all be over soon.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: The crown may call its next witness.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: State your name.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Do you swear by all the gods that your testimony will be true and honest?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Do you know this man?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: How do you know him?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: This man stands accused of murdering King Joffrey. What do you know of this?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Silence! Continue.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: How could you possibly know all this? Why would he reveal such plans to his wife's maid?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: How did you come to be in his service?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Silence. Silence!

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: And did you?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Oberyn Martell
Sentence: Fuck him like it was his last night in this world.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Shae. Please don't.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Father, I wish to confess. I wish... to confess.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: You wish to confess?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I saved you. I saved this city and all your worthless lives. I should have let Stannis kill you all.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Tyrion. Do you wish to confess?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Yes, Father. I'm guilty. Guilty. Is that what you want to hear?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: You admit you poisoned the king?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: No, of that I'm innocent. I'm guilty of a far more monstrous crime. I am guilty of being a dwarf.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: You are not on trial for being a dwarf.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Oh, yes, I am. I've been on trial for that my entire life.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Have you nothing to say in your defense?

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Nothing but this-- I did not do it. I did not kill Joffrey, but I wish that I had.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Watching your vicious bastard die gave me more relief than 1,000 lying whores.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I wish I was the monster you think I am. I wish I had enough poison for the whole pack of you. I would gladly give my life to watch you all swallow it.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tywin Lannister
Sentence: Ser Meryn. Ser Meryn. Escort the prisoner back to his cell.

Episode Title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I will not give my life for Joffrey's murder. And I know I'll get no justice here. So I will let the gods decide my fate. I demand a trial by combat.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I made a deal for you to keep your ungrateful head on your ungrateful neck a little while longer.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I'm sorry, what am I grateful for? The opportunity to live and die at the Wall as punishment for a crime I did not commit?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You threw your life away. You threw it away. It's not a joke. You understand that, don't you?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Of course it's a joke, just not a very funny one. I couldn't- I couldn't listen to her standing there telling her lies. I couldn't do it.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You fell in love with a whore.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Yes, I fell in love with a whore. And I was stupid enough to think that she had fallen in love with me. That deal you made, it was everything Father wanted. You do see that? He gets you back as his heir. The future Lord of the Rock. And he ships me off to Castle Black, out of sight at last. All so perfect. It felt good to take that from him. He knows I'm innocent and he's willing to sacrifice me anyway. He's willing to sacrifice any of us. Not you. You're the golden son. You could kill a king, lose a hand, fuck your own sister, you'll always be the golden son.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Careful. I'm the last friend you've got.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: At least I got to tell them what they really are.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Yes, brilliant speech. They'll be talking about it for days to come. I thought you were a realist. Didn't realize you'd die for pride.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Don't give up on me just yet. I survived one trial by combat, even though you weren't there to save me.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I can't save you this time either. My training has proved that I can't beat a stable boy with my left hand.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Where's your sense of adventure? Even if you lose, imagine the look on Father's face when you fall.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Our family name snuffed out with a single swing of the sword.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: It is tempting.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Well... Bronn fought for me once, he'll do it again. If he wins, I expect I'll be in his debt for the rest of my life.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: If he wins.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Will you find him for me? Who does Cersei plan on naming as a champion? I hope it's Ser Meryn Trant. I'd enjoy watching Bronn disembowel that pompous child beater.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: No. Not Ser Meryn.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Ser Gregor. Welcome to the capital. Thank you for riding here so quickly.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You seem to be in good form.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Does it matter?

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Could be food.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Could be soldiers.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: You shouldn't be sitting out here like this.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Who were "they"?

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: That's not gonna get better.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: A bad way to go. Haven't you had enough?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: So why go on?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Nothing could be worse than this.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Nothing isn't better or worse than anything. Nothing is just nothing.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: My name is Arya. Arya Stark.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Her captor. Bringing her to her aunt for ransom.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: So do I.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: That's where the heart is. That's how you kill a man.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: The fuck you doing?

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Guess that's what the king does when you tell him to fuck off.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: And you thought you were going to collect it? Didn't think very hard, did you?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: You were Yoren's prisoners when he was taking me to the Wall. He told me he'd fuck me bloody with a stick.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: This day's really not working out the way you planned. He on your little list?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: He can't be. I don't know his name.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: What's your name?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Thank you.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: You're learning.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Greetings.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Come on, Ghost.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Mance's army was closing in on Craster's Keep when we left. We saw their campfires from Osric's Hill. They'll reach the Wall before the next full moon.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: We need to prepare.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: We should seal the tunnel. Plug it with rocks and ice. Flood it and let it freeze.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: We wouldn't.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Have you ever seen a giant, Ser Alliser? I have.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: They won't stop them.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: The stewards.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: No.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: The builders.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You have new clothes.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I sent for you days ago.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Doing what?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Lollys Stokeworth? She doesn't strike me as your sort of girl.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: She's dim-witted.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: When my sister arranged this love match, did she mention that Lollys has an older sister?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: And you understand the rules of inheritance?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: She still gets Castle Stokeworth when her father dies.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You and my sister deserve each other. Why did you bother to come here?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Is it two wives you want or two castles?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I'm a bit short on castles at the moment. But I can offer you gold and gratitude.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You might be surprised. A Lannister always pays his debts.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: My wife is heir to Winterfell. If I emerge from this with my head still on my shoulders, I may one day rule the North in her name. I could carve you out a big piece of it.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Does he frighten you so much?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Because you're my friend.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I understand.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Why are you sorry? Because you're an evil bastard with no conscience and no heart? That's what I liked about you in the first place.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Yes, we did.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I suppose I'll have to kill the Mountain myself. Won't that make for a great song?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: How did you get in here? Your door is well guarded,

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Don't do that again.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: These are my private quarters. If I want you here, I will summon you.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Tell me why you're here.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I've ordered the Second Sons to patrol the streets to stop the revenge killing.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And as for women, there are thousands in Meereen you can pursue.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You swore me your sword.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: So if I command you to stay in Meereen and patrol the streets?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Very well.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Do what you do best.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Take off your clothes.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: Come in, my queen. Please.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: You could never disturb me.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: Could you bring me that vial over there? The blue one.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: No, no, no. Not that one. You don't even want to touch that one. Next to it. That's the one.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: When I looked into the flames this morning, the Lord spoke to me. He said, "Tonight, you will have your last good bath in a long while. Make it count." A joke. Not a very good one, I'm afraid.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: That's because most jokes are lies and you're devoted to the truth.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: Not always.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: Most of these powders and potions are lies. Deceptions to make men think they witnessed our Lordo s power. Once they step into his light, they will see the lie for what it was-- a trick that lead them to the truth. A pinch of this powder in a bonfire will send a flaming column screaming towards the sky. And this one creates a black smoke that will make the bravest man piss himself with fear. And a drop of this in any man's wine will drive him wild with lust.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: No. Don't be upset. Men never crave what they already have.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: It's only flesh. It needs what it needs.

From the moment he arrived at the gates of Riverrun, a boy of eight carrying everything he owned in a little sack. She confessed to me she never loved Lord Arryn. She did as her father commanded, as so many of us have. When the gods finally allowed her to be with Lord Baelish, she was so happy. For a time. My aunt was a jealous lady. She was terrified that Lord Baelish didn't love her anymore. That he would abandon her for a younger woman. And then...one day she saw him kiss me.

Sentence: It was a peck on the cheek, Lord Royce, nothing more. Lord Baelish is my uncle now, in truth, by marriage. He's always been so kind to me. I was so happy to be here, to be free. All because of him. But my aunt turned on me. She cursed me. Called me a whore. Promised to throw me through the Moon Door. When Lord Baelish tried to calm her, she struck him. She said she didn't want to live anymore. She stood on the edge of that Moon Door. He tried to reason with her.
