Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Turns out, far too much has been written about great men and not nearly enough about morons. Doesn't seem right. In any case, I found nothing that illuminated the nature of Orson's affliction or the reason behind his relentless beetle slaughter. So I went back to the source. I may not have been able to speak with Orson, but I could observe him, watch him the way men watch animals to come to a deeper understanding of their behavior. *picks up a beetle* And as I watched, I became more and more sure of it. There was something happening there. His face was like the page of a book written in a language I didn't understand. But he wasn't mindless. He had his reasons. And I became possessed with knowing what they were. I began to spend inordinate amounts of time watching him. I would eat my lunch in the garden, chewing my mutton to the music of "khuu, khuu, khuu". And when I wasn't watching him, I was thinking about him. Father droned on about the family legacy and I thought about Orson's beetles. I read the histories of Targaryen conquests. Did I hear dragon wings? No. I heard "khuu, khuu, khuu" and I still couldn't figure out why he was doing it. And I had to know, because it was horrible that all these beetles should be dying for no reason.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Every day around the world, men, women, and children are murdered by the score. Who gives a dusty fuck about a bunch of beetles?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I know, I know. But still, it filled me with dread. Piles and piles of them, years and years of them. How many countless living crawling things smashed and dried out and returned to the dirt? In my dreams I found myself standing on a beach made of beetle husks stretching as far as the eye could see. I woke up crying, weeping for their shattered little bodies. I tried to stop Orson once.

We tried to do what was best for the realm by supporting the Targaryen restoration. And thus began the chain of mistakes that has led us both here. Things have gotten worse, not better. Westeros needs to be saved from itself.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You spent your life convincing 90 clans to come together for the first time in history. Thenns and Hornfoots, the ice-river clans, even the giants. A life's work uniting them. You didn't do it for power. You didn't do it for glory. You brought them together to save them because none of them will survive the winter, not if they're north of the wall. Isn't their survival more important than your pride?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Then bend the knee and save your people.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: And how many tens of thousands are out there right now? How many women? How many children? And you won't go out and rescue them because why? You're afraid of looking afraid.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: They'll burn you alive.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: And what happens to your people? You preserve your dignity and die standing, and they'll sing songs about you. “You'd rather burn than kneel. The great hero.” Until winter comes, and the white walkers come for us all, and there's no one left to sing.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I think you're making a terrible mistake.

So now he resides in the Red Keep's dungeons instead. . The Faith and the Crown are the two pillars that hold up this world. If one collapses, so does the other. We must do everything necessary to protect one another.

Name: Stannis Baratheon
Sentence: When you were an infant, , the Dornish trailer landed on Dragonstone. His goods were junk except for one wooden doll. He'd even sewn a dress on it in the colors of our House. No doubt he'd heard of your birth, and assumed new fathers were easy targets. I still remember how you smiled when I put that doll in your cradle, , and you pressed it to your cheek. . By the time we burnt the doll, it was too late. . I was told you would die. Or worse, the grayscale would go slow. . Let you grow just enough to know the world before taking it away from you. Everyone advised me to send you to the ruins of Valyria to live out your short life with the Stone men, before the sickness spread to the castle. I told them all to go to hell. . I called in every maester on this side of the world. Every healer, every apothecary. They stopped the disease and saved your life. Because you did not belong across the world with the bloody Stone men. . You are the Princess Shireen of House Baratheon. And you are my daughter.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I thought I might find you here. . Your Aunt Lyanna.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Father never talked about her. Sometimes I'd find him down here, lighting the candles. They say she was beautiful.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I saw her once. I was a boy, living with your mother's family. Lord Whent had a great tourney at Harrenhal. Everyone was there. The Mad King, your father, Robert Baratheon. And Lyanna, she was already promised to Robert. You can imagine what it was like for me, a boy from nowhere, with nothing to his name, watching these legendary men, tilting at the lists. The last two riders were Barristan Selmy and Rhaegar Targaryen. When Rhaegar won, everyone cheered for the prince. I remember the girls laughing when he took off his helmet and they saw that silver hair. How handsome he was. Until he rode right past his wife, Elia Martell, and all the smiles died. I've never seen so many people so quiet. He rode past his wife, and he lay a crown of winter roses in Lyanna's lap. Blue as frost. How many tens of thousands had to die because Rhaegar chose your aunt?

Sentence: Yes, he chose her… and then he kidnapped her and raped her.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Gold and glory. Oh, and hate. If you've ever met my sister, you'd understand. So now that it's clear we're on the same side? . A high born knight from the North of Westeros, down on his luck in Essos. Dragon epaulettes? Bear sigil breast plate. You're Jorah Mormont. I have to ask how, exactly, were you serving your Queen in a whore house, half a world away? Is it possible, that you were running? Why would you be running? And why would she have sent you away? Oh, wait! You were spying on her, weren't you? It's all coming back to me! I was drunk through most of the Small Council meetings, but it's all coming back. You passed notes to Varys's little birds. She found out, didn't she? Found out, and exiled you. . And now you hope to win back her favor with a gift. A risky scheme. One might even say, desperate. Do you think Daenerys would execute me, and pardon you? I'd say the reverse is just as likely.

Sentence: Barristan the Bold" they called him. He crossed a continent to serve me. He was a loyal friend. And he died in an alley, butchered by cowards who hide behind masks.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: It is.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Because now, , I am Lord Commander of the Night's Watch.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I'd have you go north of the Wall. Gather the remaining free folk wherever they are and bring them back here. I'll open the gates for them and let them through. I'll find them lands to settle south of the Wall.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I don't want them to kneel for me. I want them to fight with me when the time comes.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: And how many of your people can't fight? The women, the children, the old, the sick, what happens to them? You're condemning them to death. Worse than death because you're too proud to make peace. Or maybe you're not proud. Maybe you're just a coward.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Your people need a leader. And they need to get south of the Wall before it's too late. We don't have much time and they have less. The walkers are coming and they'll hit your people first. I'm not asking you to make peace to save your skin. Make peace to save your people.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Up on Storroldo s Point. I can give you 10 horses and nine other men. You can get there in a week.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You were at the Fist of the First Men. If we abandon them, you know what they become. We can learn to live with the wildlings or we can add them to the army of the dead. Whatever they are now, they're better than that.

Sentence: I was as shocked as anyone when The Faith arrested Ser Loras. I have no love for these fanatics. But what can the queen mother do?

Sentence: Has the crown suddenly stopped needing the troops, gold, and wheat my house supplies?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: The Lannister-Tyrell alliance brought peace to a war-torn country. Do you really want to see the Seven Kingdoms slide back into warfare?

Sentence: I didn't trust your father. I didn't particularly like him. But I respected him. He was no fool. He understood that sometimes we must work with our rivals rather than destroy them.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: House Lannister has no rival. The High Septon has called for an inquest, not a trial. Just a small hearing to determine whether the charges against Loras have merit, which I'm sure they don't. Loras will be freed, our happy alliance will continue, and we'll forget this unfortunate conversation ever happened. Good day, Lady Olenna.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: Our scouts report that Stannis Baratheon rides for Winterfell. He's a respected commander. His troops are loyal and battle tested. He's hired thousands of foreign sell swords to bolster his army. But this storm was a stroke of luck for us northerners. Our people are used to fighting in frost. His army's out there now, suffering in the snow. One day I'll be Lord of Winterfell, and Warden of the North. You'll be my Lady and Wardeness.

Sentence: Why? Winterfell is your home and I am your husband.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: Tough old bird. Everyone talks when I start beating them. But this one. Her heart gave out before I got to her face. We do breed them tough in the North. Bring my wife back to her chamber. It's far too cold out here for a lady. You should hold on to your candles. The nights are so long now.

Sentence: I retreated from King's Landing, Ser Davos. If I retreat again, I become “The King Who Ran.”

Sentence: Winter is coming. Those arent just the Stark words, it's a fact. If we march back to Castle Black, we winter at Castle Black. And who can say how many years this winter will last.

Name: Stannis Baratheon
Sentence: This is the right time, and I will risk everything. Because if I don't, we've lost. We march to victory or we march to defeat, but we go forward only forward,

Sentence: I've trusted in your visions, in your prophecies for years.

Sentence: Don't spar with me little fellow.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: Hips.

Sentence: A man of the people, is that your game? It's an old game. dull and unconvincing. A man of the people who does Cersei's dirty work for her.

Sentence: Spare me the homilies, I can smell a fraud from a mile away.

Sentence: Half the men, women, and children in this foul city break the sacred laws. You live among murderers, thieves, and rapists. And yet you punish Loras for shagging and Margaery for defending her brother?

Sentence: If it's equality you want then so be it. When House Tyrell stops sending our crops to the capital, everyone here will starve. And I'll make sure the hungry know who to blame,

Sentence: No you don't. You can't possibly. Not until you have children of your own. I would do anything for you. Anything to keep you from harm. I would burn cities to the ground. That is all that matters. You and your sister. From the moment you came into this world, my boy. My only boy.

Sentence: The past is the past. The future is all that's worth discussing. The future of House Tyrell.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: Don't pretend to have any concern for my house, my grandchildren, or me. I should have known you'd return to the capital once things started going wrong.

Sentence: I promise you..

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: I promise you, Lord Baelish, that our fates are joined. Together we murdered a king. And if my house should fall, I would have nothing to hide. And if i should meet with some accident here at this broken little flesh market, they'll never even find what's left of you. So do you deny a part in all of this?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Cersei summoned me to King's Landing. I dared not refuse her.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: And what did she want?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: A piece of info that she know that I had. Neither silence nor lies were an option. But I have other information of which she is unaware. And as you say, our interests are aligned. I have a gift for you.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: This is horrible. Unacceptable. Are they feeding you enough at least? I brought you this. Venison. It's quite good. I had it myself for supper only last night. We did everything we could from the moment they took your brother. Tommen even went to the sept himself to confront the high sparrow, but I fear The Faith has left reason behind.

Sentence: I know you did this.

Sentence: We are making every effort on your behalf. I swear to you by all the seven gods.

Sentence: You're upset. You're not thinking clearly. I'll visit again when you've had a chance to calm down.

Sentence: I don't want to see you again.

Sentence: Leave.

Name: Cersei Lannister

Sentence: Your Grace, I want to say--

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: If you are Tyrion Lannister why shouldn't I kill you? To pay your family back for what it did to mine

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You want revenge against the Lannisters? I killed my mother Joanna Lannister the day I was born. I killed my father Tywin Lannister with a bow to the heart. I am the greatest Lannister killer of our time.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: So I should welcome you into my service because you murdered members of your own family?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Into your service? Your Grace we have only just met. It's too soon to know if you deserve my service.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: If you'd rather return to the fighting pits just say the word.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: When I was a young man I heard a story about a baby born during the worst storm in living memory. She had no wealth, no lands, no army, only a name and a handful of supporters, most of whom probably thought they could use that name to benefit themselves. They kept her alive, moving her from place to place, often hours ahead of the men who had been sent to kill her. She was eventually sold off to some warlord on the edge of the world and that appeared to be that. And then a few years later the most well informed person I knew told me that this girl without wealth, lands, or armies had somehow acquired all 3 in a very short span of time, along with three dragons. He thought she was our best, last chance to build a better world. I thought you were worth meeting at the very least.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And why are you worth meeting? Why should I spend my time listening to you?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Because you can not build a better world on your own. You have no one at your side who understands that land you want to rule. The strengths and the weaknesses of the houses that will either support or oppose you.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I have a very large army and very large dragons.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Killing and politics aren't always the same thing. When I served as Hand of the King I did quite well with the latter considering the king in question preferred torturing animals to leading his people. I could do an even better job advising a ruler worth the name.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: So you want to advise me. Very well. What would you have me do with him? I swore I would kill him if he ever returned.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I know.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Why should the people trust a queen who can't keep her promises?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Whomever Ser Jorah was when he started informing on you, he is no longer that man. I can't remember seeing the same man as devoted to anything as he is to serving you. He claims he would kill for you and die for you, and nothing I have witnessed gives me reason to doubt him. And yet he did betray you.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Did he have an opportunity to confess his betrayals?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Yes, many opportunities.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: And did he?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: No. Not until forced to do so.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: He worships you. He is in love with you, I think. But he did not trust you with the truth - an unpleasant truth, to be sure - but one of great significance to you. He did not trust that you would be wise enough to forgive him.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: So I should kill him?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: A ruler who kills those that are devoted to her is not a ruler that inspires devotion. And you're going to need to inspire devotion, and lots of it, if you're ever going to rule across the Narrow Sea. But you cannot have him by your side when you do.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Remove Ser Jorah from the city.

Sentence: My face will be the last thing you see before--

Sentence: My name is Lana. I'm an orphan. When I was 8 I begged enough money to buy my first bucket of oysters, and I sold that bucket and made enough money to buy 2 more.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Iit took a while but I finally saved enough to buy myself an oyster cart. Now every morning I make my way down to the canals. I pass the fish mongers and the bakers. I usually see Lhara, my first customer of the day on my way home. Then I turn left onto Moonsinger Lane--

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Left onto Ragman Lane, where I do most of my trade.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: You are strong. You are the future of our house, the future of our family.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Shh. Have you -- have you told them that? That you don't care?

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: They want me to help you. They want me told help tear you down. That's why he's letting me see you, I know it is. And if either of us give in to what they want, then they win.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: All right.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: is walking down the hall to TOMMEN's chamber. She hears MAESTER PYCELLE talking.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: enters the room

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: What are you doing here?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Leave.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Is this a Small Council meeting?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Since I've missed the past several Small Coucil meetings, I wanted to speak to you about a few things.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: As have we all, unfortunately.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Look at me. What did they do to me? To the king's own mother?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: It's all right. It's done. It's in the past. And of course Margaery's safety is paramount.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Whether I like her or not is completely unimportant. Margaery is the queen. Queens must command respect. Kings even more so. Not just for their own sake, but for everyone's. The High Sparrow has no respect for kings or queens. No respect for anything in this world. He has no use for the things of this world. He want to knock them down and replace them with what? With fantasies. With beggars in the street. With nothing.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You've spoken with him?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: It would be a breach of confidence which he would not take lightly, given his constant prattling about the truth. I am your mother. You can always trust me.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: The Small Council meeting has been postponed on the king's orders.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You once spoke of your respect for our father because he understood the necessity of working with one's rivals.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Cersei is the mother of the king. She has the king's ear and his trust. And the king has been speaking regularly with the High Sparrow about Queen Margaery and Ser Loras.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: The High Sparrow seized power knowing full well we'd bicker amongst ourselves instead of seizing it back. Here we are. Well done to us. Now the future of the Seven Kingdoms rest in his dirty, peasant hands. In a few days, he'll have a trial for me. But before that, Queen Margaery will make her walk of atonement. Yes, Margaery will repent her sins before the good people of the city.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I agree.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You've got the second largest army in Westeros. You'll bring them into the city, stop queen Margaery's humiliation before it starts, and take her back into Crown custody.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You'll take no action at all. When the Tyrell armies come, you will stand down. Are you expressly forbidden from standing down?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: The whole thing will be over before anyone can call on you to do anything. When the High Sparrow is in custody or dead, preferably, and Margaery's back at Tommen's side, do you think the king will be angry at the outcome?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You hate these fanatics as much as we do. You hate what they've done to your son. Do you want Lancel back or have you given him up for good?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Then stand aside and let the people that took him from you be destroyed.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: approaches Pyke Castle by boat.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: They told me you were home and I didn't believe it. “Theon Greyjoy?” I said. “He's dead. He's been dead a long time." He let you go?

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: I escaped.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: I can't hear you.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: Look at me. Look at me! Men died trying to rescue you. Good men. My men.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: I'm sorry.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: You were my brother. You're a spoiled little cunt, but you were my brother and I risked everything for you and you betrayed me.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: I know. I know and I'm sorry.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: Stop saying that.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: He broke me. He broke me into a thousand pieces.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: I know.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: You don't know.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: He send us one of those pieces. That's why I came for you.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: Why did you come here?

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: Where else could I go?

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: You heard father was dead and thought you'd claim the crown?

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: No, no. I only heard he died after we docked.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: You happen to show up on Pyke right before the Kingsmoot?

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: I didn't know.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: You think any Ironborn wants you to be king? After what you've done?

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: I don't want to be king.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: What do you want?

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: I shouldo ve listened to you. You're the only one --

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: That doesn't matter anymore. Stop crying. Look at me. Tell me what you want.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: You should rule the Iron Islands. Let me help you.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: peels an apple with a knife. The door opens. A guard ushers OSHA into the room. RAMSAY nods. The guard leaves and closes the door.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: They've cleaned you up nicely. You know who I am?

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: Yes. A lord. You've seen my banners?

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: Does that worry you at all?

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: No.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: peels the skin of the apple and puts it on the table with the knife. OSHA looks at the knife. RAMSAY waves for OSHA to come to him. She walks towards him.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: You served the Starks?

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: The Starks have been gone for a long time, but you kept protecting Rickon.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: Be that as it may, Rickon's not yours to sell anymore. He's mine. So what use could I possibly have for you?

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: Are you sure you know what that is?

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: You're a good talker.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: I like that.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: You're a much better talker than Theon Greyjoy.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: I had to work hard to get him talking. But he talked. They all do.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: He told me everything. All about the Stark boys. Who helped them escape, and how she did it.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: JON SNOW, BRIENNE, TORMUND, and DOLOROUS EDD are eating at a table. SANSA looks at the meat on her fork. JON SNOW, DOLOROUS EDD, and TORMUND eat vigorously. BRIENNE looks around at the men eating. TORMUND stares intently at BRIENNE. BRIENNE looks away. TORMUND smiles. DOLOROUS EDD notices their interaction.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: That's all right. There are more important things.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I'm not Lord Commander anymore.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: SNOW takes the letter. The man leaves. JON SNOW sees the seal of House Bolton. He opens the scroll and starts reading.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: To the traitor and bastard Jon Snow. You allowed thousands of wildlings past the Wall. You have betrayed your own kind. You have betrayed the North. Winterfell is mine, bastard. Come and see. Your brother Rickon is in my dungeon.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: SNOW looks at SANSA.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: His direwolf's skin is on my floor. Come and see. I want my bride back. Send her to me, bastard, and I will not trouble you or your wildling lovers. Keep her from me and I will ride north and slaughter every wildling man, woman, and babe living under your protection. You will watch as I skin them living. You --

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Go on.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: It's just more of the same.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: SNOW puts the letter away, but SANSA takes it and continues reading.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You will watch as my soldiers take turns raping your sister. You will watch as my dogs your wild little brother. Then I will spoon your eyes from their sockets and let my dogs do the rest. Come and see. Ramsay Bolton, Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: His father's dead. Ramsay killed him. And now he has Rickon.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: We don't know that.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Yes, we do.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I heard him say 5,000 once when he was talking about Stannis's attack.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: How many do you have?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You're the son of the last true Warden of the North. Northern families are loyal. They'll fight for you if you ask.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: A monster has taken our home and our brother. We have to go back to Winterfell and save them both.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: SNOW nods.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: enters, ushered by the Lhazareen woman and the leader of the Dosh Khaleen. The khals bow their heads.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Don't you want to know what I think?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: No. I don't want either of those things.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I know where I am. I have been here before. This is where the Dosh Khaleen pronounced my child the Stallion Who Mounts the World.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: This is where Drogo promised to take his khalasar west to where the world ends. To ride wooden horses across the Black Salt Sea as no khal has done before. He promised to kill the men in their iron suits and tear down their stone houses. He swore to me before the Mother of Mountains.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And here, now, what great matters do the Great Khals discuss? Which little villages you'll raid, how many girls you'll get to fuck, how many horses you'll demand in tribute. You are small men. None of you are fit to lead the Dothraki. But I am. So I will.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: lays her hand on a fire pit.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You're not going to serve. You're going to die.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: knocks down all the fire pits one by one. The khals cower away from the flame. The flame begins to cover the entire temple. The khals run to the door and try to escape, but the door has been barred. JORAH and DAARIO watch the temple burning from the outside. The Dothraki people gather around the burning temple. DAENERYS grabs the final fire pit and knocks it in KHAL MORO's direction. The fire engulfs the entire temple and kills all the khals. DAENERYS walks out of the fire, unharmed and naked. All the Dothraki bow to DAENERYS. JORAH and DAARIO walk up to the steps burning temple. JORAH bows to DAENERYS. DAARIO stares at her and then bows.

Name: Sansa Stark

Sentence: How far is Mole's Town?

Sentence: I rode north with the Knights of the Vale to come to your aid. They're encamped at Moat Cailin as we speak.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: To come to my aid? Did you know about Ramsay? If you didn't know, you're an idiot. If you did know, you're my enemy.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Would you like to hear about our wedding night? He never hurt my face. He needed my face, the face of Ned Stark's daughter. But the rest of me, he did what he liked with the rest of me as long as I could still give him an heir. What do you think he did?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I can't begin to contemplate --

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: What do you think he did to me?

Sentence: He beat you.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Yes, he enjoyed that. What else do you think he did?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Sansa, I --

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: What else?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Did he cut you?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Maybe you did know about Ramsay all along.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I didn't know.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I thought you knew everyone's secrets.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I made a mistake, a horrible mistake. I underestimated a stranger.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: The other things he did, ladies aren't supposed to talk about those things, but I imagine brothel keepers talk about them all the time. I can still feel it. I don't mean in my tender heart it still pains me so. I can still feel what he did in my body standing here right now.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I'm so sorry.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You said you would protect me.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: And I will. You must believe me when I tell you that I will.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I don't believe you anymore. I don't need you anymore. You can't protect me. You won't even be able to protect yourself if I tell Brienne to cut you down. And why shouldn't I?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Do you want me to beg for my life? If that's what you want, I will. Whatever you ask that is in my power, I will do.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: What if I want you to die here and now?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Then I will die.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You freed me from the monsters who murdered my family and you gave me to other monsters who murdered my family. Go back to Moat Cailin. My brother and I will take back the North on our own. I never want to see you again.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I would do anything to undo what's been done to you. I know that I can't. Will you allow me to say one more thing before I go? Your great-uncle Brynden the Blackfish has gathered what remains of the Tully forces and retaken Riverrun. You might consider seeking him out. The time may come when you need an army loyal to you.

Sentence: I have an army.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Your brother's army.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Half-brother.

Sentence: A girl has no desires.

Sentence: A girl will poison the rum. Lady Crane is the only one who drinks it.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: She's a good actress.

Name: Arya Stark

Sentence: The younger actress. She's jealous because Lady Crane is better.

Sentence: A girl has decided.

Sentence: It was you. You made the White Walkers.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: I am Yara Greyjoy, daughter of Balon Greyjoy, King of the Iron Islands. I claim the Salt Throne.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: There are many things we've never done. We've never made our mark upon the world. The great lords of Westeros pay us no mind until our little raids buzz through their kingdoms long enough to become a nuisance. Then they swat us down. They conquer us, humiliate us, and go right back to forgetting we exist.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: We are a sea people.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: Our god is a sea god.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: When I am queen, we will build a fleet that —

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: I am not finished!

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: I am Theon Greyjoy...last living son of Balon Greyjoy.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: And she is your rightful ruler. Those of you that have sailed under her, and there are many of you here, you know what she is.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: She is a reaver!

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: She is a warrior!

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: She is ironborn!

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: We will find no better leader. This is our queen.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: I'm Euron Greyjoy.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: I claim the Salt Throne.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Niece.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Nephew. Little Theon.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Heard you managed to fuck things right into the ground. Captured a castle you couldn't keep. Got yourself taken prisoner. Even heard you have no cock.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Explains why you think a woman can be king.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: When did you return, Uncle?

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: A few days ago. I had some things to take care of. Long overdue.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: I'm glad you're here. Now I know what my first act as queen will be. To execute the man who killed my father.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: I did. I killed him. Threw him right over a rope bridge and watched him fall. He was leading us nowhere and we would still be heading there if it weren't for me. No one loved him. No one wanted to follow him. He led ius into two wars we couldn't win. I apologize to you all for not killing him years ago.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: That would have been hard to do. You weren't here. Last I heard, you were gallivanting around the world having a grand old time.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Gallivanting? That the sort of thing you start to say once your dick gets chopped off?

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Did the great lord of Westeros teach you words like that?

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: You were gone. Yara was here. Being Ironborn. Leading Ironborn. Getting ready to bring us back to glory.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: And how will she do that?

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: I will build the largest fleet the world has ever seen.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Right idea, except I'm the one who's going to build the Iron Fleet because I'm the one who knows how to use it. I've been all over the world. I've seen more of it than all of you combined. And across the sea there is a person who hates the great lords of Westeros just as much as we do. Someone with a large army, three large dragons, and no husband. I'm going to build that fleet and I'm going to gallivant right over and give it to Daenerys Targaryen along with my big cock.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: You're going to seduce the Dragon Queen?

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: I'm not going to seduce her. The Iron Fleet will seduce her. And together we're going to take the Seven Kingdoms. I wasn't born to be king. I paid the iron price and here I stand.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Where are my niece and nephew? Let's go murder them.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Won't be enough to save them.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Go back to your homes. Chop down every tree you can find. Quarter-saw the timber and start building. I want every man bending planks. I want every woman spinning flax for sails. Build me a thousand ships and I will give you this world.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I banished you twice. You came back twice. And you saved my life. So I can't take you back and I can't send you away.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: You must send me away.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Is there a cure?

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: I don't know.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: How long does it take?

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: I don't know that either. But I've seen what happens when it goes far enough. I'll end things before that.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: Don't be. All I've ever wanted was to serve you. Tyrion Lannister was right. I love you. I'll always love you. Goodbye, Khaleesi.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Do not walk away from your queen, Jorah the Andal.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You have not been dismissed. You pledged yourself to me. You swore to obey my commands for the rest of your life.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Well, I command you to find the cure wherever it is in this world. I command you to heal yourself and then return to me. When I take the Seven Kingdoms, I need you by my side.

Name: Varys
Sentence: In the last fortnight since our pact with the Masters, how many killings have been carried out by the Sons of the Harpy?

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: None.

Name: Varys
Sentence: And how many Masters have been butchered by the free men.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: Two, but that was the day of the pact. Since then, nothing.

Name: Varys
Sentence: So it's safe to say that a fragile peace has taken hold.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: For now.

Name: Varys
Sentence: For now is the best we get in our profession.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: It's not enough.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Considering the city was on the brink of civil war, I'd say it's a good start.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: It's not enough for Meereen to have peace. They need to know Daenerys is responsible for it. The Sons of the Harpy have a good story. Resist the foreign invaders. Our queen has an even better story. Mother of Dragons, Breaker of Chains and...all that.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: The people know who brought them freedom.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Yes, but do they know who brought them security? Who brought about an end to the violence? We need someone the people trust, someone they know who cannot be bought or influenced.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Sounds like quite the hero. Where would we find him?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Who said anything about “him”?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Welcome to Meereen.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: That's about the extent of my Valyrian.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Thank you for travelling all this way. I know from personal experience how uncomfortable the journey can be.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: The truth is we need your help. We had hoped that we could somehow persuade you to --

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Yes.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: She did indeed.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Ideally we'd avoid purifying too many nonbelievers. The Mother of Dragons has followers of many different faiths.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I'd settle for obeyed.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: That sounds most excellent --

Name: Varys
Sentence: A man named Stannis Baratheon was anointed as the chosen one by one of your priestesses. He, too, had a glorious destiny. He attacked King's Landing and was soundly defeated by the man standing beside me. Last I had heard, he'd been defeated again, this time at Winterfell and this time for good.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: We'd be most grateful for any support you could provide the queen.

Name: Varys
Sentence: I suppose it's hard for a fanatic to admit a mistake. Isn't that the whole point of being a fanatic? You're always right. Everything is the Lordo s will.

Name: Varys
Sentence: And you, an honest servant of the lord, why should I trust you to know any more than the priestess who counseled Stannis?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: My friend has a healthy skepticism of religion, but we are all loyal supporters of the queen.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: What?

Sentence: He saw me, the Night King! He saw me!

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I don't know. He was close, but --

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: But he can't get in.

Sentence: I'm sorry. I didn't mean to.

Name: Bran Stark

Sentence: But am I ready?

Sentence: We can't defend the north from the Walkers and the south from the Boltons. If we want to survive, we need Winterfell, and to take Winterfell, we need more men.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: The Umbers gave Rickon to our enemies. They can hang. But the Karstarks declared for Ramsay without knowing they had another choice.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: How well do you know the North, Ser Davos?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: My father always said Northerners are different. More loyal, more suspicious of outsiders.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: There are more than three other houses in the North -- Glover, Mormont, Cerwyn, Mazin, Hornwood. Two dozen more. Together they equal all the others. We can start small and build.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: The North remembers. They remember the Stark name. People will still risk everything for it, from White Harbor to Ramsay's own door.

Name: Sansa Stark

Sentence: Jon is every bit as much Ned Stark's son as Ramsay is Roose Bolton's. Ant there are also the Tullys. They're not Northern, but they will back us against the Boltons without question.

Sentence: You heard them. We need more men and my uncle has an army.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Can't risk Ramsay intercepting it. It has to be you.

Name: Sansa Stark

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: What is it?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: With Jon?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Jon isn't Tormund. Jon isn't Davos, the Red Woman, or Stannis for that matter. Jon is Jon. He's my brother. He'll keep me safe. I trust him.

Sentence: New dress?

Sentence: I made it myself. Do you like it?

Sentence: Year, it's -- I like the wolf bit.

Sentence: Good, because I made this for you.

Sentence: I made it like the one Father used to wear. As near as I can remember.

Sentence: Thank you, Sansa.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You're welcome.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Don't knock it down while I'm gone.

Sentence: Meera. They found us.

Name: Gilly
Sentence: It's so green.

Sentence: You're nervous. You're a nervous talker.

Sentence: That's not any better being a nervous mute.

Sentence: That Little Sam is your baby.

Sentence: Unsullied never drink.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Why not?

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: Rules.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: And who made these rules? Your former masters?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Those miserable old shits didn't want you to be human. Have a drink with me.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: And you? What's your excuse?

Name: Missandei
Sentence: I have tried wine before. It made me feel funny.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: That's how you know it's working.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Here's to our queen. Anyone not drinking is disrespecting our queen.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: To Daenerys Stormborn, Mother of Dragons, Breaker of Chains, long may she reign.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: Long may she reign.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Do you like it?

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: Tastes like it has turned.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Yes, yes. Fermentation. One day, after our queen has taken the Seven Kingdoms...I'd like to have my own vineyard. Make my own wine. The Imp's Delight. Only my close friends could drink it.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Tell me a joke, Missandei of Naath.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: I do not know any jokes.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Grey worm?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Right. Three lords walk into a tavern- - a Stark, a Martell, and a Lannister. They order ale...

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: but when the barkeep brings them over, each of them finds a fly in his cup. The Lannister, outraged, shoves the cup aside and demands another. The Martell plucks the fly out and swallows it whole. The Stark reaches into his cup, pulls out the fly and shouts, “Spit it out, you see shit. Spit it out.”

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: It's funnier in Westeros.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: The Starks and the lannisters, i thought these were enemies.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Yes.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: A joke is like a story, Torgo Nudho. Not a true story, necessarily.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: A story that's supposed to make you laugh, ideally. Not at the moment, perhaps.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Missandei, do you like the wine?

Name: Missandei
Sentence: I do.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Tell a joke.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: Two translators are on a sinking ship.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: The first says, “Do you know how to swim?” The second says, “No, but I can shout for help in 19 languages.”

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Ah!

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: That is the worst joke I ever heard.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: You don't even know what a joke is.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: I am soldier all my life. You think I never hear joke?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You lied to us.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: I make joke.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: More jokes.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I once walked into a brothel with a honeycomb and a jackass. The madam says- -

Name: Missandei
Sentence: The Masters have come for their property.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Lord Edmure.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I apologize for the way the Freys treated you. A man of your birth deserved better. You have my word you'll be properly fed and clothes from now on.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: The Blackfish is an old man. A good death is all he can hope for. But you, you have a child now, I've heard. A son you sired on your wedding night. You're a potent man.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You should be with them both. I can arrange that, you realize? Comfortable rooms for you at Casterly Rock. A tutor for your boy, knights to train him to fight and to ride. And when he comes of age, he'll have a keep of his own.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I'll remind you that our houses are at war. I'm sorry if this conflict has inconvenienced you, but rebelling against the Crown does have consequences.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Did I give you the impression that this was a negotiation? It's not.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I'll leave the judgments to the gods.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I was your sister's prisoner once. She hit me on the head with a rock if I remember correctly.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Perhaps, but she didn't. Catelyn Stark hated me just like you hate me. But I didn't hate her. I admired her. Far more than her husband or her son.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: No, I don't, but I'm telling you anyway because you're my prisoner. You don't have a choice. The love she had for her children, I was a little awed by it. Reminded me of my sister.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I'm not here to trade insults. Your sister was a strong- -

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I'll talk about whomever I want.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: She loved her children. I suppose all mothers do, but Catelyn and Cersei, there's a fierceness you don't often see.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: They'd do anything to protect their babies.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Start a war. Burn cities to ash. Free their worst enemies. The things we do for love.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: That's exactly why I came here. I love Cersei. You can laugh at that if you want. You can sneer. It doesn't matter. She needs me. And to get back to her, I have to take Riverrun. I'll send for your baby boy.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: And I'll launch him into Riverrun with a catapult. Because you don't matter to me, Lord Edmure. Your son doesn't matter to me. The people in the castle don't matter to me. Only Cersei. And if I have to slaughter every Tully who ever lived to get back to her, that's what I'll do.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Good. Bring him to me.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I was wrong. I admit it.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: That changes nothing.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: The Unsullied could mount a defense off the beachhead. If the slavers' forces- -

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: No more talking from you. Your talking gave us this.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: And I have acknowledged that. I'm trying- -

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: You're trying to tell me what the army should do. You do not know what the army should do.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: All right, what should the army do?

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: We'll not go to the beach. If we go to the beach, the Masters will take the pyramid. The pyramid is the only place in the city we can defend. We stay here.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: And then?

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: We wait for them to come to us. Then we fight them.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Lady Crane?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: You told her to kill me.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: A girl is Arya Stark of Winterfell and I'm going home.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Despite appearances, I think you'll find the city's on the rise.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Perhaps we should take shelter.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: The city is on the rise?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Meereen is strong. Commerce has returned to the markets. The people are behind you.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Well, not all the people, of course. No ruler that ever lived had the support of all the people. But the rebirth of Meereen is the cause of this violence. The Masters cannot let Meereen succeed. Because if Meereen succeeds, a city without slavery, a city without Masters…

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: it proves that no one needs a Master.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Good. Shall we begin?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Do we have a plan?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I will crucify the Masters. I will set their fleets afire, kill every last one of their soldiers, and return their cities to the dirt. That is my plan.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You don't approve?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You once told me you knew what your father was. Did you know his plans for King's Landing when the Lannister armies were at his gates?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Probably not. Well, he told my brother and Jaime told me. He had caches of wildfire hidden under the Red Keep, the Guildhalls, the Sept of Baelor, all the major thoroughfares. He would have burned every one of his citizens. The loyal ones and the trators. Every man, woman, and child. That's why Jaime killed him.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: This is entirely different.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You're talking about destroying cities. It's not entirely different. I'd like to suggest an alternate approach.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: We are here to discuss terms of surrender, not to trade insults.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: We obviously didn't communicate clearly. We're here to discuss your surrender, not mine.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: My reign has just begun.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Dracarys.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: You men have a choice

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: fight and die for the masters who would never fight and die for you, or go home to your families.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Thank you for the armada. Our queen does love ships. Now, last time we spoke, we made a pact. You violated that pact. You declared war upon us. Though our queen does have a forgiving nature, this cannot be forgiven.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: Our queen insists that one of you must die as punishment for your crimes.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: It always seems a bit abstract, doesn't it, other people dying?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Tell your people what happened here. Tell them you live by the grace of Her Majesty. When they come forward with notions of retribution or ideas about returning the slave cities to their former glory, remind the what happened when Daenerys Stormborn and her dragons came to Meereen.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You don't have to be here.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Yes, I do.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: My beloved wife. I've missed you terribly.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: Thank you for returning Lady Bolton safely. Now, dismount and kneel before me, surrender your army and proclaim me the true Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North. I will pardon you for deserting the Night's Watch. I will pardon these treasonous lords for betraying my house. Come, bastard, you don't have the men, you don't have the horses, and you don't have Winterfell. Why lead those pour souls into slaughter? There's no need for a battle. Get off your hose and kneel. I'm a man of mercy.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You're right. There's no need for a battle. Thousands of men don't need to die. Only one of us. Let's end this the old way. You against me.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: I keep hearing stories about you, bastard. The way people in the North talk about you, you're the greatest swordsman who ever walked. Maybe you are that good. Maybe not. I don't know if I'd beat you. But I know that my army will beat yours. I have 6,000 men. You have, what, half that? Not even?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Aye, you have the numbers. Will your men want to fight for you when they hear you wouldn't fight for them?

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: He's good. Very good. Tell me, will you let your little brother die because you're too proud to surrender?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: How do we know you have him?

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: Now, if you want to save —

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You're going to die tomorrow, Lord Bolton. Sleep well.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: She's a fine woman, your sister. I look forward to having her back in my bed. And you're all fine-looking men. My dogs are desperate to meet you. I haven't fed them for seven days. They're ravenous. I wonder which parts they'll try first. Your eyes? Your balls? We'll find out soon enough. In the morning, then, bastard.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: If he was smart, he'd stay inside the walls of Winterfell and wait us out.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: It's his weakness, too. His mean don't want to fight for him. They're forced to fight for him. If they feel the tide turning...

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: We're digging trenches all along our flanks. They won't be able to hit us the way that Stannis hit you, in a double envelopment.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: A pincer move.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: They won't be able to hit us from the sides.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: No. But I wanted to make him angry. I want him coming at us full tilt.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: So you've met the enemy, drawn up your battle plans.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Aye, for what they're worth.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You've known him for the space of a single conversation, you and your trusted advisors, and you sit around and make your plans on how to defeat a man you don't know. I lived with him. I know the way his mind works. I know how he likes to hurt people. Did it ever once occur to you that I might have some insight?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You're right.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You think he's going to fall into your trap. He won't He's the one who lays traps.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: He's overconfident.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: He plays with people. He's far better at it than you. He's been doing it all his life.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Aye, and what have I been doing all my life? Playing with broomsticks? I fought beyond the Wall against worse than Ramsay Bolton. I've defended the Wall from worse than Ramsay Bolton.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You don't know him.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: All right, tell me. What should we do? How do we get Rickon back?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: We'll never get him back. Rickon is Ned Starks trueborn son, which makes him a greater threat to Ramsay than you, a bastard, or me, a girl. As long as he lives, Ramsay's claim to Winterfell will be contested, which means he won't live long.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: We can't give up on our brother.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Listen to me, please. He wants you to make a mistake.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Of course he does. What should I do differently?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I don't know! I don't know anything about battles! Just don't do what he wants you to do.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Aye, that's good advice.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You think that's obvious?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Well, it is a bit obvious.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: If you had asked for my advice earlier, I would have told you not to attack Winterfell until we have a larger force, or is that obvious, too?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: When will we have a larger force?! We've pleaded with every house that'll have us! The Blackfish can't help us! We're lucky to have this many men!

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: It's not enough!

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Now, it's not enough! It's what we have! Battles have been won against greater odds.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: If Ramsay wins, I'm not going back there alive. Do you understand me?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: SNOW I won't ever let him touch you again. I'll protect you, I promise.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: No one can protect me. No one can protect anyone.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: My lady. You weren't at the war council.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: I'm not a soldier.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Any advice?

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: Don't lose.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: If I do, if I fall, don't bring me back.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: I'll have to try.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I'm ordering you not to bring me back.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: I am not your servant, Jon Snow.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You're in my camp. I'm the commander.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: I serve the Lord of Light. I do what he commands.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: How do you know what he commands?

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: I interpret his signs as well as I can. If the Lord didn't want me to bring you back, how did I bring you back? I have no power. Only what he gives me and he gave me you.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Why?

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: I don't know. Maybe you're only needed for this small part of his plan and nothing else. Maybe he brought you here to die again.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: What kind of god would do something like that?

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: The one we've got.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Last time we saw each other was at Winterfell, yes? You were making jokes about my height, I seem to recall. Everyone who makes a joke about a dwarf's height thinks he's the only person ever to make a joke about a dwarf's height. “The height of nobility,” “a man of your stature,” “someone to look up to.” You're all making the same five or six jokes.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: It was a long time ago.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: It was. And how have things been going for you since then? Not so well, I gather. Can't imagine you would have murdered the Stark boys if things had been going well.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: I didn't murder the Stark boys. But I did things that were just as bad or worse.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: And he paid for them.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Doesn't seem like it. He's still alive. It was complicated for you, I'm sure, growing up at Winterfell. Never quite knowing who you were. But then, we all live complicated lives, don't we?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You've brought us 100 ships from the Iron Fleet with men to sail them. In return, I expect you want me to support your claim to the throne of the Iron Islands?

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: Not my claim. Hers.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And what's wrong with you?

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: I'm not fit to rule.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: We can agree upon that at least.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Has the Iron Islands ever had a queen before?

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: No more than Westeros.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: Our Uncle Euron returned home after a long absence. He murdered our father and took the Salt Throne from yara. He would have murdered us if we had stayed.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Lord Tyrion tells me your father was a terrible king.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: You and I have that in common.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: We do. And both murdered by a usurper as well.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Will their ships be enough?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: With the former Masters' fleet, possibly. Barely. There are more than 100 ships in the Iron Fleet.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: There are and Euron is building more. He's going to offer them to you.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: So why shouldn't I wait for him?

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: The Iron Fleet isn't all he's bringing. He also wants to give you --

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: His big cock, I think he said. Euron's offer is also an offer of marriage, you see. You won't get one without the other.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And I imagine your offer is free of any marriage demands?

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: I never demand, but I'm up for anything, really.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: He murdered our father and would have murdered us. He'll murder you as soon as you have what he wants.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: The Seven Kingdoms.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: All of them.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And you don't want the Seven Kingdoms?

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: Your ancestors defeated ours and took the Iron Islands. We ask you to give them back.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And that's all?

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: We'd like you to help us murder an uncle or two who don't think a woman's fit to rule.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Reasonable.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: What if everyone starts demanding their independence?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: She's not demanding, she's asking. The others are free to ask as well. Our father were evil men, all of us here. They left the world worse than they found it. We're not going to do that. We're going to leave the world better than we found it.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You will support my claim as queen of the Seven Kingdoms and respect the integrity of the Seven Kingdoms. No more reaving, roving, raiding, or raping.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: That's our way of life.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: No more.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: No more.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: Do you like games, little man? Let's play a game. Run to your brother. The sooner you make it to him, the sooner you get to see him. That's it. That's the game. Easy. Ready? Go.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: No, you have to run, remember? Those are the rules.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: Now.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: Loose!

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Get word --

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: It's time, go.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: Their army's gone.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: We have Winterfell. They don't have the men for a siege. All we have to do is wait.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: You suggested one on one combat, didn't you?

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: I've reconsidered. I think that sounds like a wonderful idea.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: We're going to bury my brother in the crypt next to my father.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Jon.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Where is he?

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: Ah. Sansa. Hello, Sansa. Is this where I'll be staying now? No. Our time together is about to come to an end. That's all right. You can't kill me. I'm part of you now.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Your words will disappear. Your house will disappear. Your name will disappear. All memory of you will disappear.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: My hounds will never harm me.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You haven't fed them in seven days. You said it yourself.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: They're loyal beasts.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: They were. Now they're starving.

Name: Ramsay Bolton
Sentence: Sit. Down! Down! Down! Down! Down!

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Faith is the way, Father.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: You mutilated him. You gave me your word.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: And where is the queen mother?

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: Elsewhere, I'm afraid.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: Please, Grand Maester. I bear you no ill will. Please forgive me if you can.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: This pains me, my lord. Whatever your faults, you do not deserve to die alone in such a cold, dark place. But sometimes before we can usher in the new, the old must be put to rest.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: There's something wrong.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Cersei is not here. Tommen is not here. Why do you think they are not here?

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Forget about the bloody gods and listen to what I'm telling you. Cersei understands the consequences of her absence and she is absent anyway, which means she does not intend to suffer those consequences. The trial can wait. We all need to leave.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: We all need to leave now!

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Loras. Stay with me.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Let me through. Let me through. Get out of my way.

Name: Margaery Tyrell
Sentence: Let us through!

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Confess. Confess.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Confess.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Confess. It felt good. Beating me, starving me, frightening me, humiliating me. You didn't do it because you cared about my atonement. You did it because it felt good. I understand. I do things because they feel good. I drink because it feels good. I killed my husband because it felt good to be rid of him. I fuck my brother because it feels good to feel him inside me. I lie about fucking my brother… because it feels good to keep our son safe from hateful hypocrites. I killed your High Sparrow… and all his little sparrows… all his septons, all his septas, all his filthy soldiers, because it felt good to watch them burn. It felt good to imagine their shock and their pain. No thought has ever given me greater joy. Even confessing feels good under the right circumstances.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You've always been quiet.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I said my face would be the last thing you saw before you died. Do you remember?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: What? Now? Today? You're not going to die today. You're not going to die for quite a while. Ser Gregor.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: This is Ser Gregor Clegane. He's quiet, too.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Your gods have forsaken you. This is your god now.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Shame.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You're welcome to her.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Those two have their eyes on you.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Not my type.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Ladies, have you met Ser Bronn of the Blackwater, hero of the Battle of Blackwater Bay.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: There you go.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I'm sure he would be.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Have you done much fighting yourself, Lord Frey?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: No, but back in your day.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Yes, you're a great conqueror.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: They don't fear the Freys, though. They fear the Lannisters. We gave you the Riverlands to hold the Riverlands. If we have to ride north and take them back for you every time you lose them, why do we need you?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Show me.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: Your Grace, there's no need--

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: What are your thoughts concerning the king's funeral? As the Sept of Baelor is no longer an option, perhaps a ceremony in the throne room?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: He should be with his grandfather, his brother, his sister. Burn him and bury his ashes where the sept once stood.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: When we had feasts, our family would sit up here… and I'd sit down there.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: Could have been worse, Jon Snow. You had a family. You had feasts.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Aye, you're right. I was luckier than most.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: What is that?

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: The Princess Shireen.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: We burned her at the stake.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: The army was trapped. The horses were dying. It was the only way.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: I only do what my Lord commands!

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: We are standing here because of him. Jon Snow is alive because the Lord willed it.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: So did her father. So did her mother. Her own blood knew it was the only way.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: I didn't lie. I was wrong.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Do you have anything to say for yourself?

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: I've been ready to die for many years. If the Lord was done with me, so be it, but he's not. You've seen the Night King, Jon Snow. You know the great war is still to come. You know the army of the dead will be upon us soon. And you know I can help you win that war.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Ride south today. If you return to the North, I'll have you hanged as a murderer.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I'm having the lordo s chamber prepared for you.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Mother and Father's room? You should take it.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I'm not a Stark.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You are to me.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You're the Lady of Winterfell. You deserve it. We're standing here because of you. The battle was lost until the Knights of the Vale rode in. They came because of you. You told me Lord Baelish sold you to the Boltons.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: He did.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: And you trust him?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Only a fool would trust Littlefinger. I should have told you about him, about the Knights of the Vale. I'm sorry.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: We need to trust each other. We can't fight a war amongst ourselves. We have so many enemies now.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Jon.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: A raven came from the Citadel. A white raven. Winter is here.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Well, Father always promised, didn't he?

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: The last time a Tyrell came to Dorne, he was assassinated. 100 red scorpions, was it?

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: You murder your own prince, but you expect me to trust you?

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: What is your name again? Barbaro?

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: Obara. You look like an angry little boy. Don't presume to tell me what I need.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: Do shut up, dear.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: Anything from you?

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: No? Good. Let the grown women speak.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: Cersei stole the future from me. She killed my son. She killed my grandson. She killed my granddaughter. Survival is not what I'm after now.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: And what is my heart's desire?

Name: Varys
Sentence: Fire and blood.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You're not coming with us.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You're not going to Westeros. You're staying here with the Second Sons. There's finally peace in Meereen. You will keep the peace while the people choose their own leaders.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You promised me. “My sword is yours. My life is yours.” This is what I command. If I'm going to rule in Westeros, I'll need to make alliances. The best way to make alliances is with marriage.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I don't know. Maybe no one.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I can't bring a lover to Westeros.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: So that's what you want? To be my mistress?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I can't.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: No one tells me to do anything.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Don't get angry.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: A great number of women, I imagine. Specific orders will be left for you regarding the welfare of Meereen and the Bay of Dragons.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: We can't call it Slaver's Bay anymore, can we?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Farewell, Daario Naharis.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: How did he take it?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: No tears.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I know it was hard for you. You turned away a man who truly loves you because he would have been a liability in the Seven Kingdoms. That's the kind of self-sacrifice that makes for a good ruler, if it's any consolation.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: It's not.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: No, I suppose not. I'm terrible at consoling.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Yes, you really are.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: All right, how about the fact that this is actually happening? You have your armies, you have your ships, you have your dragons. Everything you've ever wanted since you were old enough to want anything. It's all yours for the taking. Are you afraid?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Good. You're in the great game now. And the great game's terrifying. The only people who aren't afraid of failure are madmen like your father.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Do you know what frightens me? I said farewell to a man who loves me. A man I thought I cared for. And I felt nothing. Just impatient to get on with it.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: He wasn't the first to love you and he won't be the last.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Well, you have completely failed to console me.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: For what it's worth, I've been a cynic for as long as I can remember. Everyone's always asking me to believe in things-- family, gods, kings, myself. It was often tempting until I saw where belief got people. So I said no, thank you to belief. And yet here I am.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I believe in you. It's embarrassing, really. I'd swear you my sword, but I don't actually own a sword.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: It's your counsel I need.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: It's yours. Now and always.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Good. I, um… I had something made for you. I'm not sure if it's right.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Tyrion Lannister, I name you Hand of the Queen.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: My name is Arya Stark. I want you to know that. The last thing you're ever going to see is a Stark smiling down at you as you die.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I'm done with all that. I came here every day when I was a girl. I prayed to be somewhere else. Back then I only ever thought about what I wanted, never about what I had.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I was a stupid girl.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: What do you want?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I was wrong.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: It's a pretty picture.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You've declared for other houses before, Lord Baelish. It's never stopped you from serving yourself.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Thank you, Uncle Benjen.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I'm the Three-Eyed Raven now. I have to be ready for this.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Lyanna.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: No, I'm not a dream. I'm here. Right here.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: I've missed you, too.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Shh. You are.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: You're not going to die.

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Get her some water!

Name: Eddard Stark
Sentence: Is there a maester?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: The free folk, the northerners, and the Knights of the Vale fought bravely, fought together, and we won. My father uses to say we find our true friends on the battlefield.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: The war is not over. And I promise you, friend, the true enemy won't wait out the storm. He brings the storm.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: There's nothing to forgive, my lord.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Come on.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: I now proclaim Cersei of the House Lannister First of Her Name, Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Protector of the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: Long may she reign.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: When people ask you what happened here, tell them the North remembers. Tell them winter came for House Frey.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: You were at the Fist of the First Men. You were at Hardhome. You've seen the Army of the Dead. You've seen the Night King. He's coming for us. For all of us.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I want every northern maester to scour their records for any mention of dragonglass. Dragonglass kills white walkers. It's more valuable to us now than gold. We need to find it, we need to mine it, we need to make weapons from it. Everyone aged 10 to 60 will drill daily with spears, pikes, bow and arrow.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Not just the boys.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: We can't defend the North if only half the population is fighting.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: While we're preparing for attack, we need to shore up our defenses. The only thing standing between us and the Army of the Dead is the Wall and the Wall hasn't been properly manned in centuries. I'm not the king of the Free Folk.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: But if we're going to survive this winter together...

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Last time we saw the Night King was at Hardhome. The closest castle to Hardhome is Eastwatch-by-the-Sea.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: If they breach the wall, the first two castles in their path are Last Hearth and Karhold.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: The castles committed no crimes. And we need every fortress we have for the war to come. We should give the Last Hearth and Karhold to new families, loyal families who supported us against Ramsay.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: The Umbers and the Karstarks have fought beside the Starks for centuries. They've kept faith for generation after generation.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: And then they broke faith.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I'm not going to strip these families of their ancestral homes because of the crimes of a few reckless sons.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: So there's no punishment for treason and no reward for loyalty?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: The punishment for treason is death. Smalljon Umber died on the field of battle. Harald Karstark died on the field of battle.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: They died fighting for Ramsay. Give the castles to the families of the men who died fighting for you.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: When I was Lord Commander of the Night's Watch I executed men who betrayed me. I executed men who refused to follow orders. My father always said, "The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword," and I have tried to live by those words.
