But I will not punish a son for his father's sins, and I will not take a family home away from a family it has belonged to for centuries. That is my decision, and my decision is final.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Ned Umber.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Alys Karstark.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: For centuries, our families fought side by side on the battlefield. I ask you to pledge your loyalty once again to House Stark, to serve as our bannermen and come to our aid whenever called upon.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Stand.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Yesterday's wars don't matter anymore. The North needs to band together, all the living north. Will you stand beside me, Ned and Alys, now and always?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You are my sister, but I am king now.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Will you start wearing a crown?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: When you question my decisions in front of the other lords and ladies, you undermine me.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: So I can't question your decisions anymore?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Of course you can, but--

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Joffrey never let anyone question his authority. You think he was a good king?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Do you think I'm Joffrey?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You're as far from Joffrey as anyone I've ever met.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Thank you.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You're good at this, you know.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: At what?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: At ruling.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: No.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You are. You are. They respect you, they really do, but you have to--

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Why are you laughing?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: What did father used to say? Everything before the word "but" is horse shit.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: He never said that to me.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: No. No, he never cursed in front of his girls.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Because he was trying to protect us. He never wanted us to see how dirty the world really is, but Father couldn't protect me and neither can you. Stop trying.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: All right, I'll stop trying to protect you and you stop trying to undermine me.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I'm not trying to undermine you.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You have to be smarter than Father. You need to be smarter than Robb. I loved them, I miss them, but they made stupid mistakes, and they both lost their heads for it.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: And how should I be smarter? By listening to you?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Would that be so terrible?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Cersei of House Lannister, First of Her Name, Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Protector of the Seven Kingdoms--

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: What does she want?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Come to King's Landing. Bend the knee or suffer the fate of all traitors.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You've been so consumed with the enemy to the north, you've forgotten about the one to the south.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I'm consumed with the Night King because I've seen him. And believe me, you'd think of little else if you had, too.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: We still have a wall between us and the Night King. Theres nothing between us and Cersei.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: There's a thousand miles between us and Cersei. Winter is here. The Lannisters are a southern army. They've never ranged this far north.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You're the military man, but I know her. If you're her enemy, she'll never stop until she's destroyed you. Everyone who's ever crossed her, she's found a way to murder.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You almost sound as if you admire her.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I learned a great deal from her.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: What is this?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Its what we've been waiting for our whole lives. It's what Father trained us for, whether he knew it or not.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: He knew it. Made me memorize every damn city, town, lake, forest, and mountain.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: It's ours now, we just have to take it.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You've been quiet since you came home. Are you angry with me?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: No, not angry.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Are you afraid of me?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Should I be?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Daenerys Targaryen has chosen Tyrion to be her Hand. Right now, they're sailing across the Narrow Sea, hoping to take back her father's throne. Our little brother, the one you love so much, the one you set free, the one who murdered our father and our first-born son, now he stands beside our enemies and gives them counsel. He's out there somewhere at the head of an armada. Where will they land?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Dragonstone.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: They have deep-water ports for the ships. Stannis left the castle unoccupied, and that's where she was born.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Enemies to the east.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Enemies to the south--Ellaria Sand and her brood of bitches.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Enemies to the west--Olenna, the old cunt. Another traitor.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Enemies to the north. Ned Stark's bastard has been named King in the North and that murdering whore Sansa stands beside him. Enemies everywhere. We're surrounded by traitors. You're in command of the Lannister army now. How do we proceed?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Winter is here. We can't win a war if we can't feed our men and our horses. The Tyrells have the grain, the Tyrells have the livestock.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Will the Tyrell bannermen stand alongside a Dothraki horde and Unsullied slave soldiers?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: If they think Daenerys will win. No one wants to fight on the losing side. Right now, we look like the losing side.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I'm the Queen of the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Three kingdoms, at best. I'm not sure you understand how much danger we're in.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I understand we're in a war for survival. I understand whoever loses dies. I understand whoever wins could launch a dynasty that lasts a thousand years.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: A dynasty for whom? Our children are dead. We're the last of us.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: A dynasty for us, then.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: We never talked about Tommen.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: There's nothing to say.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Our baby boy killed himself.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: He betrayed me. He betrayed us both. Should we spend our days mourning the dead--mother, father, and all our children?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Cersei--

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I loved them. I did. But they're ashes now and we're still flesh and blood. We're the last Lannisters, the last ones who count.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Even Lannisters can't survive without allies. Where are our allies now? You saw what happened to Walder Frey and his family.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I heard. How could we ever trust a man like that?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: We couldn't. He was a useless, old coward, but the Freys supported us. Now they're all dead. Whoever killed them is no friend of ours. We need allies. Stronger, better allies. We can't win this war alone.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You think I listened to Father for 40 years and learned nothing?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: The Greyjoys? You invited the Greyjoys to King's Landing?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Not all of them.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Well, it looks like all of them.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I invited Euron Greyjoy, the new King of the Iron Islands. You said yourself we needed stronger, better allies. There you are.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: How are they better allies? How are they different from the Freys? They both broke their promises and murdered their former friends as soon as it suited them.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: So does everyone when it suits them. Unlike the Freys, they have ships. And they're good at killing.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: They're not good at anything. I know the Ironborn. They're bitter, angry little people. All they know how to do is steal things they can't build or grow themselves.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Euron Greyjoy didn't come here for that.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Oh, what did he come here for, then?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: A queen.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: The moment I was chosen Lord of the Iron Islands, they turned on me. Their own uncle. They stole my best ships and ran. Sailed the right across the world and gave them to the Dragon Queen so she could bring her armies here to attack you.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: It's nothing compares to the treason you suffered at the hands of a family members, from what I hear. But still, it bothers me. Murdering them would make me feel a lot better. And since it appears that all our treasonous family members are fighting for the same side, I thought we rightful monarchs could murder them together.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You're not a rightful monarch, though, are you?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: The Greyjoys rebelled agains the throne for the right to be monarchs, but as I recall, you were soundly defeated. Come to mention it, weren't you the one who started that rebellion by sailing to Casterly Rock and burning the Lannister fleet? You certainly caught us there. Very smart move on your part. Of course, we all made it to the Iron Islands anyway. I was there.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: I remember very well. I saw you. I heard so much talk. The best in the world. No one can stop him. I didn't believe it, to be honesty. But I must say, when you rushed through the breach and started cutting people down...it was glorious. Like a dance.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: The people I was cutting down were your own kin.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: The place was getting crowded. I enjoyed watching it. I truly did.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: And I enjoyed killing Greyjoys.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: A good thing for me. If you hadn't crushed us, I wouldn't have gone into exile. If I hadn't done that, I wouldn't be the greatest captain on the 14 seas.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: If not the most humble.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: You're not humble. You're the queen of a great nation. You don't care about the Iron Islands. They're nothing but rocks and bird shit and--and a lot of very unattractive people. The Iron Fleet, on the other hand, that's something else entirely. It's the greatest armada Westeros has ever seen. With the Iron Fleet, you own the seas. You can defeat the invaders of the east and the pretenders of the north and south.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: What do you want in return?

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Ever since I was a little boy, I wanted to grow up and mary the most beautiful woman in the world. So here I am, with a thousand ships and two good hands.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I decline your proposal.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Why?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You're not trustworthy. You've broken promises to allies before and murdered them at the nearest opportunity. You murdered your own brother.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: You should try it. Feels wonderful.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: I don't expect you to trust me outright. You need proof of my honest intentions. In my experience, the surest way to a woman's heart is with a gift. A priceless gift. I won't return to King's Landing until I have that for you.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: What do you want, Lord Baelish?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I am safe. I'm at home, surrounded by friends. I have Brienne to protect me from anyone who would harm me.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: At the moment, peace and quiet.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: No need to seize the last word, Lord Baelish. I'll assume it was something clever.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: We need his men. Without the Vale, Ramsay Bolton would still hold this castle. Littlefinger saved us.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I know exactly what he wants.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: That's a pretty song. I've never heard it before.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I don't want to steal your food.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: King's Landing.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Not so bad, is it?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: What are you doing in the Riverlands?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Oh, no, I couldn't. You don't have enough.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: You're a long way from home. I'm sure you've had some adventures, though.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Boy or girl?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Why?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: It's really good.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I'm going to kill the queen.

Name: Gilly
Sentence: You should really sleep, Sam.

Name: Gilly
Sentence: Legends of the Long Night.

Name: Gilly
Sentence: What is it?

Name: Gilly
Sentence: That's dragonglass?

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: Has she come yet?

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: The Dragon Queen. Daenerys Stormborn.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Shall we begin?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: On a night like this, you came into the world.

Name: Varys
Sentence: I remember that storm. All the dogs in King's Landing howled through the night.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I wish I could remember it.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I always thought this would be a homecoming. It doesn't feel like home.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: We won't stay on Dragonstone for long.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Good.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Not so many lions.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Cersei controls fewer than half the Seven Kingdoms. The lord of Westeros despise her. Even before your arrival, they plotted against her. Now...

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: They cry out for their true queen? They drink secret toasts to my health?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: People used to tell my brother that sort of thing, and he was stupid enough to believe them.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: If Viserys had three dragons and an army at his back, he'd have invaded King's Landing already.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Conquering Westeros would be easy for you. But you're not here to be queen of the ashes.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: No.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: We can take the Seven Kingdoms without turning it into a slaughterhouse. If the great houses support your claim against Cersei, the game is won. With the Tyrell army and the Dornish on our side, we have powerful allies in the south.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I never properly thanked you for that.

Name: Varys
Sentence: They joined our side, my queen, because they believe in you.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You served my father, didn't you, Lord Varys?

Name: Varys
Sentence: I did.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And then you served the man who overthrew him?

Name: Varys
Sentence: I had a choice, Your Grace--serve Robert Baratheon or face the headman's axe.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: But you didn't serve him long. You turned against him.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Robert was an improvement on your father, to be sure. There have been few rulers in history as cruel as the Mad King. Robert was neither mad nor cruel. He simply had no interest in being king.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: So you took it upon yourself to find a better one.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Your Grace, when I was ready to drink myself into a small coffin, Lord Varys told me about a queen in the east who--

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Before I came to power, you favored my brother. All your spies, your little birds, did they tell you Viserys was cruel, stupid, and weak? Would those qualities have made for a good king in your learned opinion?

Name: Varys
Sentence: Until your marriage to Khal Drogo, Your Grace, I knew nothing about you, save your existence and that you were said to be beautiful.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: So you and your friends traded me like a prized horse to the Dothraki.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Which you turned to your advantage.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Who gave the order to kill me?

Name: Varys
Sentence: King Robert.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Who hired the assassins?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Who sent word to Essos to murder Daenerys Targaryen?

Name: Varys
Sentence: Your Grace, I did what had to be done to--

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: To keep yourself alive.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Lord Varys has proven himself a loyal servant.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Proven himself loyal? Quite the opposite. If he dislikes one monarch, he conspires to crown the next one. What king of a servant is that?

Name: Varys
Sentence: The kind the realm needs. Incompetence should not be rewarded with blind loyalty. As long as I have my eyes, I'll use them. I wasn't born into a great house. I came from nothing. I was sold as a slave and carved up as an offering. When I was a child, I lived in alleys, gutters, abandoned houses. You wish to know where my true loyalties lie? Not with any king or queen, but with the people. The people who suffer under despots and prosper under just rule. The people whose hearts you aim to win. If you demand blind allegiance, I respect your wishes. Grey Worm can behead me or your dragons can devour me. But if you let me live, I will serve you well. I will dedicate myself to seeing you on the Iron Throne because I choose you. Because I know the people have no better chance than you.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Swear this to me, Varys. If you ever think I'm failing the people, you won't conspire behind my back. You'll look me in the eye as you have done today, and you'll tell me how I'm failing them.

Name: Varys
Sentence: I swear it, my queen.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And I swear this--if you ever betray me, I'll burn you alive.

Name: Varys
Sentence: I would expect nothing less from the Mother of Dragons.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: Forgive me, my queen. A red priestess from As'shai has come to see you.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: Queen Daeneys, I was a slave once, bought and sold, scourged and branded. It is an honor to meet the Breaker of Chains.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: The Red Priests helped bring peace to Meereen. You are very welcome here. What is your name?

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: I am called Melisandre.

Name: Varys
Sentence: She once served another who wanted the Iron Throne. It didn't end well for Stannis Baratheon, did it?

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: No, it didn't.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You chose an auspicious day to arrive at Dragonstone.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: We've just decided to pardon those who served the wrong king.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: The Lord of Light doesn't have many followers in Westeros, does he?

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: Not yet. But even those who don't worship the Lord can serve his cause.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: What does your Lord expect from me?

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: The Long Night is coming. Only the prince who was promised can bring the dawn.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: The prince who was promised will bring the dawn. I'm afraid I'm not a prince.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: Your Grace, forgive me, but your translation is not quite accurate. That noun has no gender in High Valyrian, so the proper translation for that prophecy would be the prince or princess who was promised will bring the dawn.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Doesn't really roll off the tongue, does it?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: No, but I like it better.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And you believe this prophecy refers to me?

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: Prophecies are dangerous things. I believe you have a role to play, as does another. The King in the North, Jon Snow.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Jon Snow? Ned Stark's bastard?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You know him?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I traveled with him to the Wall when he joined the Night's Watch.

Name: Varys
Sentence: And why do you think the Lord of Light singled out this Jon Snow aside from the visions you've seen in the flames, that is?

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: As Lord Commander of the Night's Watch he allowed the Wildlings south of the Wall to protect them from great danger. As King in the North he has united those Wildlings with the northern houses so together they may face their common enemy.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: He sounds like quite a man.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: Summon Jon Snow. Let him stand before you and tell you things that have happened to him, the things that he has seen with his own eyes.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I can't speak to prophecies or visions in the flames, but I like Jon Snow and I trusted him, and I am an excellent judge of character.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: If he does rule the north, he would make a valuable ally. The Lannisters executed his father and conspired to murder his brother. Jon Snow has even more reason to hate Cersei than you do.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Very well. Send a raven north. Tell Jon Snow that his Queen invites him to come to Drangonstone...and bend the knee.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Do you think it's really Tyrion? It could be someone trying to lure you into a trap.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Read the last bit.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: All dwarfs are bastards in their father's eyes." What does that mean?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: It's something he said to me the first night we met. You know him better than any of us. What do you think?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Tyrion is not like the other Lannisters. He was always kind to me, but it's too great a risk. "The Seven Kingdoms will bleed as long as Cersei sits on the Iron Throne. Join us. Together we can end her tyranny."

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: What?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You're not suggesting Jon meet with her?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: But?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: If the Mad King's daughter takes the Iron Throne, she will destroy the Realm as we know it. Some of you are bannermen of House Tyrell. But House Tyrell is in open rebellion against the Crown. With their help the Mad King's daughter has ferried an army of savages to our shores. Mindless Unsullied soldiers who will destroy your castles and your holdfasts. Dothraki heathens who will burn your villages to the ground, rape and enslave your women, and butcher your children without a second thought. This is how Olenna Tyrell rewards centuries of service and loyalty.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You all remember the Mad King. You remember the horrors he inflicted upon his people. His daughter is no different. In Essos her brutality is already legendary. She crucified hundreds of noblemen in Slaver's Bay. And when she grew bored of that, she fed them to her dragons.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: It is my solemn duty to protect the people, and I will but I need your help, My Lords. We must stand together, all of us, if we hope to stop her.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: We are currently at work on a solution, My Lord.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Lord Tarley.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Rickon, isn't it?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: That's it.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Thank you for coming. The other lords of the Reach look to you for guidance now more than ever. They might not have come if you hadn't.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Do you ride for Hornhill today?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: And what side will you be fighting for? You were the only man to defeat Robert Baratheon in battle. Not even Rhaegar Targaryen could --

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I want you to be my ranking general in the wars to come. I want you to swear allegiance to Cersei and I want you to help her destroy her enemies. All of her enemies.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You swore an oath to the Crown as well, Lord Tarley.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: She was a great woman, once. Now she's broken. She wants revenge so badly she brought the Dothraki to our shores. The Dothraki in Westeros for the first time in history. I know you don't like my sister, but you have to make a choice. Do you fight with us or with the foreign savages and eunuchs?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: When the war is won the queen will need a new warden of the south. I can think of no better man than Randyll Tarley.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: How long?

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: But how long 'till...

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: Jorah. Jorah Mormont.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: There's no need. I've been dead to them for years.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: Have you ever been down here, Your Grace?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: No, I can't say I have. I haven't seen these since Robert had them removed from the Throne Room.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: Curious that King Robert did not have them destroyed.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: They were his trophies. He couldn't keep them around. They would have made him look small. Sometimes he would come down here and look at them. I believe he brought his whores on occasion.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: Balerion the Dread. The beast that Aegon rode across the sea. Its flames forged the Iron Throne and brought the Seven Kingdoms to heel. Powerful, but not invincible.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: Apparently one of Daenarys' dragons was wounded by spears in the fighting pits of Meereen. If they can be wounded, they can be killed.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: The finest artilleters and blacksmiths in King's Landing have been laboring day and night, Your Grace. If you'd kindly pull that lever.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: If you want the Iron Throne, take it. We have an army, a fleet, and three dragons. We should hit King's Landing now. Hard. With everything we have. The city will fall within a day.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: If we turn the dragons loose, tens of thousands will die in the firestorms.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I know how you wage war. We don't poison little girls here. Myrcella was innocent.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: That's enough. Tyrion is the Hand of the Queen. You will treat him with respect.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I am not here to be queen of the ashes.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: That's very nice to hear. Of course, I can't remember a queen who was better loved than my grand daughter. The common people loved her, the nobles loved her. And what is left of her now? Ashes. Commoners, nobles, they're all just children really. They won't obey you unless they fear you.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I'm grateful to you, Lady Olenna, for your council. I'm grateful to all of you. But you have chosen to follow me. I will not attack King's Landing. We will not attack King's Landing.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: Then how do you mean to take the Iron Throne? By asking nicely?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: We will lay siege to the capital surrounding the city on all sides. Cersei will have the Iron Throne but no food for her army or the people.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: But we won't use Dothraki and Unsullied.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Cersei will try to rally the lords of Westeros by appealing to their loyalty, their love for their country. If we besiege the city with foreigners, we prove her point. Our army should be Westerosi.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You are.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Lady Greyjoy will escort you home to Sunspear and her Iron Fleet will ferry the Dornish army back up to King's Landing.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: The Dornish will lay siege to the capital alongside the Tyrell army. Two great kingdoms united against Cersei.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: So, your master plan is to use our armies? Forgive me for asking, but why did you bother to bring your own?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: The unsullied will have another objective. For decades House Lannister has been the true power in Westeros. And the seat of that power is Casterly Rock. Grey Worm and the Unsullied will sail for the Rock and take it.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Do I have your support?

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: You have mine.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Thank you all. Lady Olenna, may I speak with you alone?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I realize you're here out of hatred for Cersei and not love for me. But I swear to you she will pay for what she's done and we will bring peace back to Westeros.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: Peace. Do you think that's what we had under your father or his father or his? Peace never lasts, my dear. Would you take a bit of advice from an old woman?

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: He's a clever man, your Hand. I've known a great many clever men. I've outlived them all. Do you know why? I ignored them. The lords of Westeros are sheep. Are you a sheep? No. You're a dragon. Be a dragon.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: Enter.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: You leave tomorrow. Were you going to say goodbye?

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: I will see you when I return.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: But you don't know when that will be.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: No one knows.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: I wish you good fortune.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: Missandei --

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: It is hard for me to say goodbye to you.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: Why?

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: You know why.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: I don't.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: You are my weakness.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: That's what I am? Your weakness?

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: When Unsullied are young their masters learn their fears. One boy is scared of dogs. One boy hates high places. One is frightened of the ocean. They make the boy sleep with dogs or climb a cliff. They throw him in the water. If he learns to swim, good. If he drowns, good. Either way, strong Unsullied. But I had no fears. I was never the biggest, never the strongest, but I was bravest always.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: I believe it.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: Until I meet Missandei from the Isle of Naarth. Now I have fear.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: I do too.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: No.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: I want to see you. Please.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: What are you doing?

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: What is it?

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: Have you ever done this before?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Hello, Hot Pie. Sit down. Who's that for?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Mmm. This is good.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I didn't do that.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: One or two.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Big lady?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: She found me.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: You got any ale?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: King's Landing.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I heard Cersei's queen now.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Hmm.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Cersei would do that.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Why would I go there? The Boltons have it.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: What?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: You're lying.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Thanks for the pie.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Thanks.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Take care of yourself, Hot Pie. Try not to get killed.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Come in.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: This message was sent to me by Samwell Tarley. He was my brother at the Night's Watch. A man I trust as much as anyone in this world. He's discovered proof that Dragonstone sits on a mountain of Dragonglass.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I received this a few days ago from Dragonstone. It was sent to me by Tyrion Lannister.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: He's now Hand of the Queen to Daenerys Targaryen. She intends to take the Iron Throne from Cersei Lannister. She has a powerful army at her back and if this message is to be believed, three dragons.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Lord Tyrion has invited me to Dragonstone to meet with Daenerys and I'm going to accept.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: We need this Dragonglass, My Lords. We know that Dragonglass can destroy both White Walkers and their army. We need to mine it and turn it into weapons.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: But more importantly, we need allies. The Night King's army grows larger by the day. We can't defeat them on our own. We don't have the numbers. Daenerys has her own army and she has dragon fire. I need to try and persuade her to fight with us. Ser Davos and I will ride for White Harbor tomorrow, then sail for Dragonstone.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Have you forgotten what happened to our grandfather? The Mad King invited him to King's Landing and roasted him alive.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I know that.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: She is here to reclaim the Iron Throne and the Seven Kingdoms. The north is one of those seven kingdoms. This isn't an invitation, it's a trap.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: It could be, but I don't believe Tyrion would do that. You know him. He's a good man.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You all crowned me your king. I never wanted it, I never asked for it, but I accepted it because the north is my home. It's part of me and I will never stop fighting for it, no matter the odds. But the odds are against us. None of you have seen the Army of the Dead. None of you. We can never hope to defeat them alone. We need allies, powerful allies. I know it's a risk. But I have to take it.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Then send an emissary. Don't go yourself.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Daenerys is a queen. Only a king can convince her to help us. It has to be me.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You're abandoning your people. Your abandoning your home.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I'm leaving both in good hands.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Whose?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Yours. You are my sister. You are the only Stark in Winterfell. Until I return, the north is yours.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I delivered his bones myself. I presented them to Lady Catlyn as a gesture of goodwill from Tyrion Lannister. It seems like a lifetime ago. Do give Lord Tyrion my best when you see him.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I was sorry when he died. Your father and I had our differences but he loved Cat very much. So did I. She wasn't fond of you, was she? Well, it appears she vastly underestimated you. Your father and brothers are gone, yet here you stand King in the North. Last best hope against the coming storm.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You don't belong down here.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Forgive me. We have never talked properly. I wanted to remedy that.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I have nothing to say to you.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Not even thank you? If it weren't for me you'd have been slaughtered at that battlefield. You have many enemies, My King, but I swear to you I'm not one of them. I love Sansa as I loved her mother.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Touch my sister and I'll kill you myself.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Nymeria?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Nymeria, it's me, Arya. I'm heading north, girl, back to Winterfell. I'm finally going home. Come with me.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Come with me.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: That's not you.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: A few times. Never stayed long.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: A boy, a girl. Depends on the port.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: I thought it wasn't for you.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: He's not your servant.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: It's fine.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: Once I kill my uncle.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: Whatever my queen demands.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: He'll be my advisor, my protector.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: He might have to intervene.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: Until they've made their intentions known.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: Stay here.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: Euron.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: Your mother is below deck. Keep her safe.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Give your uncle a kiss.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Theon!

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Ah, come on your cockless hound. I have her. Come and get her.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: The bastard of Winterfell.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: The dwarf of Casterly Rock.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I believe we last saw each other on top of the wall.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You were pissing off the edge, if I remember right. You picked up some scars along the road.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: It's been a long road. But we're both still here.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I'm Tyrion Lannister.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: and DAVOS shake hands.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Ah, the Onion Knight. We fought on opposite sides at the Battle of Blackwater Bay.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Missandei is the queen's most trusted advisor.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: Welcome to Dragonstone. Our queen knows this is a long journey. She appreciates the effort you have made on her behalf. If you wouldn't mind handing over your weapons.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Of course.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: Please, this way.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: I was born on the Island of Naarth.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: And Sansa, I hear she's alive and well.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: She is.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Does she miss me terribly?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: A sham marriage and unconsummated.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I didn't ask --

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Well, it was. It wasn't. Anyway, she's much smarter than she lets on.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: She's starting to let on.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Good. At some point I want to hear how a Knight's Watch recruit became King in the North.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: As long as you tell me how a Lannister became Hand to Daenerys Targaryen.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: A long and bloody tale. To be honest, I was drunk for most of it.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: My bannermen think I'm a fool for coming here.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Of course they do. If I was your hand I would have advised against it. General rule of thumb, Stark men don't fare well when they travel south.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: True. But I'm not a Stark.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I'd say you get used to them, but you never really do.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Come. Their mother is waiting for you.

Name: Varys
Sentence: I wondered why you weren't there to meet our guests. You begged us to summon the King in the North. Don't you want to see him again?

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: I've done my part. I've brought ice and fire together.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Strange. You spoke so highly of Jon Snow but when he arrives you hide on a cliff. I didn't take you for a bashful girl.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: My time whispering in the ears of kings has come to an end.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Oh, I doubt that. Give us common folk one taste of power we're like the lion who tasted man. Nothing is ever so sweet again.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: Neither of us is common folk anymore. I did not part on good terms with the King in the North, or his advisor.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Why?

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: Because of mistakes I made. Terrible mistakes. I would only be a distraction if I stayed.

Name: Varys
Sentence: So where will you go?

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: Volantis.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Good. If you don't mind my saying, I don't think you should return to Westeros. I'm not sure you'd be safe here.

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: I will return, dear spider. One last time.

Name: Varys
Sentence: My Lady --

Name: Melisandre
Sentence: I have to die in this strange country, just like you.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: You stand in the presence of Daenerys Stormborn of House Targaryen, rightful heir to the Iron Throne, rightful Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Protector of the Seven Kingdoms, the Mother of Dragons, the Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea, The Unburnt, The Breaker of Chains.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Thank you for traveling so far, My Lords. I hope the seas weren't too rough.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: The winds were kind, Your Grace.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Forgive me --

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Your Grace, this is Ser Davos Seaworth.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Forgive me, Ser Davos. I never did receive a formal education, but I could have sworn the last King in the North was Torren Stark who bent the knee to my ancestor Aegon Targaryen in exchange for his life and the lives of the northmen. Torren Stark swore fealty to House Targaryen in perpetuity. But do I have my facts wrong?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: No. Of course not. But still, an oath is an oath. In perpetuity means -- what does perpetuity mean, Lord Tyrion?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Forever.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Forever. So I assume, My Lord, that you're here to bend the knee.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I am not.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Oh. Well, that is unfortunate. You've travelled all this way to break faith with House Targaryen?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Break faith? Your father burned my grandfather alive. He burned my uncle alive. He would have burned the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: My father was an evil man. On behalf of House Targaryen I ask your forgiveness for the crimes he committed against your family. And I ask you not to judge a daughter by the sins of her father. Our two houses were allies for centuries. Those were the best centuries the kingdom's ever known. Centuries of peace and prosperity with the Targaryens sitting on the Iron Throne and a Stark serving as Warden of the North. I am the last Targaryen, Jon Snow. Honor the pledge your ancestor made to mine. Bend the knee and I will name you Warden of the North. Together we will save this country from those who would destroy it.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You're right. You're not guilty of your father's crime. And I'm not beholden to my ancestor's vows.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Then why are you here?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Because I need your help and you need mine.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Did you see three dragons flying overhead when you arrived?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I did.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And did you see the Dothraki, all of whom have sworn to kill for me?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: They're hard to miss.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: But still, I need your help?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Almost.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: But you haven't stormed King's Landing. Why not? The only reason I can see is you don't want to kill thousands of innocent people. It's the fastest way to win the war but you won't do it. Which means at the very least you're better than Cersei.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Still, that doesn't explain why I need your help.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Because right now you and I and Cersei and everyone else, we're children playing at a game screaming that the rules aren't fair.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You told me you liked this man.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I do.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: In the time since he's met me he's refused to call me queen, he's refused to bow and now he's calling me a child.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I believe he's calling all of us children. Figure of speech.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Your Grace, everone you know will die before winter is over if we don't defeat the enemy to the north.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: As far as I can see, you are the enemy to the north.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I am not your enemy. The dead are the enemy.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: The dead?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Is that another figure of speech?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: The Army of the Dead is on the march.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: The Army of the Dead?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You don't know me well, My Lord, but do you think I am a liar or a madman?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: No, I don't think you're either of those things.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: The Army of the Dead is real. The White Walkers are real. The Knight King is real. I've seen them. If they get past the wall and we're squabbling amongst ourselves --

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: we're finished.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I was born at Dragonstone. Not that I can remember it.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: We fled before Robert's assassins could find us. Robert was your father's best friend, no? I wonder if your father knew his best friend sent assassins to murder a baby girl in her crib. Not that it matters now of course. I spent my life in foreign lands. So many men have tried to kill me. I don't remember all of their names. I have been sold like a brood mare. I have been chained and betrayed, raped and defiled. Do you know what kept me standing through all those years in exile? Faith. Not in any gods. Not in myths and legends. In myself. In Daenerys Targaryen. The world hadn't seen a dragon in centuries until my children were born. The Dothraki hadn't crossed the sea. Any sea.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: They did for me. I was born to rule the Seven Kingdoms. And I will.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You'll be ruling over a graveyard if we don't defeat the Night King.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: The war against my sister has already begun. You can't expect us to halt hostilities and join you in fighting --

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: whatever you saw beyond the wall.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: If it doesn't matter you might as well kneel.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Swear your allegiance to Queen Daenerys. Help her to defeat my sister and together our armies will protect the north.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: There's no time for that. There's no time for any of this. While we stand here debating --

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: It takes no time to bend the knee. Pledge your sword to her cause.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: And why would I do that?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I mean no offense, Your Grace, but I don't know you. As far as I can tell your claim to the throne rests entirely on your father's name. And my own father fought to overthrow the Mad King. The lords of the north placed their trust in me to lead them. And I will continue to do so as well as I can.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: That's fair. It's also fair to point out that I'm the rightful queen of the Seven Kingdoms. By declaring yourself king of the northern most kingdom, you are in open rebellion.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You must forgive my manners. You will both be tired after your long journey. We'll have baths drawn for you and supper sent to your rooms.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Am I your prisoner?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Not yet.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Our Iron Born and Dornish allies were attacked on route to Dorne.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And?

Name: Varys
Sentence: Two or three ships escaped. The rest sunk our captured. Ellaria and the sand snakes dead or captured. The Greyjoys are dead or captured.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: All of them?

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: Euron has her.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: I couldn't save her. I tried.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: This is the life. Look at them. Cheering for a Greyjoy.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: I have to be honest, it's making me hard. Did you see little Theon's face right before he jumped overboard?

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Oh no!

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: What a twat.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: My queen. Please accept this gift on behalf of all of your loyal subjects in the Iron Islands.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: I give you --

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: what no other man could give. Justice. Justice for your murdered daughter.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You've proven yourself the greatest captain on the 14 seas and a true friend to the crown.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: A bit more than a true friend.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: And you deserve a proper reward for your heroism.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: There's only one reward I want.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You shall have what your heart desires --

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: when the war is won.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: With Euron Greyjoy commanding our naval forces and Jaime Lannister leading our armies, the sons and daugters of Westeros shall defend our country.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: There's nothing quite like it, is there? The love of the people. I suppose you wouldn't know.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: This same mob spat at my sister not long ago, and if you turn on us, they'll cheer to see your head mounted on a spike.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Or yours. They just like severed heads really. Listen, if you have any advice at all I'd love to hear it when we have an hour or two to speak as brothers.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Advice?

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Does she like it gentle or rough? A finger in the bum?

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Shhh, shhh, shhh, not now. We'll talk later.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I want you to know I understand. Even though we're enemies, you and I, I understand the fear that drives you. I was there that day when Ser Gregor crushed your lover's head. I close my eyes I can hear the sound of Oberyn's skull breaking.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: The sound of your scream. I never heard a sound like that. I thought, that's true love. Oberyn looked beautiful that day. He really did. No one moved like him. No one had such skill with a spear. Even Ser Gregor couldn't stop him. If only he hadn't taunted him. He could have walked away and left poor Ser Gregor to die. But that wasn't your lover's way, was it? Now he's burried somewhere. And here Ser Gregor is stronger than ever. That must be difficult for you. When my daughter was taken from me, my only daughter, well, you can't imagine how that feels unless you've lost a child. I fed her at my own breast even though they told me to give her to the wet nurse. I couldn't bear to see her in another woman's arms. I never got to have a mother. But Myrcella did. She was mine and you took her from me. Why did you do that?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: It doesn't matter now.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Your daughter is a beauty too. Brown eyes, those lips. A perfect Dornish beauty.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I imagine she is your favorite.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I know, I know, we're not supposed to have favorites. But still, we're only human. We love who we love.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I'm sorry. I can't understand you. The gag makes it difficult to understand what you're saying. It must be frustrating.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: We all make our choices. You chose to murder my daughter. You must have felt powerful after you made that choice.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Do you feel powerful now? I don't sleep very well, not at all really. I lie in bed and I stare at the canopy and imagine ways of killing my enemies. How to destroy Ellaria Sand, the woman who murdered my only daughter. I thought about having Ser Gregor crush your skull the way he did Oberyn's. It would be poetic I suppose but fast. Too fast.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I thought about having him crush your daughter's skull.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: She's so beautiful. The thought of this lovely face cracking open like a duck egg, no, it's just not right.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Qyburn, he's the cleverest man I know. Clever enough to learn what poison you used to murder Myrcella. The long goodbye, was that it?

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: The Long Farewell.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: That's the one.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: How long does the poison take?

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: Difficult to say. Hours, days, it depends on the subject's constitution.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: But death is certain?

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: Oh yes, Your Grace, quite certain.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Your daughter will die here in this cell. You will be here watching when she does. You will be here the rest of your days. If you refuse to eat we will force food down your throat. You will live to watch your daughter rot, to watch that beautiful face collapse to bone and dust all the while contemplating the choices you've made.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Make sure the guards change the torches every few hours. I don't want her to miss a thing.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: No.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Don't.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: What are you doing? No one can see us like this ?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I am queen of the Seven Kingdoms. I'll do as I please.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Good. And we'll need fresh sheets for the bed.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: The Iron Bank didn't send you hear to offer condolences.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: The destruction of the Sept of Baelor was a tragic accident.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: The Iron Bank wants its gold back.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: And we both know gold wins wars. Your vaults are empty. Your late husbando s profligacy saw to that.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: And the Iron Bank wants to bet on a winner.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: That's a fancy way of saying bet. The war has already begun. I've drawn first blood. I decapitated the Dornish snake. My armada owns the Narrow Sea.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Euron Greyjoy is loyal to me.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Her dragons might not be as invulnerable as some think. Now, let's talk about the Targaryen girl. You want to invest in her? I'm guessing the Iron Bank invested considerable gold in the slave trade. How are you profits now that Daenerys has freed all the slaves?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: From what I gather she considers herself more of a revolutionary that a monarch. In your experience how do bankers usually fare with revoltionaries?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: The Lannisters owe the Iron Bank quite a lot of money but Lannisters always pay their debts. Do former slaves or Dothraki or dragons?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Give me a fortnight. Stay in King's Landing as my honored guest and when you return to Braavos I swear to you my debt will be paid in full.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I came out here to brood over my failure to predict the Greyjoy attack. You're making it difficult. You look a lot better brooding than I do. You make me feel like I'm failing at brooding over failing.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I'm a prisoner on this island.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I wouldn't say you're a prisoner on this island. You're free to walk the castle, the beaches, to go wherever you want.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Except to my ship. They took my ship.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I wouldn't say we took your ship.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I'm not playing word games with you. The dead are coming for us all.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Why don't you figure out what to do about my missing fleet and murdered allies, and I'll figure out what to do about your walking dead men.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: It's hard for me to fathom. It really is. If someone told me about the White Walkers and the Night King --

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You probably don't believe me.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I do actually.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You didn't before. Grumpkins and snarks you called them. Do you remember? You said it was all nonsense.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: It was all nonsense. Everybody knew it. But then Mormont saw them and you saw them, and I trust the eyes of an honest man more than I trust what everybody knows.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: How do I convince people who don't know me that an enemey they don't believe in is coming to kill them all?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Good question.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I know it's a good question. I'm looking for an answer.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: People's minds aren't made for problems that large. White Walkers, the Night King, Army of the Dead, it's almost a relief to confront a familiar monster like my sister.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I need to help prepare my people for what's coming. I can't help them from here. I'd like to leave.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: It seems unlikely that you became King in the North by giving up that easily.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Everyone told me to learn from my father's mistakes. Don't go south. Don't answer a summons from the Mad King's daughter, a foreign invader. And here I am. A northern fool.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Children are not their fathers, luckily for all of us. And sometimes there's more to foreign invaders than northern fools that meets the eye. Daenerys could have sailed for Westeros long ago but she didn't. Instead she stayed where she was and saved many people from horrible fates some of whom are on this island with us right now. While you're our guest here you might consider asking them what they think of the Mad King's daughter. She protects people from monsters, just as you do. That's why she came here. And she's not about to head north to fight an enemy she's never seen on a word of a man she doesn't know after a single meeting. That's not a reasonable thing to ask.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: So do you have anything reasonable to ask?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: What do you mean?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Maybe you are a northern fool. I'm asking if there's something I can do to help you.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Dragonglass?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Yes. Volcanic glass, obsidian. He says you have a tremendous amount of it here.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Why are we talking about glass? We just lost two of our allies.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Which is why I was speaking to Jon Snow, a potential ally.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And what does the King in the North want with Dragonglass?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Apparently it can be turned into weapons that kill White Walkers and their foot soldiers, or stop them, destroy them. I'm unsure of the nomenclature.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And what do you think of this Army of the Dead and White Walkers and Night Kings?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I'd very much like to believe that Jon Snow is wrong, but a wise man once said that you should never believe a thing simply because you want to believe it.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Which wise man said this?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I don't remember.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Are you trying to present your own statements as ancient wisdom?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I would never do that...to you. The reason I believe Jon Snow is because he's here. All of his advisors would have told him not to come. I would have told him not to come, yet he's here anyway. You don't have to believe him. Let him mine the Dragonglass. If he's wrong it's worthless. You didn't even know it was here. It's nothing to you. Give him something by giving him nothing. Take a step toward a more productive relationship with a possible ally. Keep him occupied while we focus on the task at hand. Casterly Rock.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: What was that Ser Davos said about taking a knife in the heart for his people? Did you notice that?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You must allow them their flights of fancy. It's dreary in the north.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Amazing thing to see.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I named them for my brothers Vicerys and Rhaegon. They're both gone now.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You lost two brothers as well?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: People thought dragons were gone forever but here they are. Perhaps we should all be examining what we think we know.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You've been talking to Tyrion?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: He is my Hand.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: He enjoys talking.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: We all enjoy what we're good at.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I don't.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You know I'm not going to let Cersei stay on the Iron Throne.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I never expected that you would.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And I haven't changed my mind about which kingdoms belong to the throne.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I haven't either.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I will allow you to mine the Dragonglass and forge weapons from it. Any resources or men you need I will provide for you.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Thank you.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: So you believe me then about the Night King and the Army of the Dead?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You better get to work, Jon Snow.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: How much do we have?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: What does that mean?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: What's the longest winter in the past 100 years?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You're telling me we don't have enough food, especially not if the armies of the north come back to defend Winterfell.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: We must prepare for that eventuality. Every direction the threat comes from, this is the best place to be. We need to start building up our grain stores with regular shipments from every keep in the north. If we don't use it by winter's end we'll give it back to them, but if the entire north has to flee to Winterfell there won't be enough time to bring wagonloads of grain with them.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Maester Wolkan, you'll see to it?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Are they covering those breastplates in leather?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Well, shouldn't they be once the real cold comes?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Command suits you. The northerns are all facing north worried about the threat beyond the wall.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: So they should be.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I know Cersei better than anyone here. If you turn your back on her --

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You don't know Cersei better than anyone here.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I only meant to say --

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: That the woman who murdered my mother, father and brother is dangerous? Thank you for your wise council.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: One of two things will happen. Either the dead will defeat the living, in which case all our troubles come to an end. Or life will win out. And what then?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Don't fight in the north or the south. Fight every battle everywhere always in your mind. Everyone is your enemy, everyone is your friend, every possible series of events is happening all at once. Live that way and nothing will surprise you. Everything that happens will be something that you've seen before.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Hello, Sansa.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I wish Jon was here.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Yes. I need to speak to him.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Your father's last living true born son. You're Lord of Winterfell.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I can never be the Lord of Winterfell. I can never be lord of anything. I'm the three-eyed raven.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I don't know what that means.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: It's difficult to explain.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Try, please, for me.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: It means I can see everything. Everything that's ever happened to everyone. Everything that's happening right now. It's all pieces, fragments. I need to learn to see better. When the long night comes again I need to be ready.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: How do you know all of this?

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: The three-eyed raven taught me.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I thought you were the three-eyed raven.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I told you it's difficult to explain.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Bran --

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I'm sorry for all that's happened to you. I'm sorry it had to happen here at our home. It was so beautiful that night. Snow falling just like now. And you were so beautiful in your white wedding dress.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I have to go back inside, Bran.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I'll stay a bit longer.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: A bit. Less than before.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: I don't know anything about that. I just started feeling better. I assumed it was the rest that did it.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: And the climate.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: How bad is it?

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: I surrendered to this sickness the moment I first saw it. I knew it would kill me or I'd kill myself before it could. Daenerys Stormborn convinced me otherwise. The only place for me is with her.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: I owe my life to her and you.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: Perhaps our paths will cross again?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: We need to find Euron Greyjoy's fleet and sink it.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Your Grace, he's already destroyed a good portion of our fleet. To send our remaining ships after him --

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I'm not talking about sending our ships after him.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: But you'll have to go yourself. Euron's ships could be anywhere or in more than one place. You'd be flying around the open seas alone for who knows how long.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I wouldn't be alone. I'd have Drogon, Vicerion and Rhaegal. What can anyone do to them?

Name: Missandei
Sentence: They can still do something to you. It only takes one arrow.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: It's too great a risk. You're too important.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: What about Casterly Rock?

Name: Varys
Sentence: The Unsullied will be there soon.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: And what will they face?

Name: Varys
Sentence: A difficult situation. They know we're coming.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Yes. Cersei believes my sole purpose in life is to destroy House Lannister. She will be ready.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: No one has ever taken the rock.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: The Lannister army is still the army my father built. Well trained and well provisioned. 10,000 men at least. They will see us coming.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: They will be ready.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: The gates of Casterly Rock are impregnable.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: The fight up the walls will be hard. We'll be at a disadvantage. Many men will die.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Interesting thing about my father. He built our house up from near ruin. He built our army. He built Casterly Rock as we know it, but he didn't build the sewers. That was beneath him. So he gave the job to the lowest person he could find. Me. He was right. I was low. The company I kept low, women mostly. They weren't welcome at the Rock. Father disapproved of that sort of behavior. I couldn't walk them through the front gates. I couldn't have them in my chambers. So in the process of building the sewers I threw in something for myself.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: It was a passage that began by the sea and ended beneath one of the main guard towers.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: No better place for low pursuits. Casterly Rock, the impregnable fortress.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: As a good friend of mine once said, "give me 10 good men and I'll impregnate the bitch."

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: And so it begins. They will face the bulk of the Lannister forces. They will be outnumbered. They will have less armor and fewer weapons.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: But as my sister's armies fights for her, the Unsullied will be fighting for something greater. They will be fighting for freedom and the person who gave it to them. They will be fighting for you. And that is why they will triump.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: There are supposed to be more than this. Many more.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: Where are they? Where are the rest of the Lannisters?

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: It's done?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: It is.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: And now the rains weep for our whores. Did we fight well?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I suppose as well as can be expected.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: It was never our forte. Golden roses indeed. Your brother and his new queen thought you would be defending Casterly Rock.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: The truth is Casterly Rock isn't worth much anymore. Well, it is to me. My fond childhood memories won't keep Cersei on the throne.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: So you'll just let them take it?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: For now. They won't be able to hold it. Euron Greyjoy's navy burned their ships, we emptied the larders before we left. Eventually they'll be forced to abandon their position and march all the way across Westeros.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: And you took your army, your real army, and went where they weren't?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: As Robb Stark did to me at Whispering Wood. There are always lessons in failures.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: Yes. You must be very wise by now.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: My father always said I was a slow learner.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: If he was so clever why didn't he take Highgarden the moment your gold mines ran dry? I suppose I'll be able to ask him myself soon enough. No more learning from my mistakes, eh? How will you do it? With that sword?

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: That was Joffrey's sword, wasn't it? Not that he ever used it. What did he call it?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Widow's Wail.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: He really was a cunt, wasn't he? I did unspeakable things to protect my family, or watched them being done on my orders. I never lost a night's sleep over them. They were necessary. And whatever I imagined necessary for the safety of House Tyrell I did. But your sister has done things I wasn't capable of imagining. That was my prize mistake, a failure of imagination. She's a monster, you do know that?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: To you, sure. To others as well. But after we've won and there's no one left to oppose us, the people living peaceful in the world she built, do you really think they'll wring their hands over the way she built it?

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: You love her. You really do love her. You poor fool. She'll be the end of you.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Possibly. Not much to be gained from discussing it with you though, is there?

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: What better person to discuss it with? What better guarantee could you have that the things you say will never leave this room? But perhaps you're right. If she's driven you this far it's gone beyond your control.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Yes, it has.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: She's a disease. I regret my role in spreading it. You will too.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I think we're done here.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: How will it happen?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Cersei had several ideas. Whipping you through the streets and beheading you in front of the Red Keep. Flaying you alive and hanging you from the walls of King's Landing. I talked her out of those.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: Will there be pain?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: No. I made sure of that.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: That's good.

Name: Olenna Tyrell
Sentence: I'd hate to die like your son clawing at my neck, foam and bile spilling from my mouth, eyes blood red, skin purple. It must have been horrible for you as a Kingsguard, as a father. It was horrible enough for me. A shocking scene. Not at all what I intended. You see, I'd never seen the posion work before. Tell Cersei. I want her to know it was me.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Halt that wagon!

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: opens the carriage. It is filled with gold bars and coins. He picks up a large sack and hands it to BRONN.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I'll save my confessions for the High Septon.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: No, there isn't, is there?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: is putting a padlock on the wagon bearing the gold. He stops and turns to BRONN.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: That's a lot of money I just gave you.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You don't want Highgarden.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: We're at war. Daenerys Targaryen could come take it back the day after you move in. Besides, think of the upkeep. The more you own, the more it weighs you down.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: pounds on the back of the carriage and the horses start trotting.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: They're not mine. The gold belongs to the Iron Bank. We pay our debts.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Bronn of the Blackwater, formerly of whatever nameless shit heap you're from with a saddlebag full of gold complaining about not getting paid. When we win this war all the castles in the Seven Kingdoms will be yours to choose from with no one left to take them away from you.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Stranger things have happened.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: The current harvest?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: looks over to BRONN.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Ser Bronn, will you accompany the Tarleys and help them accelerate this process?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: No, but motivating reluctant farmers to hand over their harvest, I've heard you guys have a real talent for that.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: and TYCHO NESTORIS from the Iron Bank of Braavos are sitting having a discussion.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You're too kind, My Lord.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Is on its way. My brother is supervising its transportation himself.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: We must devise a way to raise their spirits.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: My only venture at the moment is reestablishing control over this continent and every person on it.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: It will indeed. I need to expand my armies, my navies. My hand, Qyburn, had made overtures to the Golden Company in Essos.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: That's good to hear. I too would like them to recover some things that belong to me.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: is sitting in a wheelchair. PETER BAELISH is sitting next to him. BAELISH unsheathes a Valyrian steel dagger and shows it to BRAN. It's the same dagger used in the attempt to assassinate BRAN years ago.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: This is for you.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: flips the knife in his hand and extends it towards BRAN.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: The last man who wielded it meant to cut your throat, but your mother fought him off.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: reaches out and takes the knife, turning it and looking it over carefully.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: The other dagger, the one that took her life, I would have stopped that dagger with my own heart if I could have. I wasn't there for her when she needed me most. But I am here for her now. To do what she would have done, to protect her children. Anything I can do for you, Brandon, you need only ask.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Do you know who this belonged to?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: No. That very question was what started the War of the Five Kings. In a way, that dagger made you what you are today. Forced from your home, driven out to the wilds beyond the Wall. I imagine you've seen things most men wouldn't believe.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: hands the sheath of the knife to BRAN. BRAN slides the knife into the sheath.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: To go through all of that and make your way home again only to find such chaos in the world, I can only imagine --

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Chaos is a ladder.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: is staring at BAELISH. BAELISH stops speaking. The door opens and Meera appears.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I'm sorry to have disturbed you, Lord Stark.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: stands up to leave.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I'm not Lord Stark.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: bows and walks past Meera and closes the door.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Maester Wolkan built it for me so I can move around more easily.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: You're leaving?

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: No, I don't.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Thank you.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: For helping me.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I'm not really, not anymore. I remember what it felt like to be Brandon Stark, but I remember so much else now.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: approaches the main gate on foot. Two guards are huddled by a brazier getting warm. There's indistinct chatter. One of the men notice ARYA walking to the gate and approach her.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: In there. I live here.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I'm Arya Stark. This is my home.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Send for Maester Llewyn or Ser Rodrick. They'll tell you who I am.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Go ask Jon Snow then, the King in the North. He's my brother

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: If Jon Snow is gone who is in charge of Winterfell?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Which Lady Stark?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Tell Sansa her sister is home.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I'm getting into this castle one way or another. If I'm not who I say I am, I won't last long. But if I am, and Sansa finds out that you turned me away...

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: keeps glancing at the men. They look uneasy. They bring her inside of the gate. They indicate towards a cart near the entrance.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: is glancing around Winterfell. Men are working building tools and cutting wood. ARYA looks over and sees a Winterfell flag sigil hanging from the wall. The two guards are still arguing.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: sighs.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You don't have to. I know where she is.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: is standing look at a statue of Ned Stark holding his sword. ARYA hears a sound and turns to see SANSA approaching. SANSA stops when she sees ARYA.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Do I have to call you Lady Stark now?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: hesitates for a moment.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Yes.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: begins smiling then walking towards ARYA. SANSA reaches out and hugs ARYA.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You shouldn't have run from the guards.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I didn't run. You need better guards.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: smirks at ARYA.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: It suits you, Lady Stark. Jon left you in charge?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: He did. I hope he comes back soon. I remember how happy he was to see me. When he sees you, his heart will probably stop.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: That doesn't look like him. It should have been carved by someone who knew his face.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Everyone who knew his face is dead.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: We're not.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: turns to face SANSA.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: They say you killed Joffrey. Did you?

Name: Sansa Stark
