Sentence: I wish I had.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Me too. I was angry when I heard someone else had done it. However long my list got he was always first.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Your list?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Of people I'm going to kill.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: begins to laugh. ARYA joins her.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: How did you get back to Winterfell?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: It's a long story. I imagine yours is too.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Yes. It's not a very pleasant one.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Mine neither, but our stories aren't over yet.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: No, they're not.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Arya, Bran's home too.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: smiles and looks at SANSA. SANSA doesn't smile back. The smile fades from ARYA's face.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: is sitting next to the Weirwood tree. SANSA and ARYA approach. BRAN turns to look at them. BRAN begins speaking to ARYA.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: You came home.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: steps forward and throws her arms around BRAN. SANSA smiles in the background. ARYA lets go and steps back.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I saw you at the crossroads.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: You saw me?

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I see quite a lot now.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Bran has visions.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I thought you might go to King's Landing.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: So did I.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Why would you go back there?

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Cersei is on her list of names.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: stares at BRAN. ARYA turns to look at SANSA.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Who else is on your list?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Most of them are dead already.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: produces the Valyrian dagger that BAELISH gave him and unsheathes it.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Where did you get this?

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Littlefinger gave it to me.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Littlefinger, he's here?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: turns to look at SANSA.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: He's declared for House Stark.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: steps up closer to BRAN and speaks to him.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Why would he give you a dagger?

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: He thought I'd want it.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Why?

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Because it was meant to kill me.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: The cutthroat after your fall?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Why would a cutthroat have a Valyrian steel dagger?

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Someone very wealthy wanted me dead.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: He's not a generous man. He wouldn't give you anything unless he thought he was getting something back.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: It doesn't matter.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: What do you mean it doesn't matter?

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I don't want it.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: holds the knife out to ARYA. ARYA looks at BRAN.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Are you sure? It's Valyrian steel.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: It's wasted on a cripple.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: looks down at the dagger. She steps forward and takes it from BRAN.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: is pushing BRAN in his wheelchair and SANSA is next to them. The Stark children are walking back through the gate of Winterfell. Men are milling around doing various jobs. BRIENNE and PODRICK see the Stark children all back at Winterfell together.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: and MISSANDEI are walking along a path outside of Dragonstone followed by members of the Queensguard.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: Your Grace, there's still no word from the Unsullied.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Soon. They will come back to me.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: He better.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: stops and turns to look at MISSANDEI. She then continues walking.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: What happened?

Name: Missandei
Sentence: begins smirking.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: Many things.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Many things?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Your Grace.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: looks at MISSANDEI then her Queensguard. She speaks in Valyrian and motions to her guard to stand down.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: It's all right.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: descends the stairs with MISSANDEI and they begin walking with JON. They walk along the beach until they reach a cave. DAVOS is waiting for them with a lit torch.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I wanted you to see it before we start hacking it to bits.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: leads DAENERYS and MISSANDEI into the cave. He lights a brazier and illuminates the Dragonglass along the walls. He continues walking deeper into the cave.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: So this is it, all we'll ever need.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: is looking up at the walls of Dragonglass.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: There is something else I want to show your, Your Grace.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: and DAENERYS go to a further chamber in the cave. There are murals painted on the walls of Dragonglass.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: The Children of the Forest made these.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: When?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: A very long time ago.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: They were right here standing where we're standing before there were Targaryens or Starks or Lannisters. Maybe even before there were men.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: No.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: stops looking at the walls and turns to look at JON. JON walks to another wall and begins to examine the murals. The murals depict Children of the Forest and the First Men standing together.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: They were here together the Children and the First Men.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Doing what? Fighting each other?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: takes DAENERYS by the arm and swings her torch to another part of the wall. There is a mural of the Night King and White Walkers.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: They fought together against their common enemy. Despite their differences, despite their suspicions, together. We need to do the same if we're going to survive.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: and DAENERYS look back at the wall with the Night King.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Because the enemy is real. It's always been real.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: turns to look at JON.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And you say you can't defeat them without my armies and my dragons?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: No, I don't think I can.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: steps forward closer to JON.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I will fight for you. I will fight for the north...when you bend the knee.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: My people won't accept a southern ruler, not after everything they've suffered.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: steps even closer to JON until they're face to face.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: They will if their king does. They chose you to lead them. They chose you to protect them. Isn't their survival more important than your pride?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: and DAENERYS, DAVOS and MISSANDEI are walking out of the cave. As they exit TYRION and VARYS are standing on the beach awaiting them. DAENERYS begins addressing Tyrion.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: What is it?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: We took Casterly Rock.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: That's very good to hear.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: and VARYS look at each other. They aren't eager to deliver the bad news.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Isn't it?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You will stay. All my allies are gone. They've been taken from me while I've been sitting here on this island.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: We still have the largest army.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Who won't be able to eat because Cersei has taken all the food from the Reach.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Call Grey Worm and the Unsullied back. We still have enough ships to carry the Dothraki to the mainland. Commit to the blockade of King's Landing. We have a plan. It's still the right plan.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: stops walking, turns and speaks harshly to Tyrion.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: The right plan? Your strategy has lost us Dorne, the Iron Islands and the Reach.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: If I've underestimated our enemies --

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Our enemies? Your family, you mean. Perhaps you don't want to hurt them after all.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: begins looking out to the ocean. Three dragons are flying in the sky over the water.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Enough with the clever plans.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: turns back and looks at TYRION.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I have three large dragons. I'm going to fly them to the Red Keep.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: We've discussed this.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: My enemies are in the Red Keep. What kind of a queen am I if I'm not willing to risk my life to fight them?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: A smart one.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: looks over to JON SNOW.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: What do you think I should do?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I would never presume to --

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I'm at war. I'm losing.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: begins walking close to JON.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: looks over the ocean at the dragons flying.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I never thought that dragons would exist again. No one did. The people who follow you know that you made something impossible happen. Maybe that helps them believe that you can make other impossible things happen. Build a world that's different from the shit one they've always known.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: glances back towards the dragons.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: But if you use them to melt castles and burn cities, you're not different. You're just more of the same.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: looks back out to her dragons flying along the water.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: is watching the sparring session from across the courtyard. She begins to approach Brienne.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Don't fight someone like her in the first place.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: looks down at the Valyrian dagger and unsheathes it. She approaches BRIENNE flipping the knife several times in her fingers. BRIENNE takes the dagger and examines it.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: and BAELISH are walking along the upper section of the courtyard having a conversation.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: If they haven't contributed the right amount of grain to the stores then I'm afraid they'll have to make due with --

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: sees ARYA in the courtyard speaking with BRIENNE and stops to watch her.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: It's been awhile since I've trained.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: He didn't beat the hound. You did. I want to train with you.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: You swore to serve both of my mother's daughters, didn't you?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I won't cut you. Don't worry.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: No one.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: collects her sword. SANSA walks away. BAELISH remains on the balcony staring at ARYA who looks up at him. BAELISH bows to ARYA and walks away.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: and DAVOS are walking along the paths outside of Dragonstone having a discussion.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Who?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I think she has a good heart.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: There's no time for that. I saw the Night King, Davos. I looked into his eyes. How many men do we have in the north to fight him? 10,000? Less?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: What?

Name: Missandei
Sentence: turns to looks at DAVOS and JON.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: Ser Davos, Lord Snow.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: It doesn't matter.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: Forgive me, but may I ask a question?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Of course.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: Your name is Jon Snow, but your father's name was Ned Stark?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I'm a bastard. My mother and father weren't married.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: We don't have marriage in Naarth so the concept of a bastard doesn't exist.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Why did you leave your homeland?

Name: Missandei
Sentence: I was stolen away by slavers.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I'm sorry.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: She bought me from my master and set me free.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: I serve my queen because I want to serve my queen. Because I believe in her.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: And if you wanted to sail home to Naarth tomorrow --

Name: Missandei
Sentence: Then she would give me a ship and wish me good fortune.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You believe that?

Name: Missandei
Sentence: I know it. All of us who came with her from Essos, we believe in her. She's not our queen because she's the daughter of some king we never knew. She's the queen we chose.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: notices a single ship sailing into the bay. It has a kraken sigil. MISSANDEI turns to look.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Is that a Greyjoy ship?

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: GREYJOY and other Iron Born are pulling their landing boat onto the beach wading through the surf. They pull the boat onto the sand. JON SNOW, MISSANDEI, DAVOS and Dothraki guards are waiting to meet them. JON sees THEON and both men freeze and stare at each other. JON steps forward towards THEON.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: Jon. I didn't know you were here.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: steps closer to JON.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: Sansa, is she all right?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: grabs THEON by his shirt and pulls him face to face.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: What you did for her is the only reason I'm not killing you.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: releases THEON.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: I should be.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: Euron has her. I came to ask the queen to help get her back.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: The queen is gone.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: Where did she go?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Good.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: We are stretched a bit thin.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Let's give them fair warning first. These men fought well at Highgarden.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Rickon.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I hear you fought bravely at Highgarden. Your first battle?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: And?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: They didn't deserve to die. But Lady Olenna chose to betray the queen and support the Targaryen girl. So here we are.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: looks over at BRONN

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: What?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Spears and shields! Spears and shields!

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Spears and shields!

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I'm not abandoning my army.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: We can hold them off.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Dracarys!

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Hold the line!

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Archers! Archers with me!

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Knock!

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Loose!

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Qyburn's scorpion is over there.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I can't shoot with one hand.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: holds up his gold hand to illustrate his point.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Come on!

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: walks to the edge of the battlefield accompanied by Dothraki guards. He can see Lannisters being slaughtered. One of the Dothraki guards begin to speak.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: is watching the mayhem. Men are screaming and engulfed in flames. Horses and carriages run wild with no driver. JAIME is still on the battlefield struggling against the horde. Burning Lannister men are taking off their helmets revealing melted faces. Men crawl to the river in search of relief from the dragonfire. DROGON and DAENERYS are flying over the river creating wake in the water. JAIME sees her approaching his position.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Take cover!

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: commands DROGON to fire at the crossbow.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Flee, you idiot!

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: looks at DAENERYS and readies himself. He spurs his horse onward.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Come on, boy. Come on!

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: grabs the spear as he rides by and brings it up to position. JAIME's horse is galloping full speed on the edge of the river kicking up water. TYRION is watching JAIME's attempt to kill DAENERYS.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You fucking idiot.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: is getting close. DAENERYS turns at the last moment to see JAIME bearing down on her spear in hand. DROGON notices JAIME, turns his head and spews flames. BRONN appears from nowhere and manages to dive off of his horse and knock JAIME and himself in the water before they're both consumed by fire. Their horses are instantly burned to death. JAIME is being dragged down by a full set of armor into the dark water. JAIME sinks into blackness and out of sight.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You could have killed me.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Ending the war by killing her.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: sits up and says nothing to BRONN. BRONN sits up and faces JAIME.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: That was only one of them. She has two more. If she decides to use them, to really use them --

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Don't you mean we're fucked?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I have to tell Cersei.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: is walking over an ash covered ground. There are burned bodies and cargo strewn about. Dothraki are looting dead Lannister soldies. A group of mounted Dothraki are escorting captured Lannister soldiers to where DAENERYS and DROGON are awaiting the prisoners. DAENERYS addresses the captured soldiers.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I know what Cersei has told you, that I've come to destroy your cities --

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: burn down your homes, murder you and orphan your children. That's Cersei Lannister, not me. I'm not here to murder. And all I want to destroy is the wheel that is rolled over rich and poor to the benefit of no one but the Cersei Lannisters of the world. I offer you a choice. Bend the knee and join me. Together we will leave the world a better place than we found it, or refuse and die.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Step forward, My Lord.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You will not kneel?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: My sister, she wasn't your queen until recently though, was she, until she murdered your rightful queen and destroyed House Tyrell for all time. So it appears your allegiances are somewhat flexible.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You will not trade your honor for your life. I respect that.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: turns to speak to DAENERYS.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Perhaps he could take the black, Your Grace. Whatever else he is, he is a true soldier. He would be invaluable at the Wall.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: turns to look at her Dothraki escort. The Dothraki walk forward to collect RANDYLL. As the men are pulling RANDYLL away DICKON steps forward.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Who are you?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You are the future of your house. This war has already wiped one great house from the world. Don't let it happen again. Bend the knee.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: turns to speak to DAENERYS. He speaks softly so no one but the queen can hear.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Your Grace, nothing strips bold notions from a man's head like a few weeks in a dark cell.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I meant what I said. I'm not here to put men in chains. If that becomes an option many will take it. I gave them a choice. They made it.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Your Grace, if you begin beheading entire families --

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I'm not beheading anyone.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: pauses and looks over the DROGON. DRGON roars and shakes his head and flexes his wings.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Your Grace --

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: looks to her Dothraki escort and gives a signal. The men grab RANDYLL and DICKON and walk them over to DROGON. RANDYLL takes DICKON by the arm.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Lord Randyll Tarley, Dickon Tarley, I, Daenerys of House Targaryen, First of my name, Breaker of Chains and Mother of Dragons, sentence you to die.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: pauses a moment and looks at RANDYLL and DICKON.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Dracarys.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: is quickly walking down the hall leading to CERSEI's room. As he approaches, QYBURN exits the queen's chambers.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: My Lord.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: passes by QYBURN without saying a word and barges into CERSEI's quarters. CERSEI stand and walks over to JAIME.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: How many men did we lose?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: We haven't done a full counting.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: It's armies that win wars. We have the Tyrell gold, we have the Iron Bank behind us. We can buy mercenaries.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: shakes his head.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: They're not the same as our men but they'll fight if they're well paid, which they will be.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I just saw the Dothraki fight. They'll beat any mercenary army. They'll beat any army I've ever seen. Killing our men wasn't war for them, it was sport. Her dragon burned a thousand wagons. Qyburn's scorpion fired bolts bigger than you. They couldn't stop it. And she has three of them. This isn't a war we can win.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: So what do we do? Sue for peace? I sit on her father's throne, the father you betrayed and murdered. And in her mind she's winning. What sort of offer do you think she'd make?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: turns and walks away from JAIME.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Maybe we can count on Tyrion to intercede on our behalf by way of apology for murdering our father and our son.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: He didn't.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You saw the crossbow, you saw his body.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: walks across the room to where CERSEI is standing.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I'm not talking about father. Tyrion didn't kill Joffrey. He had nothing to do with it.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: After all this time it still amazes me --

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: It was Olenna. She confessed before she died.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: And this was before or after she drank the poison you so kindly provided her?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: After.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: And you believed her?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: If you were Olenna would you rather have seen your granddaughter married to Joffrey or Tommen? Which one would Margerey been better able to control? Which one would have made Olenna the true ruler of the Seven Kingdoms? She was telling the truth.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: looks away, then sits down.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I shouldn't have listened to you. She should have died screaming.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: She's dead like her son, her grandchildren, her whole house. And if we don't find a way out of this war we'll follow them.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: So we fight and die or we submit and die. I know my choice. A soldier should know his.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: SNOW is standing on the edge of a cliff looking towards the ocean. DROGON roars and flies over him with DAENERYS on his back. DROGON lands next to JON and charges towards him. DROGON opens his jaws and roars in JON's face. DROGON creeps closer until he is inches from JON. JON removes his glove and slowly extends his hand toward DROGON. DROGON lowers his head and allows JON to touch him. DAENERYS looks surprised and steps down from her mount. DROGON turns and flies away.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: They're beautiful, aren't they?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: That wasn't the word I was thinking of, but, yes, they are. Gorgeous beasts.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: They're not beasts to me. No matter how big they get, how terrifying to everyone else, they're my children.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: turns to look at her three dragons as they fly over Dragonstone in the distance.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You weren't gone long.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: turns back to JON.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: No.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: And?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And I have fewer enemies today than I did yesterday.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: pauses and doesn't say anything.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You're not sure how you feel about that?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: No, I'm not.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: turns and starts walking towards the castle, JON follows.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: How many men did your army kill taking Winterfell back from the Boltons?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Thousands.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: We both want to help people. We can only help them from a position of strength. Sometimes strength is terrible. When you first came here Ser Davos said you took a knife in the heart for your people.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Ser Davos gets carried away.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: So it was a figure of speech?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: doesn't say anything. A group of Dothraki guards approach DAENERYS and speak in their native tongue.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: He is my friend.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: kneels before DAENERYS.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: Your Grace.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: stands.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Jon Snow, this is Ser Jorah Mormont, an old friend.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I served with your father. He was a great man.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: nods to JON.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You look strong. You found a cure?

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: I wouldn't be here if I hadn't. I return to your service, my queen, if you'll have me.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: It would be my honor.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: steps forward and hugs JORAH.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: s eyes are pure white. They wash back to their normal color. He is sitting in front of the Weirwood. Maester Wolkan stands next to him.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Ravens. We need to send ravens.

Name: Varys
Sentence: and TYRION are sitting on the stairs of the Throne Room alone. VARYS has a sealed raven scroll in his hand tapping it on the stone. TYRION is drinking a glass of wine having a discussion with VARYS.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: All rulers demand that people bend the knee. It's why they're rulers. She gave Tarley a choice. A man who had taken up arms against her. What else could she do?

Name: Varys
Sentence: Not burn him alive alongside his son.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I am her hand, not her head. I can't make her decisions for her.

Name: Varys
Sentence: That's what I used to tell myself about her father. I found the traitors but I wasn't the one burning them alive. I was only a purveyor of information.

Name: Varys
Sentence: reaches over to TYRION's cup of wine, picks it up and begins to drink from it. He grimaces as he drinks.

Name: Varys
Sentence: It's what I told myself when I watched them beg for mercy, "I'm not the one doing it." As the pitch of their screams rose higher, "I'm not the one doing it." When their hair caught fire and the smell of the burning flesh filled the Thone Room, "I'm not the one doing it."

Name: Varys
Sentence: drinks again and sets the cup down next to TYRION. TYRION picks it up.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Daenerys is not her father.

Name: Varys
Sentence: And she never will be... with the right counsel. You need to find a way to make her listen.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: looks down at the note in VARYS's hand.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Who is that for?

Name: Varys
Sentence: Jon Snow.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Did you read it?

Name: Varys
Sentence: It's a sealed scroll for the King in the North.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: pauses and drinks from his cup of wine.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: What's it say?

Name: Varys
Sentence: Nothing good.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: and VARYS are seated at the painted table. TYRION and JORAH stand near the queen. DAVOS and JON SNOW are standing on the other end of the table. JON is holding a raven scroll and reading it.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I thought Arya was dead. I thought Bran was dead.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I'm happy for you. You don't look happy.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Bran saw the Night King and his army marching towards Eastwatch. If they make it past the wall --

Name: Varys
Sentence: The Wall has kept them out for thousands of years. Presumably --

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: interrupts VARYS.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I need to go home.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You said you don't have enough men.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: We'll fight with the men we have. Unless you'll join us.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And give the country to Cersei? As soon as I march away she marches in.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Perhaps not. Cersei thinks the Army of the Dead is nothing but a story made up by wet nurses to frighten children. What if we prove her wrong?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I don't think she'll come see the dead at my invitation.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: begins walking around the table closer to JON.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: So bring the dead to her.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I thought that was what we are trying to avoid.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: We don't have to bring the whole army. Only one soldier.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: The first White I ever saw was brought into Castle Black from beyond the Wall.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Bring one of these things down to King's Landing and show her the truth.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Anything you bring back will be useless unless Cersei grants us an audience and is somehow convinced not to murder us the moment we set foot in the capital.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: The only person she listens to is Jaime. He may listen to me.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And how would you get into King's Landing.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: nods his head.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Well, it will all be for nothing if we don't have one of these dead men.

Name: Varys
Sentence: Fair point. How do you propose to find one?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: pauses and stares at the ground. JORAH breaks the silence.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: With the queen's permission I'll go north and take one.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: turns to look at JORAH.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: You asked me to find a cure so I could serve you. Allow me to serve you.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: The free folk will help us. They know the real north better than anyone.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: They won't have to.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I'm the only one here whose fought them. I'm the only one here who knows them.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I haven't given you permission to leave.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: With respect, Your Grace, I don't need your permission. I am a king. And I came here knowing that you could have your men behead me or your dragons burn me alive. I put my trust in you, a stranger, because I knew it was the best chance for my people, for all our people. Now I'm asking you to trust in a stranger because it's our best chance.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: pauses for a moment then nods her head in agreement.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You're very kind, my lords, but Jon is our king. He is doing what he thinks is best.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: and ARYA are walking through the hall to SANSA's quarters having a discussion.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I warned Jon this would happen. He can't leave the north and expect it to just sit and wait for him like Ghost.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: He didn't. He trusted you to hold it for him.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Well, he's not making it easy. The northern lords are proud.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: These are mother and father's chambers.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: And?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Nothing.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Don't do that.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: turns around to face ARYA.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: What?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Say what you mean.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: You always liked nice things. It made you feel better than everyone.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: drops the papers in her hand on a table and looks at ARYA.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Are you angry with me?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: They were insulting Jon and you sat there and listened.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I listened to their complaints, which is my responsibility as Lady of Winterfell.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Their opinions are important to you?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Glover has 500 men. Royce has 2,000. Offend them and Jon loses his army.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Not if they lose their heads first.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Winterfell didn't just fall into our hands. We took it back, and the Mormonts and the Hornwoods and the Wildlings and the Vale, all of us working together. Now, I'm sure cutting off heads is very satisfying, but that's not the way you get people to work together.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: And if Jon doesn't come back, you'll need their support, so you can work together to give you what you really want.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: How can you even think such a horrible thing?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: You're thinking it right now. You don't want to be, but the thought just won't go away.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: and ARYA stare at each in silence for a moment.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I have work to do.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: turns and walks away from ARYA.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: My lady.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: exits the room.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Last time I was here I killed my father with a crossbow.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: turns to look at DAVOS. DAVOS walks next to TYRION and stakes the boat anchor into the sand.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: begins walking towards the path. DAVOS follows him and quickly takes the lead. TYRION stops and looks back towards the unattended boat.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You're not staying here?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: What if someone takes the boat?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: We don't have time for this. We should be preparing the city for a siege. The Dothraki are coming.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I seem to recall them giving you a bit of trouble as well.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Why down here?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Today might be the day I kill you by accident.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I needed to see you and I knew you'd never agree to meet.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: remains silent and stares at TYRION.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You made me look like a complete fool. I thought I'd surprise you by hitting Casterly Rock, but you were three steps ahead of me. You abandoned the family home. Completely unsentimental. Father would have been proud.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Don't talk about our father.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Listen to me --

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I once told Bronn that if I ever saw you again I'd cut you in half.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: glances down at the sword in JAIME's hand.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: It would take you awhile with a sparring sword.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: shakes his head and says nothing.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: He was going to execute me. He knew I was innocent. He didn't hate me because of anything I did, he hated me because of what I am. The little monster sent to punish him. Do you think I wanted to be born this way? Did he think I chose --

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: What do you want?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Daenerys will win this war. You're a military man. You must know there is no way around it. Daenerys is not her father. She's even willing to suspend hostilities if Cersei agrees to certain terms.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You want Cersei to bend the knee you can ask her yourself.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I -- I don't. Daenerys doesn't. Not right now anyway. She has a more important request.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Fish hook. Some men you just can't teach.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: He'll do.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: opens the door and step into the queen's room. CERSEI is seated near a window speaking to QYBURN.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: That won't be necessary.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: bows his head and walks to leave the room. As he passes by JAIME he addresses him.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: Ser Jaime.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: closes the door as he leaves. JAIME and CERSEI are alone. CERSEI begins walking over to a chair in front of JAIME and sits.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Why was QYBURN here?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: He's Hand of the Queen. Why are you here?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I met with Tyrion.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: pauses for a moment making JAIME uncomfortable.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: What did our brother have to say?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Daenerys wants to meet.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: To discuss a surrender?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: To discuss an armistice.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: She just won a great victory. Why would she want a truce now?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Because an army of dead men is marching on the Seven Kingdoms. Tyrion claims he'll have proof.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: smirks and looks away from JAIME.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Are you going to punish him?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Tyrion?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Bronn.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: looks confused.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: He betrayed you. He set up a meeting without your knowledge or consent. Do you think anything of importance happens in this city without me knowing?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You let it happen. Why?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I've come to believe that accomodation with the Dragon Queen could be in our immediate interest. She has the numbers. If we want to beat her we have to be clever. We have to fight her like father would have. Dead men, dragons and Dragon Queens, whatever stands in our way we will defeat it ourselves for our house. For this.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: lifts her hands from the chair and places them both on her stomach indicating she's pregnant. JAIME looks shocked.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Who will you say is the father?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: People won't like that.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: stands from her chair and walks in front of JAIME.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Do you remember what father used to say about people?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: The lion doesn't concern himself with the opinions of the sheep.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: reaches forward and takes CERSEI and kisses her. While they embrace CERSEI speaks to JAIME.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Never betray me again.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: stops and turns around to face DAVOS.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You survived King's Landing.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Your Grace, this is --

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: looks to DAVOS.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I saw your father once at Winterfell.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You're a lot leaner.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: stops smiling and pauses a moment. Then he chuckles.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I grew up on stories about them.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Do you know how to use one?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Well, that's a problem.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: nods.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: We could use the help.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You may not believe it, but I've missed you Mormont. Nobody glowers quite like you. Not even Grey Worm.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: retrieves a gold coin from his pocket and turns it in his hands.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: This is the coin the slaver gave me when I suggested he free us and pay us. Remember?

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: It was supposed to last us the rest of our lives.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: smiles and hands the coin to JORAH.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Take it with you. You'll bring it back. Our queen needs you.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: nods to TYRION. DAENERYS appears and walks up to JORAH.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: We should be better at saying farewell by now.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: Your Grace, I --

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: reaches forward and takes JORAH by his hands. JON SNOW, DAVOS and GENDRY exit the cave and walk towards the boats. JORAH bends and kisses DAENERY's hand. He turns and continues readying the boat. JON stands in front of DAENERYS.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: If I don't return at least you won't have to deal with the King in the North anymore.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: smiles.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: But I've grown used to him.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I wish you good fortune in the wars to come, Your Grace.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: nods to JON. JON turns and walks to the head of the boat. The men take hold of it.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Heave!

Name: Gilly
Sentence: Do you know how many steps there are in the Citadel?

Name: Gilly
Sentence: Guess how many windows are in the Great Sept of Baelor.

Name: Gilly
Sentence: That's true. This High Septon Meynard, he recorded everything. He even recorded his own bowel movements. What does "annulment" mean?

Name: Gilly
Sentence: Meynard says here that he issued an anullment for Prince Rhaegar and remarried him to someone else at the same time in a secret ceremony in Dorne. Is that a common thing --

Name: Gilly
Sentence: Steps. That number was steps.

Name: Gilly
Sentence: Are you sure you want to do this? You always wanted to be a maester.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: is in the kennels observing PETER BAELISH and a Winterfell servant having a conversation. The servent is whispering in BAELISH's ear. ARYA can't hear the conversation. ARYA sees BAELISH hand the servant a raven scroll. The servant turns to leave. BAELISH senses someone is watching him and he looks to where ARYA stood but she has already vanished. BAELISH turns and leaves the kennels.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: is on the upper level looking down at BAELISH. He is having a conversation with ROBETT GLOVER and YOHN ROYCE. She can't hear what's being said. BAELISH finishes his conversation and walks away from the men. ARYA disappears behind the corner and continues following BAELISH.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: is walking down the hallway. She pauses, peers around a corner and looks towards the door of BAELISH's quarters. BAELISH appears and unlocks his door. Before he walks in MAESTER WOLKAN approaches him. She continues watching the men.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: reads the note then looks at WOLKAN.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Are you sure this is the only copy at Winterfell?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Lady Stark thanks you for your service.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: and the raiding party land on the Beach of Eastwatch. JON looks up at the castle. The men collect their equipment and make for the castle.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Two.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Both.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: looks around the table.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Not enough.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: smiles and shakes his head. TORMUND is disappointed.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: We were hoping some of your men could help.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You're The Hound. I saw you once at Winterfell.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: Thoros?

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: I hardly recognized you.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: He was my father.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: You returned the favor, as I recall.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: Don't you want to know what we're doing?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: He's right. We're all on the same side.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: We're all breathing.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Are you all right?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Ever been north before?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You've never been down south.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: That's the north.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: There's not another woman within 100 miles of here.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: glances at GENDRY. GENDRY backs away from JON and TORMUND.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Davos says he is a strong fighter.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: She'll only fight beside us if I bend the knee.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: The first time I went north of the wall was with your father.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: He was a good man. He deserved a better son. Were you with him at the end?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I was a prisoner of the Wildlings. But we avenged him. I want you to know that every mutineer found justice.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: I can't think of a worse way for him to go. The Night's Watch was his life. He would have died to protect every one of those men, and they butchered him.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I hate that he died that way. My father was the most honorable man I ever met. He was good all the way through. And he died on the executioner's block.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: Your father wanted to execute me.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I heard.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: He was in the right of course. It didn't make me hate him any less.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: and JON glance at each other.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I'm glad he didn't capture you.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: Me too.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: stops walking and loosens the belt holding his sword.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Your father gave me this sword. He changed the pommel from a bear to a wolf, but it's still Long Claw.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: hands the sword to JORAH. JORAH slowly takes the sword and looks it over in his hands.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Lord Commander Mormont thought you'd never come back to Westeros.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: stops examining the sword and looks up to JON.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: But you are back and it's been in your family for centuries. It's not right for me to have it.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: pauses, then nods at JON.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: He gave it to you.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I'm not his son.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: pulls the sword halfway out of the sheath and inspects the blade, turning it in his hands.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: I brought shame to my house. I broke my father's heart.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: resheaths the blade and hands it back to JON.

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: I forfeited the right to claim this sword. It's yours. May it serve you well and your children after you.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Father used to watch us from up here. He wouldn't say much. You probably don't remember. You were inside knitting all the time.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I remember.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: One time the boys were shooting arrows with Ser Rodrick. I came out here after and Bran had left his bow behind just lying on the ground. Ser Rodrick would have cuffed him if he saw. There was one arrow in the target. There was no one around, just like now. No one to stop me. So I started shooting. And every shot I had to go out there and get my one arrow and walk back and shoot it again. I wasn't very good. Finally I hit the bullseye. It could have been the 20th shot or the 50th. I don't remember. But I hit the bullseye and I heard this.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: starts a slow clap.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I looked up and he's standing right here smiling down at me. I knew what I was doing was against the rules. But he was smiling so I knew it wasn't wrong. The rules were wrong. I was doing what I was meant to be doing and he knew it. Now he's dead. Killed by the Lannisters with your help.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: turns to look at ARYA.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: What?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: retrieves a raven scroll from her pocket and unrolls it.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: That's your pretty handwriting. Septa Mordane used to crack my knuckles because I couldn't write as well as you. "Robb, I write to you today with heavy heart. Our good King Robert is dead. Killed from wounds he took in a boar hunt --

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You don't have to read it. I remember.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Father has been charged with treason. He conspired with Robert's brothers against my beloved Joffrey and tried to steal his throne. The Lannisters are treating me well and providing me with every comfort. I beg you, come to King's Landing, swear fealty to King Joffrey and prevent any strife between the great houses of Lannister and Stark. Your faithful sister, Sansa.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: They forced me to do it.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Did they. With a knife at your throat? Did they put you on a rack and stretch you until your bones started to pop?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You don't know what it was like. I was a child.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: So was I. I would have let them kill me before I betrayed my family.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: They told me it was the only way to save father.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: And you were stupid enough to believe them. I remember you standing on that platform with Joffrey and Cersei when they dragged father too the block. I remember the pretty dress you were wearing. I remember the fancy way you did your hair.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You were there?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I was there standing in the crowd near Baelor's statue.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: And what did you do? Did you come running to the rescue? Did you fight off the Lannisters and save father?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I wanted to.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: But you didn't. Just like me.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I didn't betray him. I didn't betray Robb. I didn't betray our entire family for my beloved Joffrey.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You should be on your knees thanking me. We're standing in Winterfell again because of me. You didn't win it back. Jon didn't win it back. He lost the Battle of the Bastards. The Knight's of the Vale won the battle and they rode north for me while you were off where, traveling the world?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I was training.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Training. Well, while you were training I suffered things you can never imagine.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Oh, I don't know about that. I can imagine quite a lot.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You never would have survived what I survived.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I guess we'll never know.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: What are you doing to do with that letter.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I don't know yet.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Who did you show it to? Where did you find it?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: You're scared, aren't you? What are you scared of? You didn't commit any crimes. No one's going to hang you.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Arya --

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Are you scared I'll show it to Jon and he'll be angry? No. That's not Jon. He'll understand. You were just a scared little girl all alone with the wicked Lannisters.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Do you know how happy Cersei would be if she saw us fighting? This is exactly what she wants. This is what she's always wanted, to tear us apart --

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: The northern lords will read it. They wouldn't think much of Lady Sansa if they knew how she did Cersei's bidding. What would little Lyanna Mormont say? She's younger than you were when you wrote this. Are you going to say, "But I was just a child"?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You're angry. Sometimes anger makes people do unfortunate things.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Sometimes fear makes them do unfortunate things. I'll go with anger.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: turns and walks away.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Who's that?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You knew him?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I serve the north.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: The lord of light never spoke to me. I don't know anything about him. I don't know what he wants from me.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Why?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: That's all anyone can tell me, I don't know. So what's the point in serving a god that none of us knows what he wants.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: So what are you fighting for?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: But we all die.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I am the shield that guards the realms of men.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Aye. Maybe that's enough.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: is sitting in a chair staring into the fire. DAENERYS stands across the room next to the painted table.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Do you know what I like about you?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: turns to look at DAENERYS.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I honestly don't.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You're not a hero.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Oh. I've been heroic on occasion.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: walks over to the fire and sits in the chair opposite from TYRION.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I once charged through the mud gate of King's Landing.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I don't want you to be a hero. Heroes do stupid things and they die. Drogo, Jorah, Dario, even this Jon Snow, they all try to outdo each other of who can do the stupidist, bravest thing.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: It's interesting these heroes you name. Drogo, Jorah, Dario, even this Jon Snow, they all fell in love with you.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Jon Snow's not in love with me.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Oh, my mistake. I suppose he stares at you longingly because he's hopeful for a successful military alliance.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: The thrill will fade.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Gold?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Family.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Maybe it really is all cocks in the end.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Yes, he's always been a champion of the downtrodden.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: How many people live here?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: A million, give or take.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: That's more people than the entire North crammed into that. Why would anyone want to live that way?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: There's more work in the city. And the brothels are far superior.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Why isn't she with them?

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: I'm afraid I don't know, Your Grace. No one has seen her.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: And the rest of them?

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: They're on their way to the dragon pit now.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Including our brother.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: Yes, Your Grace.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: If anything goes wrong, kill the silver-haired bitch first, then our brother, then the bastard who calls himself king.

Name: Missandei
Sentence: Why did they build it?

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: Dragons don't understand the difference between what is theirs and what isn't. Land, livestock, children... Letting them roam free around a city was a problem.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I imagine it was a sad joke at the end. An entire arena for a few sickly creatures smaller than dogs. But in the beginning, when it was home to Balerion the Dread, it must have been the most dangerous place in the world.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: A pleasant surprise in an unpleasant situation.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Supporting the enemy, no less.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Cersei will anyway.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Here we are the heroes of Blackwater Bay. Strange place for a reunion.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I don't think I'm anyone's lord anymore, Podrick. Save the titles for Ser Bronn of the Blackwater.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You've been thinking about our new queen.

Name: Varys
Sentence: And that would be double what now, exactly?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Are you? Helping me to arrange this meeting wasn't exactly looking after yourself, was it? You put yourself at risk.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: It's good to see you again.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You might.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: And some Clegane cunt to help them see it through.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Where is she?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: She'll be here soon.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Didn't travel with you?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: No.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: We've been here for some time.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: My apologies.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: We are all facing a unique

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Theon! I have your sister

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I think we ought to begin with larger concerns.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Then why are you talking? You're the smallest concern here.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Do you remember when we discussed dwarf jokes? His wasn't even good. He explained it at the end. Never explain. It always ruins it.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: We don't even let your kind live in the Iron Islands, you know? We kill you at birth. An act of mercy for the parents.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Perhaps you ought to sit down.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Why?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Sit down or leave.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: We are a group of people who do not like one another, as this recent demonstration has shown. We have suffered at each other's hands. We have lost people we love at each other's hands. If all we wanted was more of the same, there would be no need for this gathering. We are entirely capable of waging war against each other without meeting face-to-face.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: So instead, we should settle our differences and live together in harmony for the rest of our days?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: We all know that will never happen.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Then why are we here?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: This isn't about living in harmony. It's just about living. The same thing is coming for all of us. A general you can't negotiate with. An army that doesn't leave corpses behind on the battlefield. Lord Tyrion tells me a million people live in this city. They're about to become a million more soldiers in the Army of the Dead.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I imagine for most of them it would be an improvement.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: This is serious. I wouldn't be here if it weren't.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I don't think it's serious at all. I think it's another bad joke. If my brother Jaime has informed me correctly, you're asking me for a truce.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Yes. That's all.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: That's all? Pull back my armies and stand down while you go on your monster hunt. Or while you solidify and expand your position. Hard for me to know which it is with my armies pulled back until you return and march on my capital with four times the men.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Your capital will be safe until the northern threat is dealt with. You have my word.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: The word of a would-be usurper.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: There is no conversation that will erase the last 50 years. We have something to show you.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: We can destroy them by burning them.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: And we can destroy them with dragonglass. If we don't win this fight, then that is the fate of every person in the world.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: There is only one war that matters the Great War. And it is here.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I didn't believe it until I saw them. I saw them all.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: How many?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: A hundred thousand, at least.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Can they swim?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: No.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Good. I'm taking the Iron Fleet back to the Iron Islands.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: What are you talking about?

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: I've been around the world. I've seen everything, things you couldn't imagine, and this this is the only thing I've ever seen that terrifies me.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: I'm going back to my island. You should go back to yours. When winter's over, we'll be the only ones left alive.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: He's right to be afraid. And a coward to run. If those things come for us, there will be no kingdoms to rule. Everything we suffered will have been for nothing. Everything we lost will have been for nothing. The crown accepts your truce. Until the dead are defeated, they are the true enemy.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: In return, the King

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Just the King

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I would never ask it of you. You would never agree to it. And if you did, I would trust you even less than I do now. I ask it only of Ned Stark's son. I know Ned Stark's son.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I am true to my word. Or I try to be. That is why I cannot give you what you ask. I cannot serve two queens. And I have already pledged myself to Queen Daenerys of House Targaryen.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Then there is nothing left to discuss. The dead will come north first. Enjoy dealing with them. We will deal with whatever is left of you.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: It's been good to see you. I imagine the next time will be across a battlefield.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Yes, and I'm not looking forward to seeing more of them. But I'm loyal to the queen and you're loyal to Sansa and her dolt brother.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Fuck loyalty?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: And tell her what?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I'm grateful for your loyalty, but my dragon died so that we could be here. If it's all for nothing, then he died for nothing.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I know!

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I'm pleased you bent the knee to our queen

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I'm not going to swear an oath I can't uphold. Talk about my father.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: That is indeed a problem. The more immediate problem is that we're fucked.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Only one. Everyone stays here, and I go and talk to my sister.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I didn't come all this way to have my Hand

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I don't want Cersei to murder me either. I could have stayed in my cell and saved a great deal of trouble.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I did this. I should go.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: She'll definitely murder you. I go see my sister.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You spoke with her?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: At her until she kicked me out. She thinks I was an idiot to trust you. A lot of people seem to think that, actually.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I'm about to step into a room with the most murderous woman in the world who's already tried to kill me twice, that I know of. Who's an idiot?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I suppose we should say goodbye, one idiot to another.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I shouldn't be surprised, I suppose. She's your kind of woman a foreign whore who doesn't know her place.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: A foreign whore you can't abduct, beat, or intimidate. That must be difficult for you.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: So you bring her here with her pet Northerner, whom you've convinced to bow down before her.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I didn't know about that.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: And now you've got them both working towards the same goal, the goal you've worked towards your entire life.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Cersei, I didn't know.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: the destruction of this family.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I am the one preventing that from happening. Daenerys didn't want to debate and negotiate. She didn't want to bring you words. She wanted to bring you fire and blood until I advised her otherwise. I don't want to destroy our family. I never have.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You killed our father

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: After he sentenced me to death for a crime I didn't commit, yes, I killed him. Hate me for it if you want. I hate myself for it in spite of what he was, in spite of what he did to me.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Oh, poor little man. Your papa was mean to you. Do you have any idea what you did when you fired that crossbow? You left us open. You laid us bare for the vultures, and the vultures came and tore us apart. You may not have killed Joffrey, but you killed Myrcella, you killed Tommen. No one wouldo ve touched them if Father--

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I have never been more sorry about anything.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I will not hear it, not from you.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I will not hear it!

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: All right. You love your family, and I have destroyed it. I will always be a threat. So put an end to me.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: If it weren't for me, you'd have a motherIf it weren't for me, you'd have a father.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I am more sorry about the children than you could ever know.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I will not

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I don't care. I loved them. You know I did. You know it in your heart if there's anything left of it.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: It doesn't matter. Your love doesn't matter. Your feelings don't matter. I don't care why you did what you did. I only care what it cost us. It cost us our future.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: If there's no future, then why are we here? Why did you allow me to come?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Not to help my enemies collaborate in my destruction.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Yes, no, not what you hoped for, but you must have hoped for something.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: What did you hope for? To make Jon Snow submit to your queen.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Mm, not like this.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: But eventually, you want everyone to bend the knee to her.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Yes.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Why?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Because I think she will make the world a better place.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You said she'd destroy King's Landing.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: She knows herself. She chose an advisor who would check her worst impulses instead of feeding them.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: That's the difference between you. I don't care about checking my worst impulses. I don't care about making the world a better place. Hang the world.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: That thing you dragged here, I know what it is, I know what it means. And when it came at me, I didn't think about the world. Not at all. As soon as it opened its mouth, the world disappeared for me, right down its black throat. All I could think about was keeping those gnashing teeth away from the ones who matter most, away from my family. Maybe Euron Greyjoy had the right idea. Get on a boat, take those who matter.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You're pregnant.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: No one is less happy about this than I am.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I know. I respect what you did. Wish you hadn't done it, but I respect it.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: This place was the beginning of the end for my family. A dragon is not a slave. They were terrifying. Extraordinary. They filled people with wonder and awe, and we locked them in here. They wasted away. They grew small. And we grew small as well. We weren't extraordinary without them. We were just like everyone else.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You're not like everyone else. And your family hasn't seen its end. You're still here.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I can't have children.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Who told you that?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: The witch who murdered my husband.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Has it occurred to you she might not have been a reliable source of information?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You were right from the beginning. If I had trusted you, everything would be different.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: So, what now?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I can't forget what I saw north of the Wall. And I can't pretend that Cersei won't take back half the country the moment I march north.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: It appears Tyrion's assessment was correct. We're fucked.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: My armies will not stand down. I will not pull them back to the capital. I will march them north to fight alongside you in the Great War. The darkness is coming for us all. We'll face it together. And when the Great War is over, perhaps you'll remember I chose to help with no promises or assurances from any of you. I expect not. Call our banners. All of them.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: It's not easy for ravens to fly in these storms. Perhaps Jon tried to send word earlier.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: No, this is the way he is, the way he's always been. He never asked for my opinion. Why would he start now?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I can't believe he'd surrender the Northern crown without consulting you.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: This is his writing, his signature. He pledged to fight for Daenerys Targaryen. He's bent the knee.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: I've heard gossip that the Dragon Queen is quite beautiful.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: What does that have to do with anything?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: Jon is young and unmarried. Daenerys is young and unmarried.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You think he wants to marry her?

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: An alliance makes sense. Together, they'd be difficult to defeat. He was named King.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Even if I wanted to, Arya would never go along. She always loved Jon far more than she ever loved me, and she'd kill anyone who betrayed her family.

Name: Petyr Baelish
Sentence: You are family, too. Would Arya really murder her own sister?

Name: Sansa Stark

Name: Jorah Mormont
Sentence: Perhaps you should fly to Winterfell, Your Grace. You have many enemies in the North. Thousands fell fighting your fatherAll it takes is one angry man with a crossbow. He'll see your silver hair on the kingsroad and know that one well-placed bolt will make him a hero. The man who killed the conqueror.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: It's your decision, Your Grace. But if we're going to be allies in this war, it's important for the Northerners to see us as allies. If we sail to White Harbor together, I think it sends a better message.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I've not come to conquer the North. I'm coming to save the North. We sail together.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: Jon.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: Can I speak with you?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: All right.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: What you did in King's Landing, what you said... You couldo ve lied to Cersei about bending the knee to Daenerys. You risked everything to tell an enemy the truth.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: We went down there to make peace. And it seems to me we need to be honest with each other if we're going to fight together.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: You've always known what was right. Even when we were all young and stupid, you always knew. Every step you take it's always the right step.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: It's not. It may seem that way from the outside, but I promise you, it's not true. I've done plenty of things that I regret.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: Not compared to me, you haven't.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: No. Not compared to you.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: I always wanted to do the right thing. Be the right kind of person. But I never knew what that meant. It always seemed like there's like there was an impossible choice I had to make. Stark or Greyjoy.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Our father was more of a father.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: He was.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: And you betrayed him. Betrayed his memory.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: I did.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: But you never lost him. He's a part of you. Just like he's a part of me.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: But the things I've done.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: It's not my place to forgive you for all of it. But what I can forgive, I do. You don't need to choose. You're a Greyjoy and you're a Stark.

Sentence: When I was Ramsay's prisoner, Yara tried to save me. She's the only one who tried to save me. She needs me now.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: So, why are you still talking to me?

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: All of us chose to follow Yara. We left the Iron Islands for Yara. She would never leave one of us behind. We're not leaving her behind.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: She's not dead.

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: She's our queen

Sentence: Sometimes when I'm trying to understand a person's motives, I play a little game. I assume the worst. What's the worst reason you have for turning me against my sisterThat's what you do, isn't it? That's what you've always done turn family against family, turn sister against sister. That's what you did to our mother.

Name: Sansa Stark

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: When you brought me back to Winterfell, you told me there's no justice in the world, not unless we make it. Thank you for all your many lessons, Lord Baelish. I will never forget them.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Our men in King's Landing will march north in three days' time.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: We don't have a fortnight. If the North falls, we fall. Three days. The remaining forces in the Westerlands will take the river road east. We'll meet at Lord Harroway's Town and march together to Winterfell.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Ser Jaime.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Your Grace.

Sentence: What are you doing?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Preparing the expedition north.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Expedition north? I always knew you were the stupidest Lannister. The Starks and Targaryens have united against us, and you want to fight alongside them? Are you a traitor or an idiot?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You pledged our forces to fight our common enemy.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I'll say whatever I need to say to ensure the survival of our house. You expect me to trust the man who murdered our father.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You saw it with your own eyes. You saw a dead man trying to kill us.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I saw it burn. If dragons can't stop them, if Dothraki and Unsullied and Northmen can't stop them, how will our armies make a difference?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: This isn't about noble houses, this is about the living and the dead!

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: And I intend to stay amongst the living. Let the Stark boy and his new queen--

Sentence: I made a promise.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Our child will rule Westeros.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Our child will never be born if the dead come south.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: The monsters are real. The white walkers, the dragons, the Dothraki screamers all the frightening stories we heard when we were young, they're all real. So be it. Let the monsters kill each other. And while they battle in the North, we take back the lands that belong to us.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: And then what?

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: And then we rule.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: When the fighting in the North is over, someone wins. You understand that, don't you? If the dead win, they march south and kill us all. If the living win, and we've betrayed them, they march south and kill us all!

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: The Targaryens and the Starks already want to kill us all. Most of them will die in the North.

Sentence: We can't beat the Dothraki. We don't have the numbers. We don't have the support of the other houses!

Sentence: You did, my lady. It was the honor of my life. I'll always be grateful for your faith. But when I left Winterfell, I told you we need allies or we will die. I have brought those allies home to fight alongside us. I had a choice, keep my crown or protect the North. I chose the North.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: If anyone survives the war to come, we'll have Jon Snow to thank. He risked his life to show us the threat is real. Thanks to his courage, we have brought with us the greatest army the world has ever seen. We have brought two full-grown dragons. And soon, the Lannister army will ride north to join our cause.

Sentence: I know, I know, our people haven't been friends in the past. But we must fight together now or die.

Sentence: May I ask, how are we meant to feed the greatest army the world has ever seen? While I ensured our stores would last through winter, I didn't account for Dothraki, Unsullied and two full-grown dragons. What do dragons eat, anyway?

Sentence: Whatever they want.

Sentence: My lord. My lady.

Sentence: Good.

Sentence: In any event, you are most welcome here in King's Landing, Captain Strickland.

Name: Euron Greyjoy

Sentence: You want a whore, buy one. You want a queen, earn her.

Sentence: I've given her justice, an army, and the Iron Fleet, yet she gives me no sign of affection. My heart is nearly broken.

Sentence: You're insolent. I've executed men for less.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: They were lesser men.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: Ser Bronn of the Blackwater.

Sentence: Apologies for the interruption, but the queen did urge me to hurry.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: Poor girl. The pox will take her within the year.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: The queen's brothers made promises to you and broke them. Her Grace wants to rectify their mistake.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: That was Ser Jaime's doing, not hers. When Queen Cersei wants something, she pays in advance and in gold. Several chests of it, in fact. Waiting for you in a wagon just outside.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: She has other plans for the Targaryen girl.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: Our queen's brothers are unlikely to survive their Northern adventures. But in the event that they do-

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: She has a keen sense of poetic justice.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: When the Citadel expelled me, I thought I would die poor and alone, but in exchange for my service, Queen Cersei made me her Hand. What would she do for the man who rids her of her treasonous brothers?

Sentence: I wanted those elephants.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: So, how do I compare to the fat king?
