Sentence: You're insulting my late husband?

Sentence: Are you offended?

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: I'm going to put a prince in your belly.

Sentence: They do make a handsome couple.

Sentence: Your sister doesn't like me.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: When I was a child, my brother would tell me a bedtime story about the man who murdered our father.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Who stabbed him in the back and cut his throat. Who sat down on the Iron Throne and watched as his blood poured onto the floor.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: He told me other stories as well. About all the things we would do to that man once we took back the Seven Kingdoms and had him in our grasp.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Your sister pledged to send her army north.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: She did.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms

Sentence: I don't see an army. I see one man, with one hand. It appears your sister lied to me.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: She lied to me as well. She never had any intention of sending her army north.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: She has Euron Greyjoy's fleet and 20,000 fresh troops. The Golden Company from Essos, bought and paid for. Even if we defeat the dead, she'll have more than enough to destroy the survivors.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: We"?

Sentence: I promised to fight for the living. I intend to keep that promise.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: He came here alone, knowing full well how he'd be received. Why would he do that if he weren't telling the truth?

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Perhaps he trusts his little brother to defend him, right up to the moment he slits my throat.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You're right. We can't trust him. He attacked my father in the streets. He tried to destroy my house and my family, the same as he did yours.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Do you want me to apologize? I won't. We were at war. Everything I did, I did for my house and my family. I'd do it all again.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: The things we do for love.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Either you knew Cersei was lying and let me believe otherwise, or you didn't know at all. Which makes you either a traitor or a fool.

Sentence: I am.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: She didn't seem sure about you.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: It's hard to blame her. I made a mistake common to clever people. I underestimated my opponents.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Hmm.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Cersei told me the pregnancy had changed her. A chance for you both to start again. And I believed her.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: She's always been good at using the truth to tell lies. I wouldn't be too hard on yourself. She's fooled me more than anybody.

Name: Jaime Lannister

Name: Sansa Stark

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Tyrion is a good man. He was never anything but decent towards me.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I didn't ask him to be my Hand simply because he was good.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You never should have either.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Daenerys Targaryen

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Families are complicated.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: A sad thing to have in common.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: We have other things in common. We've both known what it means to lead people who aren't inclined to accept a woman's rule. And we've both done a damn good job of it, from what I can tell.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And yet, I can't help but feel we're at odds with one another. Why is that? Your brother.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: He loves you, you know that.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: That bothers you.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Men do stupid things for women. They're easily manipulated.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: All my life, I've known one goal

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I should have thanked you the moment you arrived. That was a mistake.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I'm here because I love your brother and I trust him, and I know he's true to his word. He's only the second man in my life I can say that about.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Who was the first?

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Someone taller.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: And what happens afterwards? We defeat the dead, we destroy Cersei. What happens then?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I take the Iron Throne.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: What about the North? It was taken from us, and we took it back. And we said we'd never bow to anyone else again. What about the North?

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: What is it?

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: My queen.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Your sister?

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: She only has a few ships, and she couldn't sail them here. So, she's sailing to the Iron Islands instead, to take them back in your name.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: But why aren't you with her?

Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: I want to fight for Winterfell, Lady Sansa, if you'll have me.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Gilly
Sentence: When the time comes, you'll be down in the crypts.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Gilly
Sentence: They're the safest place to be. Through that archway right over there.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Gilly
Sentence: That's good to hear. I'm going to be in the crypt with my son, and I'd feel a lot better with you down there to protect us.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I thought we'd lost you.

Name: Jon Snow

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: The Umbers?

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: How long do we have?

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: They're coming.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: We have dragonglass and Valyrian steel.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: But there are too many of them.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Far too many.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Our enemy doesn't tire.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Doesn't stop. Doesn't feel.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: We can't beat them in a straight fight.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: So, what can we do?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: The Night King made them all. They follow his command. If he falls Getting to him may be our best chance.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: If that's true, he'll never expose himself.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Yes, he will.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: He'll come for me. He's tried before, many times, with many Three-Eyed Ravens.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: An endless night. He wants to erase this world, and I am its memory.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: How will he find you?

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: His mark is on me.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: He always knows where I am.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: We'll put you in the crypt, where it's safest.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: No. We need to lure him into the open before his army destroys us all. I'll wait for him in the Godswood.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You want us to use you as bait?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: We're not leaving you alone out there.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Theon Greyjoy
Sentence: He won't be. I'll stay with him. With the Ironborn. I took this castle from you. Let me defend you now.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: When the time comes, Ser Davos and I will be on the walls, to give you the signal to light the trench.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Ser Davos is perfectly capable of waving a torch on his own. You'll be in the crypt.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Your Grace, I have fought before, I can do it again. Alongside the men and women risking their lives.

Episode Title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: There are thousands of them and only one of you. You can't fight as well as they can, but you can think better than any of them. You're here because of your mind. If we survive, I'll need it.

Name: Jon Snow

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: They were married in secret. After Rhaegar fell on the Trident, she had a son. Robert would have murdered the baby if he ever found out, and Lyanna knew it. So the last thing she did, as she bled to death on her birthing bed, was give the boy to her brother, Ned Stark, to raise as his bastard.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: We're here to say goodbye to our brothers and sisters. To our fathers and mothers. To our friends. Our fellow men and women who set aside their differences to fight together and die together so that others might live. Everyone in this world owes them a debt that can never be repaid. It is our duty and our honor to keep them alive in memory for those who come after us and those who come after them for as long as men draw breath. They were the shields that guarded the realms of men. And we shall never see their like again.

Sentence: In Meereen, the slaves turned on the masters and liberated the city themselves the moment I arrived.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: They're afraid. Anyone who resists Cersei will see his family butchered. You can't expect them to be heroes. They're hostages.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: They are. In a tyrant's grip. Whose fault is that? Mine?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: What does it matter whose fault it is? Thousands of children will die if the city burns.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Your sister knows how to use her enemies' weaknesses against them. That's what she thinks our mercy is - weakness.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I beg you, my queen-

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: But she's wrong. Mercy is our strength. Our mercy towards future generations who will never again be held hostage by a tyrant.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Ready the Unsullied. Tonight you sail for King's Landing, to join the Northern armies.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Cersei's followers will abandon her if they know the war is lost. Give them that chance. If the city surrenders, they will ring the bells and raise the gates. Please, if you hear them ringing the bells, call off the attack.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Wait for me outside the city. You'll know when it's time.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Your brother was stopped trying to get past our lines.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: It seems he hasn't abandoned your sister after all. The next time you fail me will be the last time you fail me.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: She wants to attack now.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Daybreak at the earliest.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Davos. I need to ask you a favor. You're the greatest smuggler alive, aren't you?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I'm Arya Stark. I'm going to kill Queen Cersei.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Think about it. She kills Cersei, the war's over. There won't be a siege. You might not even die tomorrow.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Go ahead, talk to him.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I drink to eat the skull keeper.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I want to eat the skull keeper.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I want to see the ...

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Ah. Good. I want to be alone with the prisoner. Get some rest. Tomorrow will be a long day.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Ordered by whom? The queen herself?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Well, in that case, as Hand of the Queen, I outrank whomever gave your order. Probably by quite a lot.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: How did they find you?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Did you consider taking it off?

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Cersei once called me "the stupidest Lannister."

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: And you're going back to her, to die with her.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You've underestimated her before.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: She's going to die. Unless you can convince her to change her course of action.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Difficult to do from here.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: When have I ever been able to convince Cersei of anything?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Try. If not for yourself, if not for her, then for every one of the million people in that city, innocent or otherwise.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: To be honest, I never really cared much for them. Innocent or otherwise.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You do care for one innocent. I know you do. And so does Cersei. She has a reason now.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: The child is the reason she'll never give an inch. All the worst things she's ever done, she's done for her children. It's not impossible that she'll win.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: She won't. Her enemy's forces have been depleted, as she said they would be.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Two of the three dragons are dead. She's evened the odds.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: The city will fall tomorrow.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: She has the Lannister army, she has the Golden Company-

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I defended the city last time it was attacked. I know it better than anyone. It will fall tomorrow.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Then I suppose I'll die tomorrow, if not before.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Why?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Escape. The two of you, together. Remember where we met, where they keep the dragon skulls, beneath the Red Keep? Take her down there. Keep following the stairways down, down as far as they'll go. You'll come out onto a beach at the foot of the keep. A dinghy will be waiting for you. Sail out of the bay. If the winds are kind, you'll make it to Pentos. Start a new life.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Sail right past the Iron Fleet and into a new life? Sounds a lot less likely than Cersei winning this war-

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: There won't be an Iron Fleet for much longer. Do it. If you don't, you'll never see Cersei again.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Swear to me.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You have my word.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: If it works, give the order to ring all the bells in King's Landing and open the gates. That will be our signal that the city has surrendered.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: I'll try.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I never thought I'd get to repay the favor. Remember, ring the bells and open the gates.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Your queen will execute you for this.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: If Daenerys can make it to the throne without wading through a river of blood, maybe she'll show mercy to the person who made that possible.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Tens of thousands of innocent lives one not particularly innocent dwarf it seems like a fair trade. If it weren't for you, I never wouldo ve survived my childhood.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You would have.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You were the only one who didn't treat me like a monster. You were all I had.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: If you hear the bells ring, they've surrendered. Call off your men.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Move.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Soldier!

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Turn it around! Turn it around!

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Get back! Back!

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Fire!

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: Your Grace.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: All we need is one good shot.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: The scorpions have all been destroyed, Your Grace.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: The Iron Fleet hold Blackwater Bay. Euron killed one of her dragons. He can kill another.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: Your Grace, the Iron Fleet is burning. The gates have been breached. The Golden Company-

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Our men will fight harder than sellswords ever could. They will defend their queen to the last man.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: Yes, Your Grace.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: The Red Keep has never fallen. It won't fall today.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Move, move!

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: No! Get back! Get back!

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Stay! Stay!

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Stop!

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Find somewhere to hide.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: The Kingslayer.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: We need to get the queen out of King's Landing.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Listen. That's the sound of a city dying. It's over.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Well, maybe for you.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: If you kill another king before you die they'll sing about you forever.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: You're no king.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Oh, but I am. And I fucked the queen. If I win, I'll bring your head to Cersei so you can kiss her one last time.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: Your Grace, it isn't safe here any longer.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: The Red Keep is the safest place in the city.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: The Unsullied have breached the gates of the Red Keep.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: Maegor's Holdfast would be a better place to wait out the storm.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: You fought well for a cripple.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: Another king for you.

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: But I got you!

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: I got you!

Name: Euron Greyjoy
Sentence: I'm the man who killed Jaime Lannister.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Go home, girl. The fire will get her, or one of the Dothraki.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Or maybe that dragon will eat her. It doesn't matter. She's dead. And you'll be dead too if you don't get out of here.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I'm going to kill her.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: You think you wanted revenge a long time? I've been after it all my life.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: It's all I care about. And look at me.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Look at me! You wanna be like me?

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: You come with me, you die here.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Sandor.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Thank you.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Your Grace.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Hello, big brother.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Ser Gregor, stay by my side.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Ser Gregor, I command you.

Name: Qyburn
Sentence: Obey your queen, Ser Gregor.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Yeah, that's you. That's what you've always been.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You're hurt.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: It doesn't matter.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: You're bleeding.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Let go.

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Oh.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Wait! Wait! No!

Name: Sandor Clegane
Sentence: Fucking die!

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: We need to fall back! Fall back behind the wall! Fall back!

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Get out of the city! Fall back! Fall back! Fall back!

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: You can't stay here. You have to keep moving.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: You have to.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: If you stay here, you'll die. Follow me.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Follow me!

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Get up. Get up!

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: We have to keep moving.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Come on! Come on!

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: This way.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I want our baby to live. I want our baby to live. I want our baby to live.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Don't let me die, Jaime. Please don't let me die.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: It's all right.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Please don't let me die.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: I don't want to die.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Just look- Look at me. Look at me.

Name: Cersei Lannister
Sentence: Not like this. Not like this. Not like this.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Look- Look- Look me in the eye. Don't look away. Don't look- Look at me! Just look at me.

Name: Jaime Lannister
Sentence: Nothing else matters. Nothing else matters. Only us.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I'll find you later.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: It's not safe. Let me send some men with you.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I'm going alone.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: In the name of the one true queen, Daenerys Targaryen, I sentence you to die.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Grey Worm!

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: It's over.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: These men are prisoners. It is not over until the queen's enemies are defeated.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: They are breathing.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: I obey my queen's commands, not yours.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: And what are the queen's commands?

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: Kill all who follow Cersei Lannister." These are free men. They chose to fight for her.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Blood of my blood.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You kept all your promises to me. You killed my enemies in their iron suits.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Your tore down their stone houses. You gave me the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Torgo Nudho.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You have walked beside me since the Plaza of Pride. You are the bravest of men, the most loyal of soldiers. I name you commander of all my forces, the Queen's Master of War.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Unsullied. All of you were torn from your mother's arms and raised as slaves. Now you are liberators. You have freed the people of King's Landing from the grip of a tyrant!

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: But the war is not over. We will not lay down our spears until we have liberated all the people of the world!

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: From Winterfell to Dorne, from Lannisport to Qarth, from the Summer Isles to the Jade Sea! Women, men and children have suffered too long beneath the wheel.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Will you break the wheel with me?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You freed your brother. You committed treason.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I freed my brother. And you slaughtered a city.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Take him.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: What are you doing here?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Hey, what happened?

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: I came to kill Cersei. Your queen got there first.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: She's everyone's queen now.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Try telling Sansa.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Wait for me outside the city gates. I'll come find you.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Jon. She knows who you are. Who you really are. You'll always be a threat to her. And I know a killer when I see one.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Did you bring any wine?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: No.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Ah... Well... thank you for coming to see me. Our queen doesn't keep prisoners for long. I suppose there's a crude kind of justice. I betrayed my closest friend and watched him burn. Now Varys's ashes can tell my ashes, "See, I told you." It just occurred to me. I'm talking to the only man alive who knows where I'm going.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: So is there life after death?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Not that I've seen.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I should be thankful. Oblivion is the best I could hope for. I strangled my lover. I shot my own father with a crossbow. I betrayed my queen.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You didn't.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I did. And I'd do it again, now that I've seen what I've seen. I chose my fate. The people of King's Landing did not.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I can't justify what happened. I won't try. But the war is over now.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Is it? When you heard her talking to her soldiers, did she sound like someone who's done fighting?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: She liberated the people of Slaver's Bay. She liberated the people of King's Landing. And she'll go on liberating until the people of the world are free and she rules them all.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: And you've been by her side, counseling her. Until today.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Until today. Varys was right. I was wrong. It was vanity to think I could guide her. Our queen's nature is fire and blood.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You think our house words are stamped on our bodies when we're born and that's who we are? Then I'd be fire and blood too. She's not her father, no more than you're Tywin Lannister.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: My father was an evil man. My sister was an evil woman. Pile up all the bodies of all the people they ever killed, there still won't be half as many as our beautiful queen slaughtered in a single day.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Cersei left her no choice.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: The moment the gates fell, the battle was over.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: She saw her friend beheaded. She saw her dragon shot out of the sky.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: And she burned down a city for it.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Ah, it's easy to judge when you're standing far from the battlefield.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Would you have done it?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: What?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You've been up there, on a dragon's back. You've had that power. Would you have burned the city down?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I don't know.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Yes, you do. You won't say because you don't want to betray her but you know.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: What's it matter what I'd do?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: It matters more than anything. When she murdered the slavers of Astapor, I'm sure no one but the slavers complained. After all, they were evil men.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: When she crucified hundreds of Meereenese nobles, who could argue? They were evil men. The Dothraki khals she burned alive? They would have done worse to her. Everywhere she goes, evil men die and we cheer her for it. And she grows more powerful and more sure that she is good and right. She believes her destiny is to build a better world for everyone. If you believed that if you truly believed it, wouldn't you kill whoever stood between you and paradise?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I know you love her. I love her too. Not as successfully as you. But I believed in her with all my heart. Love is more powerful than reason. We all know that. Look at my brother.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Love is the death of duty.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You just came up with that?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Maester Aemon said it a long time ago.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Sometimes duty is the death of love. You are the shield that guards the realms of men. And you've always tried to do the right thing. No matter the cost, you've tried to protect people. Who is the greatest threat to the people now?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: It's a terrible thing I'm asking. It's also the right thing. Do you think I'm the last man she'll execute? Who is more dangerous than the rightful heir to the Iron Throne?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: That's her decision. She is the queen.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I'm sorry it came to this.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: And your sisters? Do you see them bending the knee?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: My sisters will be loyal to the throne.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Why do you think Sansa told me the truth about you? Because she doesn't want Dany to be queen.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: She doesn't get to choose.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: No. But you do. And you have to choose now.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: When I was a girl, my brother told me it was made with a thousand swords from Aegon's fallen enemies. What do a thousand swords look like in the mind of a little girl who can't count to twenty? I imagined a mountain of swords too high to climb. So many fallen enemies, you could only see the soles of Aegon's feet.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I saw them executing Lannister prisoners in the street. They said they were acting on your orders.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: It was necessary.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Necessary? Have you been down there? Have you seen? Children, little children, burned!

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I tried to make peace with Cersei. She used their innocence as a weapon against me. She thought it would cripple me.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: And Tyrion?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: He conspired behind my back with my enemies. How have you treated people who've done the same to you, even when it broke your heart?

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Forgive him.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: I can't.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You can. You can forgive all of them, make them see they made a mistake. Make them understand.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: Please, Dany.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: We can't hide behind small mercies. The world we need won't be built by men loyal to the world we have.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: The world we need is a world of mercy. It has to be.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: And it will be. It's not easy to see something that's never been before. A good world.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: How do you know? How do you know it'll be good?

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Because I know what is good. And so do you.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: I don't.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: You do. You do. You've always known.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: What about everyone else? All the other people who think they know what's good.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: They don't get to choose.

Name: Daenerys Targaryen
Sentence: Be with me. Build the new world with me. This is our reason. It has been from the beginning, since you were a little boy with a bastardo s name and I was a little girl who couldn't count to twenty. We do it together. We break the wheel together.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: You are my queen. Now, and always.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Where's Jon?

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: He is our prisoner.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: So is Lord Tyrion. They were both to be brought to this gathering.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: We will decide what we do with our prisoners. This is our city now.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: If you look outside the walls of your city, you'll find thousands of Northmen who will explain to you why harming Jon Snow is not in your interest.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: And you will find thousands of Unsullied who believe that it is.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: Some of you may be quick to forgive. The Ironborn are not. I swore to follow Daenerys Targaryen.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: You swore to follow a tyrant.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: She freed us from a tyrant. Cersei is gone because of her, and Jon Snow put a knife in her heart. Let the Unsullied give him what he deserves.

Name: Arya Stark
Sentence: Say another word about killing my brother and I'll cut your throat.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: We do not need payment. We need justice. Jon Snow cannot go free.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: It's not for you to decide.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: You are not here to speak! Everyone has heard enough words from you.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You're right. And no one's any better for it. But it's not for you to decide. Jon committed his crime here. His fate is for our king to decide. Or our queen.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You're the most powerful people in Westeros. Choose one.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: Make your choice, then.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Uncle? Please sit.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Me? The Imp?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Half the people hate me for serving Daenerys, the other half hate me for betraying her.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Can't think of a worse choice.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I've had nothing to do but think these past few weeks. About our bloody history. About the mistakes we've made.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: What unites people? Armies? Gold? Flags? Stories. There's nothing in the world more powerful than a good story. Nothing can stop it. No enemy can defeat it. And who has a better story than Bran the Broken? The boy who fell from a high tower and lived. He knew he'd never walk again, so he learned to fly. He crossed beyond the Wall, a crippled boy, and became the Three-Eyed Raven. He is our memory, the keeper of all our stories. The wars, weddings, births, massacres, famines. Our triumphs... mm, our defeats, our past. Who better to lead us into the future?

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: Bran has no interest in ruling and he can't father children.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Good. Sons of kings can be cruel and stupid, as you well know. His will never torment us. That is the wheel our queen wanted to break.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: From now on, rulers will not be born. They will be chosen on this spot by the lords and ladies of Westeros to serve the realm.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I know you don't want it. I know you don't care about power. But I ask you now, if we choose you will you wear the crown? Will you lead the Seven Kingdoms to the best of your abilities from this day until your last day?

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Why do you think I came all this way?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: To Brandon of House Stark... I say aye.

Name: Yara Greyjoy
Sentence: Aye.

Name: Sansa Stark
Sentence: I love you, little brother. I always will. You'll be a good king. But tens of thousands of Northmen fell in the Great War defending all of Westeros. And those who survived have seen too much and fought too hard ever to kneel again. The North will remain an independent kingdom, as it was for thousands of years.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: All hail Bran the Broken, First of His Name, King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Six Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Lord Tyrion, you will be my Hand.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: N- No, Your Grace, I don't want it.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: And I don't want to be king.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: I don't deserve it. I thought I was wise, but I wasn't. I thought I knew what was right, but I didn't. Choose Ser Davos. Choose anyone else.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: I choose you.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: You cannot.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: Yes, I can. I'm king.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: This man is a criminal. He deserves justice.

Name: Bran Stark
Sentence: He just got it. He's made many terrible mistakes. He's going to spend the rest of his life fixing them.

Name: Grey Worm
Sentence: It is not enough.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: Giving you to the Unsullied would start a war. Letting you walk free would start a war. So our new king has chosen to send you to the Night's Watch.

Name: Jon Snow
Sentence: There's still a Night's Watch?

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: The world will always need a home for bastards and broken men.

Name: Tyrion Lannister
Sentence: You shall take no wife, hold no lands, father no children. The Unsullied wanted your head of course, but Grey Worm has accepted the justice of a life sentence. Sansa and Arya wanted you freed, but they understand our new king needs to make peace. No one is very happy. Which means it's a good compromise, I suppose.

Name: Jon Snow
